Any extraneous circuitry that doesn't interfere with the chip's normal\nfunctions won't show up in these tests. And it is IMPOSSIBLE to detect this. .\n.<br />\n<br />\nTesting of chips is done \u2013say one in a thousand . It is IMPOSSIBLE to test\nevery single chip. . .This is why we must have our own chips with Russian help\n. . .<br />\n<br />\nTesting of a suspect chip , involves hundreds of man hours of grinding away a\nthin layer of the chip, put the chip into a scanning electron microscope, and\nthen take a picture of it, repeating the process until every layer of the chip\nhas been imaged. . .<br />\n<br />\nSpotting a tiny discrepancy amid a chip's many layers and billions of\ntransistors is IMPOSSIBLE and the chip is destroyed in the process. . .<br />\n<br />\nFor ICs destined for mission-critical systems, it is IMPERATIVE to test every chip\nwithout destroying it. . .<br />\n<br />\nA kill switch is any manipulation of the chip's software or hardware that would\ncause the chip to die outright--to shut off a TEJAS 2 missile-launching\nelectronics . .<br />\nOur Tejas fighter jets must be able to land on all highways of India . ..<br />\n<br />\nUsers will NEVER be aware of the malicious intrusion--the enemy could use it to\nbypass battlefield radio encryption. . .<br />\nIranians have found a way out of this. This is why Zionists are worried.<br />\n<br />\nTHE ONLY WAY OUT IS TO TAKE PUTINs HELP IN DEVELOPING OUR OWN CHIPS PROGRAM.\nRUSSIANS ARE FAR FAR AHEAD OF THE ZIONISTS.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nChip security to a barricaded home against thieves . The front door and windows\nmight offer vault like protection, but there is a an unknown rear window deep\nin the basement for malicious use by the enemy who designed and built your home\n.<br />\n<br />\nChips can be down graded or made to have a lesser shelf life ( expiry date ).\nAll it needs is a small nick of the chip\u2019s copper wiring. . . .<br />\n<br />\nThe fault, is IMPOSSIBLE to detect. . . The chip fails due to electromigration:\nas current flowed through the wire, eventually the metal atoms would migrate\nand form voids, and the wire would break.<br />\n<br />\nIf the chip goes into a defense satellite, where it's supposed to work for 20\nyears but fails after 2 years -- you have a very expensive, inoperative\nsatellite.<br />\n<br />\nTo create a controlled kill switch, they add an extra logic to a\nmicroprocessor, which can be done either during manufacturing or during the\nchip's design phase. . . . A saboteur could substitute one of the masks used to\nimprint the pattern of wires and transistors onto the semiconductor wafer\u2014so\nthat the pattern for just one microchip is different from the rest.<br />\n<br />\nModern fighter jets use field-programmable gate arrays (FPGAs)--a generic chip\nthat can be customized through ENEMY software. . .<br />\n<br />\nIf you put the FPGA in a military system, someone else can reprogram it. Libya\nand Syria has faced these problems. Building a kill switch into an FPGA could\nmean embedding say 500 transistors within its billions. Malicious chips have\nback doors. . .<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br />\n<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #EEEEEE; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">CONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\nAn enemy who embeds a kill switch in every commercial router could devastate\nthe whole national security without ever targeting the Defense Department\ndirectly. . .<br />\n<br />\nThe timer could be programmed with a single command- The whole defence\nmechanism fails. . .<br />\n<br />\nChip alteration can even be done after the device has been manufactured and\npackaged, provided the design data is available.<br />\n<br />\nFocused-ion-beam etching machine ( FIB ) shoots a stream of ions at precise\nareas on the chip, mechanically milling away tiny amounts of material like\nMicrosurgery with the beam acting like a tiny scalpel to remove material, cut a\nmetal line, and make new connections.<br />\n<br />\nThey can dig several layers to get to the intended target. It is IMPOSSIBLE to\ndetect.<br />\n<br />\nThey can reroute signals to the transistors that are already in place because\nchips commonly contain large blocks of unused circuitry, leftovers from\nprevious versions of the design.<br />\n<br />\nSoft X-ray tomography can be used to penetrate the chip for inspection but not\nstrong enough to do irreversible damage.<br />\n<br />\nThere is a technique called Boolean equivalence checking to analyze what types\nof inputs will generate certain outputs. This process can be reversed- to\ndetect monkey play.<br />\n<br />\nUnlike India Pakistan has refused to allow KILL CHIPS in their defence\nmechanism both offensive and defensive. . text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-WwmoVDrjt2c/Vj78wrRfz7I/AAAAAAABBuU/UAzetdACNEg/s1600/EMP_maptr_540.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"376\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-WwmoVDrjt2c/Vj78wrRfz7I/AAAAAAABBuU/UAzetdACNEg/s640/EMP_maptr_540.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EMP stands for Electro-Magnetic\nPulse. During the initial energy release from a nuclear weapon a large\nelectromagnetic field in the form of a \u201cpulse\u201d radiates outward. This pulse\nfrom the explosion will travel in a line of sight fashion.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any electrical\nwiring in the path of the pulse will burn out.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike the radiation\nreleased during the nuclear explosion, EMP is not particularly dangerous to\npeople. Unless you have a pacemaker installed. But it will destroy unshielded\ncomputer systems.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since EMP travels line of sight it can cover a very large\narea if the nuclear detonation occurs high in the atmosphere.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most nuclear military\nweapons are not intended for high altitude detonations. This is because those\ndetonations do little damage to the enemy and cause very little fallout.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, if one were detonated at high altitude the EMP would travel outward\ncrossing everything in its line of sight.&nbsp;\nCovering perhaps thousands of square miles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/G6n0bbGhAgw/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/G6n0bbGhAgw?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; BoPET stands for Biaxially-oriented polyethylene\nterephthalate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The polyester film\nprotects the metal so that your shielding stays intact. The boPET film also\ninsulates your electronics from the metal layer, a key part of the protection.\nThe EMP's E1 energy hits the metal layer and cannot touch your electronics. The\nspecial film also resists moisture, but still lets corrosive gases escape.\n(Electronics release these gasses over time.) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To protect your\nelectronics, you need to defend against two energy surges: a surge that arrives\nlike radio waves (E1 phase) and a second surge that arrives over power and\nphone lines (E3 phase). font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It's essentially the old nuclear electromagnetic\npulse weapon , but without the nuclear part. CHAMP carries a small generator\nthat emits microwaves to fry electronics with pinpoint accuracy. It&nbsp; blacks out the electronics rather than\nblowing up physical targets (or people). &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike a nuclear electromagnetic pulse weapon,\nwhich fires once, blacking out entire nation-states, CHAMP can fire multiple\ntimes, pinpointing and blacking out only essential targets. This would permit,\nfor example, taking down radar defenses in a hostile state<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/bG0BfBbouTI/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/bG0BfBbouTI?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Boeing X-37, also\nknown as the Orbital Test Vehicle (OTV), is a reusable unmanned spacecraft. It\nis boosted into space by a launch vehicle, then re-enters Earth's atmosphere\nand lands as a spaceplane.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The primary objectives of the X-37B are twofold:\nreusable spacecraft technology, and operating experiments which can be returned\nto Earth.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">X-37B was being used to spy on China's\nTiangong-1 space station module.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A miniature space plane one-fourth the length\nof the U.S. Space Shuttle, the X-37B launches atop an Atlas V rocket and lands\nlike an aircraft. The X-37B is only the second space plane \u2014 after the Russian\nBuran, which orbited the Earth once on November 15, 1988 \u2014 to perform an\nautomated landing.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It also holds the duration record for a space plane in\norbit, having spent nearly 675 days in space during OTV-3.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Y7qgZKh5X0U/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Y7qgZKh5X0U?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Russia has a secret satellite\nthat can chase down other satellites , eavesdrop, hijack them and steal their\ndesigns , repair/ refuel other spacecraft . , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">1.<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;; font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype\n id=\"_x0000_t75\" coordsize=\"21600,21600\" o:spt=\"75\" o:preferrelative=\"t\"\n path=\"m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe\" filled=\"f\" stroked=\"f\">\n <v:stroke joinstyle=\"miter\"/>\n <v:formulas>\n  <v:f eqn=\"if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"sum @0 1 0\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"sum 0 0 @1\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"prod @2 1 2\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"prod @3 21600 pixelWidth\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"prod @3 21600 pixelHeight\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"sum @0 0 1\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"prod @6 1 2\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"prod @7 21600 pixelWidth\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"sum @8 21600 0\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"prod @7 21600 pixelHeight\"/>\n  <v:f eqn=\"sum @10 21600 0\"/>\n </v:formulas>\n <v:path o:extrusionok=\"f\" gradientshapeok=\"t\" o:connecttype=\"rect\"/>\n <o:lock v:ext=\"edit\" aspectratio=\"t\"/>\n</v:shapetype><v:shape id=\"Picture_x0020_1\" o:spid=\"_x0000_i1025\" type=\"#_x0000_t75\"\n alt=\"Description: http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1TmA2Q8dmoI/UwiDv2Fb3eI/AAAAAAAApp4/Gfi3eJL51UI/s35/*\"\n style='width:26.25pt;height:26.25pt;visibility:visible;mso-wrap-style:square'>\n <v:imagedata src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image001.jpg\"\n  o:title=\"*\"/>\n</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img alt=\"Description: http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-1TmA2Q8dmoI/UwiDv2Fb3eI/AAAAAAAApp4/Gfi3eJL51UI/s35/*\" border=\"0\" height=\"35\" src=\"file:///C:\\Users\\win7\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\msohtmlclip1\\01\\clip_image001.jpg\" v:shapes=\"Picture_x0020_1\" width=\"35\" /><!--[endif]--></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #EEEEEE; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\"><span style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit\nVadakayil</span></a></span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/11/world-war-3-sans-gps-emp-taken-out.html?showComment=1447306426564#c9213197520419625403\"><span style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">November 12,\n2015 at 11:03 AM</span></a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #EEEEEE; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">hi rs,<br />\n<br />\nThe PNP and NPN transistors allow current amplification. These transistors are\nused as switches, amplifiers or oscillators. In PNP transistors, majority\ncharge carriers are holes, whereas in NPN transistors, electrons are the\nmajority charge carriers.<br />\n<br />\nThe main difference between the NPN and PNP transistor is, an NPN transistor\nturns on when the current flows through the base of the transistor. In this\ntype of transistor, the current flows from the collector (C) to the emitter\n(E).<br />\n<br />\nA PNP transistor turns ON, when there is no current at the base of the\ntransistor. In this transistor, the current flows from the emitter (E) to the\ncollector (C).Thus, knowing this, a PNP transistor turns ON by a low signal (ground),\nwhere NPN transistor turns ON by a high signal (current).<br />\n<br />\nThe working of PNP transistor is the exact opposite to the NPN transistor. The\nmaterials which are used to construct the emitter, base and collector terminals\nin the PNP transistor are different from those used in the NPN transistor NPN\ntransistors are generally used in circuits for switching, amplifying the\nelectrical signals that pass through them.<br />\n<br />\nThe application of an NPN transistor is on a computer circuit board. Computers\nneed all their information to be translated into binary code, and this process\nis accomplished through a plethora of small switches flipping on and off on the\ncomputers circuit boards.<br />\n<br />\nNPN transistors can be used for these switches. A powerful electric signal turns\nthe switch on, whereas a lack of a signal turns the switch off.<br />\n<br />\nIn an NPN transistor, the current flows from the collector (C) to the Emitter\n(E), whereas in a PNP transistor, the current flows from the emitter to the\ncollector. In an NPN transistor, a positive voltage is given to the collector\nterminal to produce a current flow from the collector to<br />\n<br />\nFor PNP transistor, a positive voltage is given to the emitter terminal to\nproduce current flow from the emitter to collector.<br />\n<br />\nThe working principle of an NPN transistor is such that when you increase\ncurrent to the base terminal, then the transistor turns ON and it conducts\nfully from the collector to emitter. When you decrease the current to the base\nterminal, the transistor turns ON less and until the current is so low, the\ntransistor no longer conducts across the collector to emitter, and shuts OFF.<br />\n<br />\nThe working principle of a PNP transistor is such that when the current exists\nat the base terminal of the transistor, then the transistor shuts OFF. When\nthere is not current at the base terminal of the PNP transistor, then the\ntransistor turns ON.<br />\n<br />\n36 years ago for my mate\u2019s exam ( 3 striper ) we had to pass a two hour exam on\nelectronics. I was walking in a street in Mumbai, I saw a footpath seller\nselling the book below. It was a pirated edition costing a few rupees.<br />\n<br />\nI bought it and was so happy. i skipped all the way back to seamen's club.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.amazon.com/Electronics-Made-Simple-Henry-Jacobowitz/dp/0385012276#<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2 -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #EEEEEE; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-bottom: 12.0pt; margin-left: 63.0pt; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; text-indent: 0in;\">\n<!--[if !supportLists]--><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">2.<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;; font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #EEEEEE; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\"><span style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit\nVadakayil</span></a></span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/11/world-war-3-sans-gps-emp-taken-out.html?showComment=1447306504597#c9115844367658496960\"><span style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">November 12,\n2015 at 11:05 AM</span></a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #EEEEEE; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt; margin-left: 99.0pt; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nSame way for my masters exam ( 4 stripers ) I saw a MERRIFIELD book on the\nfootpath on magnetism. I bought it for a few rupees. I HOPPED all the way to\nsemen\u2019s club .<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.amazon.com/Ship-Magnetism-Magnetic-Compass-International/dp/0080097693<br />\n<br />\nThe nautical college was teaching using another book by KEMP AND YOUNG . I did\nNOT attend college , and all my friends told me I will fail\u2014as the magnetism\npaper was corrected by Capt Joseph ( an EXTRA MASTER from Kerala ) , who taught\nby Kemp and Young method. I MAXED magnetism exams . I was the only guy to\nfollow Merrifield . .<br />\n<br />\nMy basics were so strong that I compensated compasses on the ships I commanded\nfor 3 decades. It costs MINIMUM 5000 USD to ask for a professional\nadjuster\u2014which every captain does. A professional compass adjuster is allowed\nby all companies.<br />\n<br />\nI remember I took over command on a ship at France and a compass adjuster came\non board. I asked him\u2014can you do a proper job with this high magnetic variation\n? He said he can . So I told him, I am the new captain and I am a better\ncompass adjuster than you\u2014I just took over command 10 minutes ago\u2014please get\noff my ship ,and claim transport or breach of contract from the company.<br />\n<br />\nINDEED SATELLITES MADE BY NASA FOR JUNK RETRIEVAL WERE USES TO FISH FOR VIMANA\nSPACE JUNK. THEY WILL NEVER ADMIT IT. BUT WHISTLE BLOWERS HAVE TOLD THE TRUTH.<br />\nThere is still one 13,000 year old Vimana ( BLACK KNIGHT ) \u2013or maybe they have already\ncaptured it .<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When WW3 strikes , the\nfirst nation to knock out all the other communication and reconnaissance\nsatellites will obviously have a WINNING advantage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With cyber-warfare, the\nintegrity of a satellites software could be comprised and information could be\nplaced in the hands of an opposing country.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proving this point, both the\nNational Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) and the National Oceanic and\nAtmospheric Administration (NOAA) have had satellites hacked by the Chinese. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They could NOT hide this secret.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are two main reasons why a GPS system might fail: spoofing and jamming. Spoofing can trick the GPS system into showing a false location.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zvIceLk375U/Vj-bqZ2bkDI/AAAAAAABBwM/7Qcffl0rjOM/s1600/drone-hacked-with-spoofing.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zvIceLk375U/Vj-bqZ2bkDI/AAAAAAABBwM/7Qcffl0rjOM/s640/drone-hacked-with-spoofing.jpg\" width=\"586\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is especially dangerous with bombs, unmanned aircraft and missiles that use GPS for guidance.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-M1C95ODf9CY/Vj-bGjEQTvI/AAAAAAABBv8/YN1m2-PtxDY/s1600/do4wnlorad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"275\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-M1C95ODf9CY/Vj-bGjEQTvI/AAAAAAABBv8/YN1m2-PtxDY/s400/do4wnlorad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Enemies on the ground can also jam signals from the satellite, while more technologically-advanced foes can fire kamikaze space vehicles that could disable a satellite at a critical moment.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-XC-xDTdNG8s/Vj-bYBtvtwI/AAAAAAABBwE/LhHILUSgL8Y/s1600/sat1012-toc-50001.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"428\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-XC-xDTdNG8s/Vj-bYBtvtwI/AAAAAAABBwE/LhHILUSgL8Y/s640/sat1012-toc-50001.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Below:&nbsp; A GPS spoofing attack attempts to deceive a\nGPS receiver by broadcasting counterfeit GPS signals, structured to resemble a\nset of normal GPS signals, or by rebroadcasting genuine signals captured\nelsewhere or at a different time.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/PBQk9Jdk0f8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/PBQk9Jdk0f8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">SPOOFING IS NO BIG DEAL--EVEN AN ELECTRONICS UNDERGRADUATE CAN DO IT-- DOES OUR </span><span style=\"background-color: blue;\"><span style=\"color: yellow;\">KOTA TUTORIAL PACKED IIT </span></span><span style=\"color: red;\">HAVE THE BRAIN POWER ?</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/6qQXVUze8oE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/6qQXVUze8oE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unmanned aerial\nvehicles MUST have inertial navigation backup systems in case they lose contact\nwith ground controllers.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An inertial navigation\nsystem (INS) is a navigation aid that uses a computer, motion sensors\n(accelerometers) and rotation sensors (gyroscopes) to continuously calculate\nvia dead reckoning the position, orientation, and velocity (direction and speed\nof movement) of a moving object without the need for external references<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Below: &nbsp;Spoof proof drone !</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/rmN02QIqsRs/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/rmN02QIqsRs?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">VISHNU NABHI SHOWS PRECESSION &nbsp;--ALL LIFTED FROM VEDAS</b></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/1fWl2LNpcak/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/1fWl2LNpcak?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ekzwbt3hu2k/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/ekzwbt3hu2k?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">Optical Digital Scene\nMatching Area Correlation (DSMAC) system - to double check spoofing !</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/yqFfmwVufMo/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/yqFfmwVufMo?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inertial navigation\nsystem on a drone ( spoof proof ) needs sensors such as accelerometers,\ngyroscopes, &nbsp;and Inertial measurement\nunits,&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;IMUs. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;These small components are embedded into drone\nto generate information about the different mechanical phenomenon such as\nacceleration, vibration, tilt, orientation in space, angular velocity, pitch or\nrotation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The accelerometer\nsensor is designed to measure the acceleration and tilt, the gyroscopic sensor\nmeasures the angular velocity and orientation.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>PRECESSION IS ADDRESSED VERY CLEARLY IN OUR 7000 YEAR OLD VEDAS -- THE WHITE MAN PATENTED IT&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_17.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_17.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/NeXIV-wMVUk/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/NeXIV-wMVUk?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/GeyDf4ooPdo/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/GeyDf4ooPdo?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The IMU sensor is designed to\ncombine the features of an accelerometer and gyroscope in order to display\ncomplete information about the acceleration, position, orientation, speed, etc.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/8IYkisyOZvs/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/8IYkisyOZvs?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The IMU or Inertial\nMeasurement Unit is a sensor that hosts two types of sensors. An IMU sensor can\nbe used to replace an accelerometer or gyro sensor, but first you should set\nthe tolerance for errors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/6ijArKE8vKU/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/6ijArKE8vKU?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The accelerometer\nsensor measure acceleration in two different units including meters per second\nsquared, or when the acceleration felt like a weight, in G-forces. Inside this\ntiny sensor is a small system that bends when a momentum or gravity force is\napplied. The amount of bend has a proportional value of the output signal.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/SWmlimH7laY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/SWmlimH7laY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>#################################</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>AIIYYYYOOOOOOO !</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>MALCOLM BOWDEN SAAB ,&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>TUM KYA BOLTHA HAI MAAAN ?</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DIGRESSION MAANGTA HAI ABHI-</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/06/heliocentricity-versus-geocentricity.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/06/heliocentricity-versus-geocentricity.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-bottom: 12.0pt; margin-left: 1.0in; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in; text-indent: 0in;\">\n<!--[if !supportLists]--><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">1.<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;; font-size: 7pt; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\n</span></span><!--[endif]--><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/11495527904246265068\"><span style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Eric Dubay</span></a></span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/06/heliocentricity-versus-geocentricity.html?showComment=1340016916072#c7153022030908141923\"><span style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">June 18, 2012 at\n4:25 PM</span></a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-attachment: initial; background-clip: initial; background-image: initial; background-origin: initial; background-position: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-size: initial; line-height: 16.8pt; margin: 0in 0in 6pt 1in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">Interesting perspective Capt., thanks for\nsharing. As for your objections to the stationary Earth and Geocentricism, I've\naddressed the Coriolis effect and Foucalt's pendulum in the comments sections:</span><br />\n<br />\n<a href=\"http://www.atlanteanconspiracy.com/2011/11/earth-is-not-moving.html\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\"><span style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">The Earth is Not\nMoving</span></a><br />\n<br />\n<a href=\"http://www.atlanteanconspiracy.com/2011/12/geocentricity-vs-heliocentricity.html\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\"><span style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Geocentriciy vs.\nHeliocentricity</span></a><br />\n<br /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\nThe Coriolis effect just like Foucault's pendulum can be equally explained by\nthe rotating firmament or a rotating Earth. Regardless whether it is the Earth\nthat is rotating or the aether that is rotating, the same effect would be\nnoticed. No experiment however has ever shown the Earth to be moving, but the\nMichelson-Morley, Michelson-Gale, Airy, </span><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Sagnac</b><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">, and Kantor experiments all\nproved the existence and motion of the aether.</span><br />\n<br />\n<i style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\"Since Foucault\u2019s pendulum and the Coriolis effect are closely related,\nthey can be considered together. Foucault\u2019s pendulum, which was constructed in\nParis in 1851, was a pendulum consisting of a 200 foot long flexible wire on\nwhich a heavy iron weight was suspended so as to be free to oscillate in any\ndirection. It was found that the oscillating pendulum never retraced its path\nbut at each swing apparently deviated: if the experiment is conducted in the\nnorthern hemisphere it deviates to the right, and in the southern hemisphere it\nwill deviate to the left. The so-called \u201cCoriolis effect\u201d is similar: a shell\nfrom a long range gun, aimed at a target to the south of it, will land to the\nright of the target in the northern hemisphere and to the left in the southern\nhemisphere. Although the apparently obvious conclusion to be drawn from these\ntwo experiments is that the earth is rotating anticlockwise when observed from\na fixed point above the North Pole, on further examination the obviousness is\nseen to be an illusion. It is at first not easy to grasp the fact that\nFoucault\u2019s pendulum and the Coriolis effect only demonstrate relative motion\nand do not demonstrate which, if either, of the two objects is at rest, but\ncareful thought will show it to be true. All that the experiments show is that\nthere are forces which act on bodies in motion relative to each other, and that\neither the earth is rotating, or the inertial field of the \u201crest of the\nuniverse\u201d is rotating round the earth, or some combination of these movements\nis occurring. Certainly a rotating earth would account for the phenomenon\nequally well (in this case the fixed stars would be preventing the ether from\ngoing round the earth at the same speed as the latter rotated), but it does not\naccount for it better. The phenomenon cannot therefore logically be used to\nprove any one of the alternatives.\" -N. Martin Gwynne</i><br />\n<br /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\">\nTrying to use Foucault's pendulum as proof for heliocentricity really backfired\nwhen Maurice Allais repeatedly observed pendulums slowing their motion during\neclipses! This implies that either the \"rotating Earth\" decelerates\nduring eclipses or the firmament does. NASA doesn't want to concede the\nimplications so they continue to remain silent on the issue:</span><br />\n<br />\n<a href=\"http://mando2u2003.blogspot.com/2010/11/foucault-pendulum-eclipsed-by-allais.html\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\"><span style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Foucalt's\nPendulum Eclipsed by Alias Effect</span></a><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt; margin-left: 1.0in; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt; margin-left: 1.0in; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt; margin-left: 1.0in; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\"><span style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. text-decoration: none;\">June 18, 2012 at\n5:43 PM</span></a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background: #CCCCCC; line-height: 16.8pt; margin-bottom: 6.0pt; margin-left: 1.0in; margin-right: 0in; margin-top: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">hi eric<br />\n<br />\nsetting a Foucault's pendulam into motion is an art and this is best set up on\nthe earth's pole.<br />\n<br />\nthanks for your perspective.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Ring\nlasers are inertial rotation sensors using the Sagnac effect, which is the\nfrequency splitting of two counter-rotating laser beams due to rotation&nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The American GPS program\npresently consists of 32 American satellites that provide autonomous positioning\nwith global coverage, allowing receivers to determine their location to within\na few meters.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The satellites revolve\naround the earth at an altitude of 20,000 kilometers and each is fitted with an\natomic clock so they are all synchronized to the same time. Each satellite\ncompletes one orbit roughly every 12 hours.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No military can take\nthe GPS for granted even in the first 3 hours of WW3.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indian Regional\nNavigation Satellite System (IRNSS) is an autonomous regional satellite\nnavigation system being developed by the Indian Space Research Organisation\n(ISRO) which would be under complete control of the Indian government.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Duringg Kargil\noperations Indian military depending on American GPS during the Kargil War\u2014and it\nwas denied to us.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-AuzKqmhGNUk/Vj-ocJ_GMEI/AAAAAAABBwc/ix7cyUKkzI4/s1600/4_img1910145001353.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-AuzKqmhGNUk/Vj-ocJ_GMEI/AAAAAAABBwc/ix7cyUKkzI4/s400/4_img1910145001353.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IRNSS would have seven\nsatellites,-and is expected to operate from 2016 onwards.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IRNSS-1E will be the\nfifth out of seven in the Indian Regional Navigation Satellite System series of\nsatellites system. Its launch is planned in January 2016.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IRNSS-1F will be the\nsixth -its launch is planned in February 2016.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IRNSS-1G will be the\nseventh and last of the Indian Regional Navigation Satellite System series of\nsatellites. Its launch is planned in March 2016.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every GPS navigation system\nof a military vehicle or drone MUST have a inertial backup that is connected to\nthe GPS at all times. So long as satellite signals are received, the computer\ncarries out a comparison between the precise data input and the data received\nfrom the INS. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the satellite\nsystem goes beyond GPS reception, the inertial navigation systems know their\nexact start position, and the correction that they require from this point and\nonwards. This stems from the knowledge gained by the previous comparison\nbetween the INS data to the GPS system, up to the loss of the signal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Same way when the GPS\nclock goes PHUTT there must be a atomic clock backup.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Atomic clocks calculate\ntime with near absolute precision, as they follow the movement of atomic\nparticles, just as \u201ctraditional\u201d clocks follow the movement of a pendulum.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nimportance of absolute precision of time when discussing a navigation system\ninstalled on an armament, moving at tremendous speed, is exemplified by the\nfact that a three nanosecond deviation could equal a one meter deviation from\nthe target.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Like how China is doing\nit, India must also work on a UNHACKABLE&nbsp;\nQUANTUM COMMUNICATIONS&nbsp; NETWORK\nwith secure encryption technology.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/2Ima5Lqzftk/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/2Ima5Lqzftk?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capable of easily\ncracking encryptions that would be impossible with the average classical\ncomputer, a quantum computer will not only revolutionize computing speed but\nalso render most common-day encryption methods obsolete. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By modifying a standard\nsilicon transistor - the backbone of all modern-day electronic devices - the\nscientists have performed the world's first calculation with what are called quantum\nbits, instead of classical bits, with a silicon-based material.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/GqaVZXqZXI0/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/GqaVZXqZXI0?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Quantum bits are the\ncoded language by which quantum computers would speak to one another and\ntransmit and store information.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Right now they use\nSilicon.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The future will be WATER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/WXKJ-oUq6F8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/WXKJ-oUq6F8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These three basic\nprinciples of physics include the superposition of quantum states (adding\n\u201cboth\u201d to zero and one for the possible values of a qubit), quantum tunneling\n(where information can move from one qubit to another without having to be\nanywhere in between), and quantum entanglement (where what happens to one qubit\ncan affect another, even when they\u2019re in different places).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Programming a quantum\ncomputer means using quantum entanglement to configure the affinity between\nneighboring qubits. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/quantum-entanglement-video-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/quantum-entanglement-video-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FeoBq9L-Z50/VkDndEDT9pI/AAAAAAABBxU/F9nMSSNWoO0/s1600/imE4ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FeoBq9L-Z50/VkDndEDT9pI/AAAAAAABBxU/F9nMSSNWoO0/s320/imE4ages.jpg\" width=\"316\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then the computer\nsolves for the minimum energy value across multiple qubits using quantum\ntunneling. This lowest-energy value represents the best answer to whatever\ncomplex problem the programmer wanted to solve.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-n8wV6j-yzBw/VkDntehxY1I/AAAAAAABBxc/8uIflS628Eg/s1600/cg5jE5r.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"224\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-n8wV6j-yzBw/VkDntehxY1I/AAAAAAABBxc/8uIflS628Eg/s400/cg5jE5r.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The reason these\nquantum principles appear so alien to us is because matter never behaves\naccording to these principles at the temperatures we\u2019re familiar with. Instead,\nquantum computing must take place near absolute zero temperatures, even colder\nthan interstellar space.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">DO YOU THINK BR AMBEDKAR, &nbsp;EVR PERIYAR, MAHATMA PHULE, &nbsp;SQUEAK ILAIAH , ANANTHAMURTY, &nbsp;DHABOLKAR, &nbsp; PANSARE, &nbsp;KALBURGI AND THEIR ILK HAVE THE BRAINS TO UNDERSTAND ALL THIS? &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">ALL THEY KNOW IS THAT 7000 YEAR OLD VEDAS CONTAIN SHIT, RIGHT ?.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">DID I NOT SAY 5 YEARS AGO THAT VEDANTA WILL HAVE THE LAST LAUGH ?</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/-kTDmsNumVE/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/-kTDmsNumVE?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A quantum bit, or\nqubit, has two awesome and confusing properties. First, it can set itself to\nboth 0 and 1 at the same time.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/CC_XES4xQD4/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/CC_XES4xQD4?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And second, it can commune (or entangle) with\nother qubits to compound this ability. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-9XYzeTRxKT8/VkDpFzlEqCI/AAAAAAABBxo/J7qscQZBF7M/s1600/im3RaTges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-9XYzeTRxKT8/VkDpFzlEqCI/AAAAAAABBxo/J7qscQZBF7M/s400/im3RaTges.jpg\" width=\"398\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This means five\nentangled qubits can store and process as much information as 32 (two to the\npower of five) classical bits; 10 qubits can do as much as 1,000 classical\nbits; and 300 fully entangled qubits can manipulate as many classical bits of\ninformation as there are atoms in the Universe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HQtkZzl00zk/VkDnPiovi2I/AAAAAAABBxM/u5wicq_7Hxo/s1600/im234ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-HQtkZzl00zk/VkDnPiovi2I/AAAAAAABBxM/u5wicq_7Hxo/s640/im234ages.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHO IS HAVING THE LAST\nLAUGH?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN I WROTE ALL THESE\nPOSTS , ABOUT VEDANTA, MY DETRACTORS FELL OFF THEIR CHAIRS, LAUGHING !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2019/03/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_8.html?showComment=1552203475174#c4365609227674292015\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">March 10, 2019 at 1:07 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://edition.cnn.com/2019/03/08/americas/venezuela-blackout-power-intl/index.html<br /><br />MADURO DOES NOT KNOW THAT THE KOSHER DEEP STATE HAS DONE A CYBER ATTACK ON VENEZUELAs POWER SOURCES ( INJECTING MALWARE )..<br /><br />ATTACKING POWER SOURCE CAN INFLUENCE PUBLIC OPINION, IF NOT RECTIFIED FAST..<br /><br />ALL NEW ELECTRIC GRIDS CONSTRUCTED IN INDIA MUST HAVE A \"RISK ASSESSMENT \" FORM SIGNED BY THE TOP BOSSES IN BLACK AND WHITE..<br /><br />IT MUST HAVE A SECTION -- THAT THE GRID IS SAFE ( BUFFERED ) AGAINST CYBER / EMP ATTACK IN WAR WITH PAKISTAN / CHINA ..<br /><br />THE SOLAR POWERED ELECTRIC GRID MUST NOT BE INTEGRATED WITH FUEL POWERED ELECTRIC GRID..<br /><br />As the national power grid becomes increasingly dependent on computers and data sharing\u2014providing significant benefits for utilities, customers, and communities\u2014it has also become more vulnerable to both physical and cyber threats.<br /><br />Russia has infiltrated the U.S. electrical grid and left behind software programs that could be used to disrupt the system-- ANYTIME !<br /><br />If all machines synchronized to a system have the same droop speed control, they will share load proportionate to the machine ratings..<br /><br />The thousands of AC generators are running synchronously with the power grid which acts like an infinite sink.<br /><br />Next to the inertia given by the parallel operation of synchronous generators the frequency speed droop is the primary instantaneous parameter in control of an individual power plant's power output (KW)..<br /><br />In a synchronous grid all the generators must run at the same frequency, and must stay very nearly in phase with each other and the grid.<br /><br />For rotating generators, a local governor regulates the driving torque, maintaining constant speed as loading changes. Droop speed control ensures that multiple parallel generators share load changes in proportion to their rating.<br /><br />When the grid is heavily loaded, the frequency slows, and governors adjust their generators so that more power is output (droop speed control).<br /><br />READ ALL 4 PARTS OF THE POST BELOW--<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/11/world-war-3-sans-gps-and-emp-taken-out.html<br /><br />In the power grid, you have to be able to identify what the voltage and the current are at specific, highly precise points in time..<br /><br />Making these precise, high-resolution measurements anywhere in the grid is possible through the use of phase measurement units (PMUs) \u2014 devices that are aligned with the atomic clocks used in GPS. But they are vulnerable to GPS spoofing attacks.<br /><br />The attack could be as simple as someone taking a GPS jammer to a remote power-distribution station and tricking the system into providing false measurements, leading to a cascade effect as false readings ripple through the system and incorrect actions are taken.<br /><br />In 2018 Kosovo used more power than it generated due to a row with Serbia, leading to the phase in the whole Synchronous grid of Continental Europe lagging behind what it should have been. The frequency dropped to 49.996 Hz. This caused certain kinds of clocks to become six minutes slow.<br /><br />WE ASK THE MODI GOVT -- WHY DO WE CHURN OUT ELECTRICAL GRADUATES WHO CANT READ A CIRCUIT DIAGRAM ?<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/marine-engineering-self-examiner.html<br /><br />capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THIS POST IS CONTINUED TO PART 2</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/world-war-3-sans-gps-emp-taken-out.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/world-war-3-sans-gps-emp-taken-out.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SGCaHw8bjaQ/Vj4gbMUU-vI/AAAAAAABBsI/cko11WpeHPQ/s1600/downlouuooad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-SGCaHw8bjaQ/Vj4gbMUU-vI/AAAAAAABBsI/cko11WpeHPQ/s1600/downlouuooad.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</span></b><br />\n..</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt.
