line-height: 150%;\">The statins &nbsp;include:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Altoprev (lovastatin\nextended-release)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Crestor (rosuvastatin)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lescol (fluvastatin)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lipitor (atorvastatin)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Livalo (pitavastatin)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mevacor (lovastatin)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pravachol (pravastatin)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Zocor (simvastatin).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Products containing\nstatins in combination with other drugs include:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Advicor\n(lovastatin/niacin extended-release)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Simcor\n(simvastatin/niacin extended-release)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vytorin\n(simvastatin/ezetimibe).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Statins often &nbsp;interact with other medications you take.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In India ROZAVIL brand is\nusually seen everywhere.&nbsp; &nbsp;Due to the potential of disrupting the\ninfant's lipid metabolism, patients should not breast feed while on\nrosuvastatin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rosuvastatin has\nstructural similarities with most other synthetic statins, e.g., atorvastatin,\ncerivastatin and pitavastatin, but unlike other statins rosuvastatin contains\nsulfur.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Crestor is rosuvastatin\ncalcium, in which calcium replaces the hydrogen in the carboxylic acid group on\nthe right of the two structure diagrams.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ZvP1cR5p-p4/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZvP1cR5p-p4?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">QUOTE:&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">Watch for drug interactions<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">Statins can have several potentially\ndangerous interactions with other medications and some foods. These\ninteractions can make it more likely you'll have statin side effects. These\ninclude:<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">All statins and grapefruit or grapefruit\njuice. Grapefruit juice contains a chemical that can interfere with the enzymes\nthat break down (metabolize) the statins in your digestive system. This can be\ndangerous because it's uncertain what the effect would be on your total\ncholesterol. You should still be able to have some grapefruit or grapefruit\njuice, but talk to your doctor about limiting how much grapefruit you can have.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">Lovastatin (Mevacor, Altoprev) or simvastatin\n(Zocor) and amiodarone (Cordarone). People taking the statins lovastatin or\nsimvastatin, either alone or in combination with amiodarone (Cordarone), a\nmedication for irregular heart rhythms, are at a greater risk of severe statin\nside effects, such as rhabdomyolysis.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">All statins and gemfibrozil (Lopid). People\nwho take both gemfibrozil (Lopid) and a statin may be at a greater risk of\nstatin side effects.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">Mevacor (lovastatin) and HIV drugs. Medicines\nused to treat HIV (protease inhibitors) should never be taken with Mevacor.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">All statins and some antibiotic and\nantifungal medications. If you have a fungal or bacterial infection, be sure to\ntell your doctor if you take a statin.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">All statins and some antidepressant\nmedications. It's possible that taking antidepressants, such as nefazodone, and\na statin could make you more likely to have muscle aches.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">All statins and some immunosuppressant\nmedications. If you take a medication to suppress your immune system, such as\ncyclosporine (Sandimmune), and a statin, you may be more likely to have muscle\naches.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\">UNQUOTE&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/QSAfC3InaNw/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/QSAfC3InaNw?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%; mso-ascii-theme-font: major-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: major-latin;\"><span style=\"color: magenta;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Below: &nbsp;For postmenopausal women, STATINS increase the\nrisk of diabetes increases by a WHOPPING &nbsp;71 % .&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/WWuUseZoceQ/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/WWuUseZoceQ?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Drink milk only of\nHUMPED grass eating cows which give A2 nutritious milk. Shun like posion A1\ntoxic milk of HUMPLESS factory farm / diary fed western cows force fed on grain\nmushes made from corn and soybean straight from the large Roundup glyphosate\nsoaked fields of GMO corn and soy. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Even\nuntainted grains are not part of a normal bovine diet. &nbsp;&nbsp;These cows are &nbsp;injected with antibiotics and growth hormones\nfor dairy and meat products.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Never buy processed\nfood with long shelf life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The major fatty acid in\nvirgin coconut oil is lauric acid. Lauric acid is a medium chain fatty acid\n(MCFA) that is easily converted by the liver to produce ketones, which the\nbody\u2019s cells can easily utilize for energy even in lieu of oxygen.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Long chain\nfatty acids from most other saturated fats tend to be not easily converted into\ncellular energy, leaving some to be stored as fat for future energy needs.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Coconut oil\u2019s lauric acid MCFA or MCT (medium chain triglycerides) allows the\nliver to easily convert the fatty acids into ketones. Ketones are able to be\nused by the body\u2019s cells for&nbsp; energetic\nmetabolic needs despite glucose/insulin issues.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Alzheimer\u2019s\nis actually Type 3 Diabetes , because of insulin\u2019s inability to usher glucose\ninto brain cells.&nbsp;</span></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">But those ketones from MCT virgin coconut oil metabolism can\nsubstitute for glucose, and enabling glucose deprived brain cells to thrive.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></b></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ironically, high\nhealthy fat diets ( VIRGIN COCONUT OIL ) &nbsp;curb obesity and &nbsp;reduce body fat to contribute toward weight\nloss. &nbsp;&nbsp;This ultimately reduces the risk\nand possibly reverses of diabetes 2. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Healthy\nfats are mostly converted to energy without creating and storing excess fatty\ntissue in the body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cholesterol found\nin your blood comes from two sources: cholesterol in food that you eat and\ncholesterol that your liver makes from other nutrients.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HUMAN BODY IS A\nWONDERFUL THING .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The amount of\ncholesterol that your liver produces varies according to how much cholesterol\nyou eat. If you eat a lot of cholesterol, your liver produces less. If you\ndon\u2019t eat much cholesterol, your liver produces more.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why a low\ncholesterol diet does not typically decrease a person\u2019s blood cholesterol by\nmore than a few percent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oxidation is the main\nculprit of your cholesterol problem.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Avoid meats and other\nanimal products such as dairy and eggs sourced from animals raised in confined\nanimal feeding operations (CAFOs).&nbsp; &nbsp;Instead, opt for grass-fed, pastured\nvarieties, raised according to organic standards.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NEVER MIND WHAT YOUR\nCHOOT DOCTOR SAYS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eliminate no-fat and\nlow-fat foods, and increase consumption of healthy fats like desi Ghee and\nVirgin coconut oil.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Half of the population suffers with insulin\nresistance and would benefit from consuming A2 MILK, VIRGIN COCONUT OIL and\nDESI &nbsp;GHEE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obesity, heart disease,\nhypertension and stroke are inversely related to sunlight exposure and vitamin\nD levels. Psoriasis, eczema, and periodontal disease are lessened by sunlight\nexposure and high serum vitamin D.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fertility is positively influenced by\nsunlight exposure and high vitamin D levels.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Low level of vitamin D\nincreases the risk of calcium build-up in atherosclerotic plaques, and that\nhigher levels reduce the risk of build up - See Poor vitamin D status has been\nlinked to increase risk of breast, prostate and colon cancers, osteoporosis and\nother bone disorders, Type 1 diabetes, arthritis, infertility, PMS, chronic\nfatigue and depression, Seasonal Affective Disorder, multiple sclerosis,\nmusculoskeletal pain, and heart disease.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ironically, the few foods that contain\nvitamin D are mostly items that have fallen out of favour thanks to orthodoxy\u2019s\nfanatical anti-fat and cholesterol campaign, such as cod liver oil, butter,\nwhole milk, liver and egg yolks&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Men who are deficient in vitamin D were found\nto have more than double the normal risk of suffering a heart attack or dying\neven after all other possible risk factors such as hypertension, obesity and\nhigh levels of blood fat were excluded.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Populations in northern countries (with\nless intense sunlight and lower levels of vitamin D) have higher numbers of\nheart disease than sun-filled southern countries.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In addition, more heart\nattacks occur in the winter months, when sunlight is scarce.. Without that\nvitamin D, we increase our risk for nearly all age-related diseases including\nmany types of cancer, high blood pressure, diabetes and even autoimmune\ndiseases like MS (multiple sclerosis).</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Insufficient vitamin D markedly\naccelerates heart disease in kidney patients. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do NOT deprive your\nchildren of cholesterol , if you want them to get good grades in school.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It help them &nbsp;in the formation of their memories and is\nvital for their neurological function. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">November 3, 2015 at 11:03 PM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;georgia&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Sirjee,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;georgia&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">foam on this lake is nothing new. i grew up on the shores of\nthis lake. our greatest joy as kids was just playing and spending time around\nthe serene water body. even 25 years ago we used to see foam regularly in small\nquantities. on rare occasions the foam would build up and wind blowing from the\nwest would lash foam and waves on to the shore. sometimes the foam would turn\nblack/brown.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;georgia&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">this is understandable as the lake became an effluent\ndischarge body long ago.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;georgia&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">the problem has become unbearable now because of foolish\nurbanization. not only industrial waste but untreated human waste is directly\ngetting in to the lake from the vast apartments communities around.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;georgia&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">believe it or not there were fishermen in our village who\nmade a living (albeit poor ) from the lake. aquatic birds used to live in the\nreeds. my friends have eaten the eggs of these birds when they went to bring\nfodder for their cows from the lake (hyacinth leaves and some reed grass etc)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>THE FOAM ON WATER IS PRIMARILY DUE TO PHOSPHATES ( PHOSPHORUS )</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zSCCJtoruEY/VjkUmmY5pFI/AAAAAAABBkM/EEFyUx8ykZ8/s1600/2e0776ee-ba0e-40e4-8c1d-58E345d7c64a03a6-1020x683.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Since ancient times\nHindus have surcharges all the lakes in India with an annual load of PHOSLOCK (\nphosphorus locking bentonite clay ) in the form of huge Ganesha clay idols .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-xAuROboc738/Vjj7yqLeRVI/AAAAAAABBjc/WWU4uIjQ3cw/s1600/eco%2Bganfdqrr4thjfesh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-xAuROboc738/Vjj7yqLeRVI/AAAAAAABBjc/WWU4uIjQ3cw/s640/eco%2Bganfdqrr4thjfesh.jpg\" width=\"426\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">What is this clay?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1rjmroft2uw/Vjj73dE12kI/AAAAAAABBjk/07eGF0JVCno/s1600/prott875er-8.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-1rjmroft2uw/Vjj73dE12kI/AAAAAAABBjk/07eGF0JVCno/s640/prott875er-8.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">At Kumbh Mela Naga\nsadhus wear nothing other than this clay \u2013called Multani mitti. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">As per 6000 year old\nAyurveda , it has absorbing properties and can be used as an exfoliant as it\ndraws out impurities from the skin .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GQxUpNqKZuE/VjmNkCt43bI/AAAAAAABBmg/xrhFCF5yyzs/s1600/setu-bRandha.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"452\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-GQxUpNqKZuE/VjmNkCt43bI/AAAAAAABBmg/xrhFCF5yyzs/s640/setu-bRandha.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">This coat of clay is part of their contribution to the water they will bathe- &nbsp;like the squirrels of Ramayana who helped build the bridge to Lanka &nbsp;.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-T3daoIy0GVQ/Vjj7-HV_76I/AAAAAAABBjs/Ad3gqYaI8IU/s1600/DtjSCF36htrh42.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-T3daoIy0GVQ/Vjj7-HV_76I/AAAAAAABBjs/Ad3gqYaI8IU/s640/DtjSCF36htrh42.JPG\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">GANESHA IDOLS IMMERSED\nIN LAKES AND RIVERS , ARE TRADITIONALLY MADE WITH BENTONITE CLAY FOR PHOSPHORUS\nLOCKING.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ganapati idols are to\nof Bentonite clay using biodegradable decorations, and organic paints , using\nNIL non-biodegradable plastic .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This\nannual surcharge of good quality clay is so very important for sustaining the\nlake level and also the quality of the water.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ever since EMINENT\nrationalists stopped Ganesha idol immersion the lakes have all vanished . The\nclay lining at bottom and side of the lake is paramount to prevent water loos.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Phosphorous, primarily\nin the form of phosphate, is not very soluble ( like nitrate in artificial\nfertilizers ) and is primarily transported by sediment in runoff, often ending\nup in lakes and rivers and streams.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We humans excrete (feces/\nurine ) more than 1.54 kilos of phosphorus annually.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Today phosphorus is\nused in foods and beverages.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Coke uses white Phosphoric acid.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Controlling phosphorous\ndischarged from municipal and industrial wastewater treatment plants is a key\nfactor in preventing eutrophication of surface waters<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Sodium bentonite\nexpands when wet, absorbing as much as several times its dry mass in\nwater.&nbsp; Because of its excellent\ncolloidal properties, it acts as a sealant, since it provides a self-sealing,\nlow permeability barrier.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It prevents water seepage in desert area lakes like Pushkar . &nbsp;Nowadays it is used to line the base of garbage landfills\u2014to prevent toxic\nliquid and heavy metal waste seeping into ground water and aquifers.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Phosphates are used\nindiscriminately by foreign multinationals( like Procter and Gamble ) &nbsp;in their detergents. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Without\ndeclaring the amount or percentage they include more phosphate in detergent in places like Bangalore\nwere borewell water yields only HARD WATER.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">So their detergents\nclean better , &nbsp;Indians buy more , soon\nthey monopolise , &nbsp;and they laugh all the\nway to the bank.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">But HEY, these rich western companies sell only\nPHOSPHATE FREE detergents in USA , Europe and developed countries\u2014since at\nleast 20 years.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The phosphate used in\nmost powdered detergents is sodium triphosphate, or STPP, and it's used to\nsoften hard water. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">But when it's\nintroduced to waterways, phosphorous can cause environmental damage, including\nalgae blooms, low oxygen levels , fish deaths\u2014and the foam you see . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There are atmospheric\nconditions which cause more foam on lakes like low atmospheric pressure, &nbsp;wind\nripple agitation, &nbsp;rain etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Most of the lakes in\nIndia are green in colour due to algae. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\">Phosphates consume large amounts of oxygen, in the lake literally killing all &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\">aquatic organisms and ecosystems.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">The Modi govt must introduce a law as soon as\npossible.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Give these multinational\ndetergent companies a dead line in writing , mentioning the INITIAL FINE and\nthe subsequent fine. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">After that make them\nclose shop in India.</b></span></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><b>Make these multinationals pay for restoration of our lakes. They had double&nbsp;standards.</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">People is Bangalore stuck\nwith hard borewell water may wonder, how the stains made by hard water on glass\nor stainless steel can be removed. &nbsp;Try a\nlittle dilute vinegar.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Local cottage industry\ndetergent manufacturers must be helped by the Govt to find an alternative to\nphosphates to reduce water harness and for better wash. Phosphates can be\nreplaced with zeolites (silicate minerals).</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Zeolites are\nmicroporous silicate minerals. They bind calcium, magnesium and other metals\npresent in the wash solution and soften the hardness of the wash water. This\nboosts the efficacy of the other cleaning ingredients and increases the\neffectiveness of the detergent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/z7DxqZhb94o/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/z7DxqZhb94o?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When used in automatic\ndishwashing detergents, phosphate helped to remove food and grease, reduce\nspotting and filming, control water hardness and suspend the bits of food so\nthey were not redistributed on the dishes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Too much phosphate in\nwater leads to total reduction of good aquatic life, poor taste and odors in\ndrinking water<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\">Detergent makers have been competeing with each other to overdose phosphorus . It binds with dirt and keeps it suspended in water, allowing the other cleaning agents to do their best work. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\">Phosphorus is more important in Bangalore where water is exceptionally hard and minerals like Calcium, magnesium etc &nbsp;can interfere with cleaning agents. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\">In the detergents, phosphates served as a \"builder\" to improve the detergent's cleaning efficiency. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\">Builders, such as STPP, are important to the cleaning process, as they help to remove dirt from the clothes and to minimize soap scum (often seen as a ring on the tub, washing machine, or shirt collars).&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\">Of the detergent builders, phosphates were the most popular, because of their CHEAPNESS and superior cleaning performance. Cheap at the expense of India\u2019s lakes.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: large; line-height: 37.3333px;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">These multinationals saved the Western lakes\u2014they did NOT care for India , despite excessive profits.&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Phosphate fertilizer is\nmanufactured from rock phosphate. Rock phosphate is mined and processed into\nphosphate fertilizer. India imports lot of it. &nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ships I commanded have brought this from Tampa\nto Kochi.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Avoid phosphate artificial&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\">fertilizers</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;near water bodies-&nbsp;&nbsp;use organic&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: 18.6667px; line-height: 37.3333px;\">fertilizers</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">.</b><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Today many companies\nworldwide manufacture lanthanum-modified bentonite clay (Phoslock) application\nto remove phosphorus from lake water.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Algae can be killed by any algecide\n.&nbsp; But phosphorus is like sugar in water\nand has to be locked and removed by any nano technology..&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Phoslock is a product designed for phosphate\nremoval from water.&nbsp; Its active component\nis lanthanum which reacts with phosphate forming an insoluble and biologically\ninert compound.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Its ability to bind\nphosphate makes it an effective tool in lake restoration. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">It is safe for natural\naquatic systems.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When used in lake\nrestoration, Phoslock is usually added to the lake as a slurry.&nbsp; As this sinks through the water column it\nbinds phosphate as it goes.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Once settled\non the sediment it can continue to bind phosphate released from the sediment,\nthus controlling one of the major blocks to lake restoration - sediment\nphosphorus release.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Phoslock can be used in\nlakes , ponds , dam reservoirs as well as other standing waters (e.g.\nreservoirs, fish hatcheries) where high phosphate levels are causing\nproblems.&nbsp; It is not usually applied to\nflowing waters.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Phoslock is comprised\nof 95% bentonite and 5% lanthanum.&nbsp; It is\nmanufactured through a controlled ion-exchange process whereby cations within\nthe bentonite are exchanged with lanthanum cations.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The result is that lanthanum held within the\nbentonite structure retains its ability to bind phosphate, but does not readily\ndissociate, i.e. will not form free ions in water.&nbsp; Phoslock works by utilizing the ability of\nlanthanum to react with phosphate.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Removal of phosphate by lanthanum is highly efficient and has a molar\nratio of 1:1 which means that one ion of lanthanum will bind with one ion of\nphosphate .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The product of the\nreaction is lanthanum phosphate (LaPO4).&nbsp;\nThe important point is that lanthanum phosphate is highly insoluble\nwhich means it won't dissolve, which in turn means it is not biologically\navailable.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This is the process by which\nphosphate (which is dissolved and therefore biologically available) is rendered\nnon-biologically available.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">One tonne of Phoslock\nis capable of removing 34 kg of phosphate (PO4) or 11 kg of phosphorus\n(P).&nbsp; Phosphate is an important food\nsource of algae (particularly blue green algae).&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">By removing phosphate from the water column\nand preventing its release from sediments, Phoslock essentially deprives algae\nof an important food source and the proliferation of algae, particularly blue\ngreen algae, is reduced.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Both nitrogen and phosphorus are\nimportant nutrients for algal growth, however the growth of blue green algae is\ngenerally not limited by the concentration of nitrogen as many species of blue\ngreen algae can fix and store nitrogen from the atmosphere.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;The proliferation of blue green algae in a\nwater body is related to the competitive advantage they have over other\nphytoplankton groups (such as diatoms and green algae) when excess phosphorus\nis available in the water.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The kinetic uptake of\nphosphate by Phoslock varies to some degree according to water chemistry,\nhowever in most situations, more than 90% of available phosphate is bound\nwithin three hours of an application of Phoslock.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Unlike other methods of\nbinding phosphate (such as iron and aluminium salts), an application of\nPhoslock will have no effect on either the pH or the conductivity of the water\nbody.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Following the\napplication of Phoslock to a water body, any phosphate that has reacted with\nthe lanthanum in the clay will remain permanently bound.&nbsp; Furthermore, any lanthanum sites in the clay\nmatrix that have not reacted with phosphate remain active and will continue to\nbind phosphate (from both external and internal sources) until saturated.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This means that an application of Phoslock\ncan be designed to achieve a sustained reduction in phosphate levels. Phoslock\nis the commercial name for a bentonite clay in which the sodium and/or calcium\nions are exchanged for lanthanum.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The addition of this element allows it to\nbind with phosphates to form rhabdophane and thereby remove them\nfrom the water column.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Phoslock permanently\nlocks phosphorus into an inert mineral that sinks to the bottom and becomes\npart of the pond's natural sediments.</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Any unreacted lanthanum\nremains imbedded in the bentonite granules, which settle to the bottom of the\npond, that will continue to bond and sequester phosphorus as it releases from\nthe sediments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Cottage industries must\nbe taught to replace phosphates from their products with non-phosphate\nalternatives, such as zeolite A, sodium carbonate, citrates, and sodium\nsilicate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">According to the New\nDelhi-based Centre for Science and Environment, of the 209 tanks in the city in\nthe 1970s, only 92 remained in 2010. &nbsp;&nbsp;At\nthis rate, they will all be lost by 2020. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the long run, the\nexcess algal growth can have devastating impacts on the health and age of a\nfresh water lake or river, causing eutrophication to speed up, where lakes and\nother water bodies fill in with dead algae and other organic matter and\neventually turn into dry land. &nbsp;Now you\nknow where our lakes disappeared.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Give the multinationals a SHOW CAUSE NOTICE- &nbsp; demanding a reason for applying double standards &nbsp;.</span></b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Our main stream media\nis pathetic. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Hey have NIL technical\nreporters.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They employ pea brained\njournalists , whose sample reports are--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i>\"Foam, fire, what\nnext? A Loch Ness monster?\" <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i>\u201cWe need to change\ncourse, but it\u2019s like trying to turn the Titanic around\u201d <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i>&nbsp;\u201cThere\u2019s an iceberg ahead, but the captain\nhasn\u2019t even seen it. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i>\u201cThat\u2019s the tragedy\nwith the fires. We\u2019re trying to explain that they\u2019re just the tip of the\niceberg.\u201d&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</i><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i><br /></i></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">SOS</span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"> CALL BY STUPID PEA BRAINED CHUTNEY MARY! TEEE HEEEEE !!</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/yLh9xO_ethY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/yLh9xO_ethY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">What have our IIT brains done to save these\nlakes ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-G-KOOjnjh-g/VjkUvCTG3HI/AAAAAAABBkU/76_Mk5yC7MA/s1600/im39ages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-G-KOOjnjh-g/VjkUvCTG3HI/AAAAAAABBkU/76_Mk5yC7MA/s400/im39ages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There is hardly anybody\non this planet who knows more than a Chemical tanker Captain about detergents,\nsurfactants , soap etc <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/08/tanker-lorries-carrying-liquids-in-bulk.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/08/tanker-lorries-carrying-liquids-in-bulk.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-GtCMFvTSW9k/VjkU6vB2k2I/AAAAAAABBkc/ovrmJ0eAd1E/s1600/ima47Fges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"256\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-GtCMFvTSW9k/VjkU6vB2k2I/AAAAAAABBkc/ovrmJ0eAd1E/s400/ima47Fges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"color: yellow; METHANE , A GREENHOUSE GAS , CATCHES FIRE &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-UbtnkGW4tvs/Vjnq8SDIN_I/AAAAAAABBnA/3vN1E77ehZs/s1600/RDbel.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
