font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No king can hold him back. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For the large hearted and virtuous liberated\nsage has separated himself from the mind.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He is just a witness of the mind.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Petty minds like Zakir Naik ,will NOT\nundertstand above.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He who cuts asunder the\nbondage of limitations, vileness of mind etc. attains the eternal bliss of\nsalvation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ultimate aim of\nmankind is moksha. A soul which has attained moksha lives blissfully in\nvaikuntha in a spiritual body in the presence of God.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\u201cThe one who renounces\nhis ego, who is liberated from arrogance, jealousy etc. , who performs actions\nwithout harboring likes/dislikes, is called a Jeevan \u2013 Mukta (liberated while\nyet alive) by wise men.\u201d</i>-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <b>Mahopanishad (2/50)5000 BC<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are two states of\nexistence associated with atman (sould) - the bound state and the liberated\nstate. In the bound state, atman is associated with a physical body.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As a\nresult of this association, atman is subject to Maya, which causes it to forget\nits true divine nature and commit evil deeds in the world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The powers of maya are\ntwo-fold.&nbsp; As cosmic ignorance, maya\ndeludes the atman into forgetting its own true nature.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As creative energy (shakti) of Brahman, maya\nis the material cause of the universe.&nbsp;\nIn the liberated state, atman is said to have attained moksha&nbsp; (spiritual perfection) and consequently\nenjoys union with God.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharma belongs to the\nuniverse and to the individual as well..&nbsp;\nAll things follow their allocated dharma, except mankind. When God\ncreated the universe, He endowed it with order, with the laws to govern\ncreation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the basis of\nSanatana Dharma. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dharma is divine law\nprevailing on every level of existence, from the sustaining cosmic order to\nreligious and moral laws which bind us in harmony with that order.&nbsp; When we follow dharma, we are in conformity\nwith the laws that sustains the universe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"Atmano\nmokshartham jagat hitayacha\"</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Gandhi\nand BR Ambedkar recruited&nbsp; 25 lakh ( 2.5\nmillion ) Indian soldiers in the second World war.&nbsp;&nbsp; Out of this 243000 ( 2.43 lakh)&nbsp; soldiers were killed.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">MAHARS\nwere used by BR Ambedkar\u2019s grandfather Maloji Sakpal ( Mhow ) to fight for Rothschild\nduring the first war of Independence\u2014 along with Sikhs ( whose leaders were\ncrypto Jews) and Scindias ( Chitpavan Jew nay Brahmin Shinde ).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">MAHARS\nrecruited by BR Ambedkar\u2019s FREEMASON father Ramji Sakpal ( Mhow ) were used in\nthe worst areas of WW1\u2014they literally were cannon fodder. Almost all of them\ndied painful deaths. This was not recorded in history till I wrote my last blog\n( 919 ).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/the-only-dalit-freemason-of-india-capt.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/the-only-dalit-freemason-of-india-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">MAHARS\nwere recruited by BR Ambedkar ( who was educated by Rothschild at Columbia University\n) &nbsp;himself for WW2 .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Again almost all the\nMahars died in the worst areas of war.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Mahars\ngot NOTHING from Rothschild .&nbsp; &nbsp;Sikhs led by crypto Jew leaders were handsomely\ncompensated.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Have Buddhist / Dalit Mahars ever realized why Jains are filthy rich ,never shed a drop of blood ,\nwhile Mahars were fooled wholesale \u2013 &nbsp;and almost all of them are still paupers\n?&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\"><b>This is the meaning of perception.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Don\u2019t\nworry, the realization will dawn on you one fine day\u2014don\u2019t run after it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Now\nlet us apply perception on Rothschild creation Gandhi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Yet he\ncaused so many Indians to die in WW1 and WW2 , so that Rothschild can carve out\nthe state of Israel.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Gandhi\nwas made a hero like Maloji Sakpal, FREEMASON Ramji Sakpal and BR Ambedkar.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When Gandhi came to India from South Africa, the white governor was there to\nreceive him at the ship quay-Rothschild\u2019s orders. If this white uppity man did\nNOT go,he would lose his job the same day and be killed too.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; The German had\ndone NO harm to us.</span><br />\n<span style=\"line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; The girl has to remover her\nundies and a tube has to be shoved up her asshole and out comes watery stinking\nshit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That two\nparticles at opposite ends of the universe can be entangled in such a way that\nanything you do to one instantly affects the other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-79uNW8Naj2g/VjdHwan-GuI/AAAAAAABBdY/jfBoDoi-Ayw/s1600/imeages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-79uNW8Naj2g/VjdHwan-GuI/AAAAAAABBdY/jfBoDoi-Ayw/s400/imeages.jpg\" width=\"398\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Physicist John Bell of\nCERN (The European Organization for Nuclear Research), developed the equations\nthat freed quantum physics from the strictures of local-realism, defining\nmathematically how particles can be entangled in such a way that they are both\npart of what is known as a single wave function\u2014instead of each particle being\ndefined by its own wave function.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE IN INDIA ARE VERY PARTICULAR\nABOUT SHRADD FOR OUR DEAD ANCESTORS.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Si1E0B2JiJ8/VjdJUrJTAWI/AAAAAAABBd4/L_gNmRdB6JE/s1600/image8Gs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"299\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-Si1E0B2JiJ8/VjdJUrJTAWI/AAAAAAABBd4/L_gNmRdB6JE/s400/image8Gs.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Two similar DNA ( Y chromosome\n) follows Math. &nbsp;&nbsp;A team led by\nphysicists Bas Hensen and Ronald Hanson placed two instruments about 1.3\nkilometers apart in labs at opposite ends of the Delft campus. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each lab contained an\ninstrument with a diamond trap designed to hold an electron fast, so that it\ncould be hit with microwave and laser bursts. Those jolts of energy caused both\nelectrons in both labs to emit photons that traveled down optical fibers to a\nthird instrument in a lab equidistant between them. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The convergence of\nthose photons caused the entanglement of the two electrons that had produced\nthem.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Once that quantum union had taken place, the\nrest of the entanglement process played out\u2014with observations or measurements\nof the spin rate of one electron instantly affecting the other one. And in this\ncase instantly means exactly what it is supposed to mean\u2014which is even faster\nthan it would have taken light to travel the 1.3 km distance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is what Vedas said\n7000 years ago.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pRQ-W8pFxRI/VjdJmbYRbbI/AAAAAAABBeA/9n_T0HJzAJQ/s1600/down09load.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pRQ-W8pFxRI/VjdJmbYRbbI/AAAAAAABBeA/9n_T0HJzAJQ/s400/down09load.png\" width=\"288\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This was NO\ncoincidence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It worked every single\ntime.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHO CARES FOR BR\nAMBEDKARS, EVR PERIYARS, UR ANANTHAMURTHYs, PANSAREs, KALBURGIs, DHABHOLKARs, KANCHA\nILAIAH SQUEAK etc?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Henson and Hanson ran\n245 trials across 220 hours of testing sessions over 18 days, yielding results\nthat were consistent and reliable enough to beat the statistical distance\nopened by Bell\u2019s two loopholes\u2014effectively closing them both.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When Hindus are born\ntheir horoscopes are made. Every Indian Hindu does it. Mine was engraved on a\npalm leaf. My sons\u2019 horoscopes are in a notebook. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rich world famous\nauthors like Lynn Mctaggart have lifted Vedanta, whole sale in her books The\nField and The intention experiment-- yet all the credit she gives India is the\npraise , pseudo Indian&nbsp; Deepak Chopra\nheaped on her work. Whatever she wrote is from our ancient Sanskrit scriptures.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindu scripture, based\non the insights of Hindu sages and seers, serves primarily as a guidebook. But\nultimately truth comes to us through direct consciousness of the divine or the\nultimate reality. as GOD. Hindus refer to it as Brahman.. (This is not to be\nconfused with&nbsp; Brahmin meaning priest.)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In many religions truth\nis delivered or revealed from a divine source and enters the world through a\nsingle agent: for example, Abraham in Judaism, Jesus Christ in Christianity,\nand Muhammad in Islam. These truths are then recorded in scriptures that serve\nas a source of knowledge of divine wisdom: the Hebrew Bible, the New Testament\nof the Christian Bible, and the Koran.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Hindu tradition, by contrast,\nthere is no single revelation) by which people may achieve knowledge of the\ndivine or lead a life backed by religious law.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism\u2019s universal\nworld-view and its willingness to accept and celebrate diverse philosophies,\ndeities, symbols, and practices, makes it a religion that emphasizes\nsimilarities and shared characteristics rather than differences.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The Hindu tradition , unlike other religions\n--has always concerned itself with the human situation rather than the Hindu\nsituation. Instead of basing its identity on separating Hindu from non-Hindu or\nbeliever from non-believer, Hinduism has sought to recognize principles and\npractices that would lead any individual to become a better human being and\nunderstand and live in harmony with dharma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The distinction of\ndharma from the Western sense of religion is crucial to understanding Hindu\nreligious identity&nbsp; Dharma is an\nall-important concept for Hindus. In addition to tradition and moral order, it\nalso signifies the path of knowledge and correct action. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because of Hinduism\u2019s\nemphasis on living in accordance with dharma, anyone who is striving for\nspiritual knowledge and seeking the right course of ethical action is, in the\nbroadest sense, a follower of sanatana dharma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ROTHSCHILD CONVERTED\nDHARMA INTO</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b> DHAMMA .&nbsp; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karma is a crucial\nHindu concept. According to the doctrine of karma, our present condition in\nlife is the consequence of the actions of our previous lives.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The choices we\nhave made in the past directly affect our condition in this life, and the\nchoices we make today and thereafter will have consequences for our future\nlives in samsara. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTA MAANGTHA HAI ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>KOON PASSENA &nbsp;LETHA HOI-NAY- HAI\u2014<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">PAISA DENA ROTHA HOI </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An understanding of\nthis interconnection, according to Hindu teachings, can lead an individual\ntowards right choices, deeds, thoughts, and desires, without the need for an\nexternal set of commandments. Under the doctrine of karma, the ability to make\nchoices remains with the individual.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The sacred fire serves\nas a witness to the vows exchanged between the bride and the bridegroom. The\nsacrament of death calls for cremation (burning of the dead body), at the end\nof which the ashes are collected and deposited, usually by the sea side of or in\na river.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Water holds memory ..&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Hindu gods are regularly displayed with their\nfemale counterparts. Tantra&nbsp; involves the\nbalancing of these two aspects\u2014Shiva (representing consciousness) and Shakti\n(representing energy)\u2014in a manner reminiscent of Tamas / Rajas -- yin and yang.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanskrit and Malayalam has &nbsp;54 alphabets.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism has neither a\nbeginning or founder, nor a central authority, hierarchy, or organization. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A\nfurther characteristic of Hinduism is the ideal of ahimsa. Ahimsa, \u201cnon-injury\u201d\nor the absence of the desire to harm, is regarded by Indian thinkers as one of\nthe keystones of their ethics. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CHAKKAR KYA HAI BHAIYYA\n?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are few buyers\nfor the \u2018dust-to-dust\u2019, \u2018ashes-to-ashes\u2019 teachings, when it comes to the\njourney to the unknown .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Cremation is forbidden in Christianity because it\nmight interfere with God's ability to resurrect the body.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Seeing the inevitable, the Catholic Church\ndeclared that they still officially prefers the traditional burial or\nentombment of the deceased, but cremation is now permitted as long as it is not\ndone to express a \"refusal to believe in the resurrection of the\nbody\". <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So, In 1997 the\nVatican's Congregation for Divine Worship and the Discipline of the Sacraments\ngranted an indult to allow for \"...the celebration of the Funeral Liturgy,\nincluding Mass, in the presence of the cremated remains. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Provided the cremation\nhas not be inspired by motives contrary to Christian teaching such as respect\nfor the body or the resurrection of the body.&nbsp;\nThe rationale&nbsp; being, \" The\nLord can resurrect a bowl of ashes just as conveniently as he can resurrect a\nbowl of dust.\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1963, Vatican\nadmitted defeat and Pope Paul VI lifted the ban on cremation, and in 1966\nallowed Catholic priests to officiate at cremation ceremonies. If you cant beat\nthem join them, right?. But still they made crematoriums which look like\nchurches.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Protestant churches\nwere much more welcoming of the use of cremation and at a much earlier date\nthan the Catholic Church, as they too could NOT stem the anti-burial and pro-cremation\nstrong tide. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Eastern Orthodox\nand Oriental Orthodox Churches strictly forbid cremation . In Orthodoxy,\ncremation is a rejection of the dogma of the general resurrection, and as such\nis viewed harshly, still people stonewalled and opted for cremation.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-iUvE51twGTU/VjdlgIGn8NI/AAAAAAABBek/UUuRnSr59MY/s1600/512262f15.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"604\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-iUvE51twGTU/VjdlgIGn8NI/AAAAAAABBek/UUuRnSr59MY/s640/512262f15.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In ancient times\nthroughout parts of Europe, cremation was forbidden by law, and even punishable\nby death . In Goa, India,&nbsp; during the\nPortuguese inquisition, cremation was banned and most of the Hindus left their\nlands and migrated.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The poor having no\nchoice , were given these deserted lands and houses and converted into\nChristianity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An extreme form of\ncremation , when alive was used by Vatican authorities as part of punishment\nfor heretics\u2014this being burning at the stake.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/portuguese-inquisition-in-goa-and.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/portuguese-inquisition-in-goa-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is my prediction\nthat in another 20 years almost ALL Christians would prefer to be\ncremated.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Muslims may NOT dare to\ndo it for fear of violence from orthodox mullahs and social boycott.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindu cremations are\ndone on wood and in open air.&nbsp; When you\ncremate a dead body the high-temperatures of the fire (&nbsp; &gt;1000 deg C&nbsp; ) cause&nbsp;\nburning, vaporization, and oxidation to reduce it to basic chemical\ncompounds, such as gases and mineral fragments retaining the appearance of dry\nbone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An adult human body of\n90 kilos will just leave behind 2 kilos of bone reside, mostly dry calcium\nphosphates with some minor minerals, such as salts of sodium and potassium,\nwith a very small amount of carbon as carbonate..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not burying the body\nhas nothing to do with groundwater pollution. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>It is about shooting the\nsoul,&nbsp; riding a soliton carrier wave , to\nan akashic or ethereal plane, via a quantum wormhole- when the skull pops\nduring cremation.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A soliton is the\nquantum chaos sine wave that achieves anti gravity.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Cremation in Hinduism is to induce a feeling of\ndetachment into the freshly disembodied spirit,&nbsp;\nlest it remain near its former body for too long. </span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Women do NOT attend the\ncremation as they are prone to get emotionally more upset .&nbsp; The point of a funeral is to show respect not\nsadness.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">The soul remains in the\nvicinity until the ceremony is completed and the skull pops releasing the\nsolition carrier wave.&nbsp; </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the period\nbetween one's death and the next birth, one's soul remains in a subtle form\n(that which cannot be seen) and roams in space in a chosen plane of compatible\nvibrations until it enters another body at its birth.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
