, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">manyorvimanyukasy\u0101ya\u1e41\nmanyu\u015bamana ucyate ||<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The sacred darbha\ngrass quells the anger of friends and foes.&nbsp;\nIt is called \"Soother of Anger,\" because it brings calm in the\nmind of angry men.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both Sesame seed and\nDarbha ( Kusa ) grass emanated from the body of Lord Vishnu.&nbsp; For Hindus Sesame seed is hence a divine\nseed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per Garuda Purana ,\nan offering&nbsp; of Sesame seeds to ancestors\n(shraddha) prevents negative energies from posing obstacles in the homam rites.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During Samudra manthan\n, the fibres flaked off the back of the giant tortoise by Mount Meru got mixed\nwith Amrit drops and was swept ashore , from which Darbha grass grew.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every Hindu knows that\nwhile doing Shradda for dead ancestors he has to sit of Darbha grass and also\nput a ring of this grass on his right hand 4th finger on which he pours holy\nwater into the earthen pot holding the cremated bone fragments..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During Samudra Manthan\nLord Vishnu\u2019s sweat fell on the ground and this became Til or Sesame seeds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When my wife visits\ntemples she donated ghee and sesame seeds oil for lighting lamps.. some tmeples\nare so poor that they do not have oil to light lamps.&nbsp; Without a lit lam , whither divinity in a\ntemple?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yet we Hindus subsidise\nMacca HAJJ &nbsp;yatra of Muslims without demur .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sesame seed is\nmentioned as a seed of immortality in our Vedas written in Sanskrit 7000 years\nago.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/10/sesame-seed-sweat-of-lord-vishnu-capt.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/10/sesame-seed-sweat-of-lord-vishnu-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shraaddh is the rituals\nperformed during the end pf Pitru Paksha on new moon ( dark amavasya)day ,for\nthe departed souls of dead ancestors.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our ancient scriptures\nlike Agni Purana, Garuda Purana and Matysa Purana say that the souls will\nattain peace by the Shraadh ritual\u2014along with a boost of ONE astral layer\nupwards..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He wears a ring of\nDARBHA grass on the 4th finger of his right hand .&nbsp;&nbsp; Then the ancestors are invoked to reside in\nthe ring.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The shraaddh is usually\nperformed bare-chested in dhoti while sitting on darbha grass.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-K5Za7wSOVzU/VjjEjGCD3RI/AAAAAAABBh0/0x1ckicKKb0/s1600/downlw43moad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; The\nreason for this is that we can gain victory over the Pitruloka with the help of\nthe root of the Darbha.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do not re-use second\nhand Darbha grass , as it has lost its potency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do NOT pick up darbha\nfallen on the path,&nbsp; kept on the funeral\npyre,&nbsp; laid on the ground of sacrificial\nfire,&nbsp; already used as a seat in a shraddha\nritual,&nbsp; used in the Brahmayadnya or for\nthe purpose of tarpan.&nbsp;&nbsp; Pluck only green\nDarbha which is grown on a clean ground.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0938\u0930\u094d\u0935\u093e\u0923\u093f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092a\u093e\u092a\u093e\u0928\u093f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0926\u0930\u094d\u092d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0938\u094d\u0935\u0938\u094d\u0924\u093f\u0915\u0930\u094b</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092d\u0935</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0964\u0964</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reciting this mantra,\nface the north-east direction say \u2018Hum Phat\u2019 and pluck the Darbha. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Darbha should be\ngathered by good people , only on the first lunar day of the waning moon\ncycle.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HUM means cut ego\n-&nbsp;&nbsp; PHAT is a slicing weapon<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Darbha grass blocks\nradiation and negativity . &nbsp;After Griha\nPravesh, the Kalasha Patram holy water is sprinked in all rooms of the new home\n, using a darbha&nbsp; grass brush- to dispel\nnegativity. In homam kunds , Darbha grass is placed on all four sides of the\nfire , to block negative energies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-e1eGJu9fUB0/VjjGEZfRt2I/AAAAAAABBiA/2LGfs_aILys/s1600/5626872_9oUGg.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-e1eGJu9fUB0/VjjGEZfRt2I/AAAAAAABBiA/2LGfs_aILys/s400/5626872_9oUGg.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Above : Darbha grass\namplifies spiritual energies.&nbsp; Water in\nthe Kalasha patra is energized while reciting Vedic mantras - touching the\nkumbha with k\u016brcas (bundles) made of darbha. Blades of darbha with the tips\nintact should be used.&nbsp; Handle darbha\nwith reverence and respect for its spiritual energies. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Botanical names :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DARBHA&nbsp; grass \u2013IMPERATA CYLINDRICA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">KUSHA grass -\nDESMOSTACHYA BIPINNATA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In ancient days the\nbride wore darbha belt at her waist\u2014today they wear gold belts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Darbha is a MUST in\nrituals for Pitru tarpanam.&nbsp;&nbsp; The\nancestors are invoked using bundles of darbha and offerings of water and black\nsesame are made pouring from the hand, through blades of darbha.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When strewing Darbha,\nkeep its tips pointing toward the East, North, or North East.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After use, darbha\nshould not be re-used, but discarded respectfully in a natural place where\npeople will not walk. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meaning: If a person\nperforms shraddha using mere grass but with faith and devotion, then nobody in\nhis family becomes unhappy-&nbsp;&nbsp; <b>BRAHMA\nPURANA-&nbsp; 5000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me make it\nabundantly clear-AGAIN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The funeral pyre must\nbe COMPULSORILY set alight by a son.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ash/ bone immersion\nceremony ( asti kriya ) must be COMPULSORILY done by a son.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first\nshraadham&nbsp; ( death anniversary )&nbsp; must be done by a male.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prayers offered at the\nend of the shraddha ritual<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A. '</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0917\u094b\u0924\u094d\u0930\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0928\u094b</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0935\u0930\u094d\u0927\u0924\u093e\u092e\u094d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0964</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meaning: Let our\nlineage (gotra) grow. To this the brahmins bestow blessings, \u2018Let your lineage\ngrow.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">B. '</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0935\u0940\u0930\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092e\u0947</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0926\u0924\u094d\u0924</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092a\u093f\u0924\u0930</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meaning: O ancestors,\ngive me a valiant son.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This prayer has to do\nwith the DYING Y CHROMOSOME \u2013figured out by Maharishis . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So KHAPS and GOTRAs are\nTALIBAN STUFF ,&nbsp; RIGHT?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>WRONG !</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shraadham rituals\nduring subsequent years can be done by females too , especially the GROUP\nSHRADDHAMS&nbsp; - because Y chromosome is NOT\ninvolved<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember, our\nscriptures say that for the ancestor&nbsp; the\ninterval from the time of death to the next birth is similar to that of a\nfoetus in the mother\u2019s womb..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The deceased ancestors\nsouls get fortified , acquire a protective sheath and get the momentum to\nprogress \u2013 to a better future life on planet earth than his last tenure on\nearth .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-IBl7Z6sNqlY/VjjHW32NaRI/AAAAAAABBiM/W6O0Md1cdQw/s1600/10tvkoy-Vavubali_1_159fr633e.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During Kumbhabhi\u1e63ekam\nrituals (&nbsp; Temple consecration rituals ),\nganges water is kept in kumbhas (water pots).&nbsp;&nbsp;\nThe gods&nbsp; are invoked into the\nkumbhas and worshiped with yantra puja ( Sri Yantra mystical diagrams), upacharas\n(ritual offerings) and homam ( havanam fire ceremony).&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This process energizes\nthe water in the kumbhas, which is then used in a ritual bath to purify and\nenergize (or re-energize) the Temple murtis (idols).&nbsp;&nbsp; During this process a thread is woven from\ndarbha grass to connect the kumbha to the Vigrahas (temple Idols).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During avahana (\ninvocation )&nbsp; and pranapratishta\n(enlivement), the kumbha ,&nbsp; idol&nbsp; is touched with a darbha kurcha, while\nreciting the mantras of invocation.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE HINDUS HAVE THE\nRICHEST CULTURE ON THIS PLANET AND WE ARE PROUD OF IT.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092f\u093e\u0935\u0926\u094d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0935\u0943\u0936\u094d\u091a\u093f\u0915\u0926\u0930\u094d\u0936\u0928\u092e\u094d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0964\u0964</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n- </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092e\u0939\u093e\u092d\u093e\u0930\u0924</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meaning: How will a\nhouseholder who does not perform shraddha while the sun is stationed in the\nKanya, that is, Virgo sign and thereby invites the ire of the departed\nancestors, acquire wealth, son etc.? --&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<b>Mahabharata 4000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanatana Dharma\ndeceased ancestors (pitar) are protectors of the blood lineage.&nbsp; If kuladharma like the rituals of shraddha is\nfollowed, purity of the lineage is certain.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There will be NO\nperverted homosexuals or women with pricks without balls ( with&nbsp; a vagina thrown in for good measure) . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is NO greater\npleasure for man than to see his SON doing well. The day his own son mentally\nor physically whips his ass, he is overjoyed-- PARADOX !.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Otherwise&nbsp; NO man worth his salt, loves to lose .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It so transpired that\nin strength competitions at the gym,&nbsp;\nboth by sons defeated me easily .&nbsp;&nbsp;\nAn onlooker spAke \u2014\u201c No thieves will ever come to your house \u201c .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nobody in the gym can lift 1/3 of what my younger son ( 126 kilos weight ) does.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per Hindu\nscriptures, due to insatiated and disturbed deceased ancestor\u2019s souls there is\npossibility of distress like not getting married, marital disharmony,&nbsp; not conceiving,&nbsp; abortion, giving birth to a mentally retarded\nor handicapped baby,&nbsp; getting nightmares,\nseeing snakes in dreams etc.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Gotra system was\ndesigned to track down the root Y Chromosome of a person quite easily.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our Vedic seers had\nobserved the degeneration of the Y Chromosome and they wanted to maintain as\nmany individual healthy unique Y Chromosome lineages as possible. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Protect the Y\nchromosome !&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a science in arranged marriage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Maharishis created\nthe Gotra system where they barred marriage between a boy and a girl belonging\nto the same Gotra no matter how deep the lineage tree was, in a bid to prevent\ninbreeding and completely eliminate all recessive defective genes from the\nhuman DNA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manu-smriti states that\nHindus should leave 7 generations from the fathers side and 5 generations from\nthe mother side before fixing up a marriage\u2014to preserve the integrity of the Y\nchromosome.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whenever my wife goes\nto temples she donates TIL oil ( sesame / gingelly ) and humped cow A2 milk\nGHEE .&nbsp;&nbsp; We Hindus light sesame oil in\nour Diwali lamps . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tila tarpan means\noffering BLACK sesame seeds mixed in water to the deceased ancestors\u2019 souls. By\nthis process positive energy is imparted to the soul parked in one of the 7\nenergy planes (corresponding to the 7 chakras ).&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Souls which obtained\nMoksha parked&nbsp; in the highest 7th plane (\nVaikunta ) do NOT need any such help.&nbsp;\nHumped cows A2 milk ghee also has the same effect, as Sesame .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE PERSON AND HIS\nBLOODLINE WHO DOES THE SHRAADH BENEFITS IN LESSENING THE KARMIC BURDEN FOR\nTHEMSELVES\u2014 SUCH IS THE POWER OF THE EMOTION CALLED GRATITUDE .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0926\u0947\u0935\u092a\u093f\u0924\u0943\u0915\u093e\u0930\u094d\u092f\u093e\u092d\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0928</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092a\u094d\u0930\u092e\u0926\u093f\u0924\u0935\u094d\u092f\u092e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0964</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">- Taittiriya Upanishad\n1.11-&nbsp; 5000BC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meaning:&nbsp; One should not commit mistakes in any task\nperformed towards God or ancestors' souls. One should not avoid these rituals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Performing Shraddha is\na part of obeying Dharma, as per science of Sanatana Dharma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092a\u0924\u0928\u094d\u0924\u093f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092a\u093f\u0924\u0930\u094b</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0939\u094d\u092f\u0947\u0937\u093e\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">- Shrimadbhagwatgita\n1.42 -4000 BC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meaning:&nbsp; Due to the nonperformance of rituals like\npinda shraddha and offering water to deceased ancestors etc, the ancestors of\nsuch people (who do not perform Shraaddh) have to reside in the lower gross\nenergy planes&nbsp; .&nbsp; This results in stagnation and erosion of the\ndescendants .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below:&nbsp; There is a loka ( ether space)&nbsp; between Vaikunta ( 7th and highest plane )\nand earth called Pitru loka ( first 6 plane ) ruled by death god Yama.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>There is NO hell concept in Hinduism.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: medium; line-height: 27px;\">Below: Yama , lord of Pitruloka - the first 6 energy planes .</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The western burial\nreligion societies are getting decadent because they think that putting\nhelpless aged parents in an old home is a very clever thing . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu takes care of\nhis parents- they can afford a hundred nurses or the best luxury old age homes\n, but they feel good while cleaning the sh#t and pee on the bed ridden parent (\nlike how a mother feels for her small baby )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They do NOT realize\nthat when they were small helpless babies their parents could also do the same\nthing.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yes\u2014all of them did,\nthey kept the small baby in another room, so that they can have an\nuninterrupted HUMP on the bed. . Almost like keeping the mobile phone ringer\noff in the courtroom.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">TODAY ANY IDIOT WEARING\nA SAFFRON ROBE IS CALLED A SEER BY ZIONIST JEW OWNED BENAMI MEDIA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; \u2013&nbsp;\nendless ego clashes between the family members, unemployment despite\nbeing qualified , unable to save any money,&nbsp;\nserious illness creating depression,&nbsp;\nunable to get married in spite of all favorable conditions,&nbsp; unable to cope up with the partner after\nmarriage,&nbsp; unable to conceive,&nbsp; abortion,&nbsp;\ngiving birth to a physically or mentally handicapped baby and developing\nphobias , homosexuality, vices and addictions.</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By performing Shraaddh\nwith an emotion of gratitude , one gets relieved from the distress caused by\nthe deceased ancestors.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>NO DRUG PRODUCED BY EVIL PHARMA HAS THE POTENCY OF GRATITUDE.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">God Varaha, incarnation\nof Lord Vishnu, introduced Shraddha to the entire world. He created three\nPindas from His molar tooth and placed it on a Darbha (dried grass twig)\ntowards the southern direction.&nbsp; Lord\nVaraha advised 'Let the 3 Pindas be considered as a representation of the\nfather, grandfather and great grandfather' and then He vanished after\nperforming the ritualistic worship of the Pindas using sesame seeds in a\nscientific manner.&nbsp; Thus began the\nworship of Pinda for deceased ancestors as per the guidance of Lord Varaha. -- <b>Mahabharata (Shantiparva 12.3.345) 4000 B</b>C<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The spiritually potent\nmantras that are chanted during the ritual of Shraddha have the subtle power of\nproviding momentum to the soul of the&nbsp;\ndeceased ancestor so that they can be turbo boosted&nbsp; to a higher plane of lesser karmic baggage.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DNA is governed by the\nlaws of quantum physics rather than the laws of biology. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Doing rituals together\nin a group is a time for ritual bonding.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Jiva ( live human )\nwho has cast off his physical sheath is called a Preta ( soul ). , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meaning: \"whatever\nacts or deeds you perform with gratitude and devotion for your near and dear\nones who have died, is called shradh.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pitru Paksha emphasises\nthe fact that the ancestors and the current generation and their next unborn\ngeneration are connected by quantum entanglement &nbsp;ties.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nThe current generation repays their debt to the ancestors in the Pitru\nPaksha.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometimes after\nfragmentation of property , family business between brothers and sisters ,\nchildren develop grudges and <b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">silent indifference towards their parents</b>\u2014a sort\nof cold war.&nbsp; I am sure you all know what\nI mean.&nbsp; One day you will also be in the\nsame situation&nbsp; .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the time to\nconfess and ask for forgiveness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ritual is also held\non the death anniversary of the ancestor.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nThe shraaddh is performed only at noon, usually on the bank of a river ,\nsea shore,&nbsp; lake or at one's&nbsp; own house.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indian civilization is\nthe oldest on this planet.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our amazing religious\nfestivals have elaborate prayers, traditions, customs and rituals attached to\nthem\u2014NOT a single one of them is superstition as tom tommed by the white\ninvader and his stooges..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our festivals do NOT\nhave a fixed date as we do NOT follow the Western Gregorian calendar.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Gregorian calendar\nis based on the sun, in which, one year is the time required for the earth to\ncomplete one round around the sun. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Earth takes 365 days, 5\nhours, 48minutes and 46seconds to complete a rotation around the sun.&nbsp; In our one year we have 365days, but these\nextra hours, minutes and seconds every year, create an extra day every four\nyears. The year with an extra day is known as leap year.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Hindu calendar was\nfounded when the whole world was running around naked and doing grunt grunt for\nlanguage-- there is NO need to be hajaaaar impressed with dick , prick and harry ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is known as\nPanchang, which is based on both the sun and the moon.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This calendar covers\neverything from phases of the moon, the positions of stars and planets, and\nidentifies auspicious times and days, for various activities. It uses a solar\nyear but divides it into 12 lunar months.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A lunar month is precisely 29 days,\n12 hours, 44 minutes, and 3 seconds long. Twelve such months constitute a lunar\nyear of 354 days, 8 hours, 48 minutes, and 36 seconds. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To match the lunar\nmonths with the year, every two and a half year an extra months arises. In\nother words, every 30 months an extra month is added. This extra month is known\nas Adhik Mas.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-bUAoPWjzR9Y/VjmARedEexI/AAAAAAABBlc/lE0bcCMbTUI/s1600/Hinydu-Calend4ar1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"552\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-bUAoPWjzR9Y/VjmARedEexI/AAAAAAABBlc/lE0bcCMbTUI/s640/Hinydu-Calend4ar1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the Indian calendar,\nseasons follow the sun, months follow the moon, and days follow both sun and\nmoon. Lunar days in the Indian calendar are called Tithis. The Tithi system\nworks from full moon night, to new moon night, to full moon night. Indian festivals\nfollow the Tithis calander, this is why festivals in India don\u2019t follow the\nGregorian calendar dates. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Indian government\nand businesses use the Gregorian calendar for administrative purposes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The above image shows\nthe months of the Lunar calendar. The first month of the year is Chaitra, which\nstarts around the end of March or beginning of April, depending on the Tithi\ncalculation. The following months continue through the rest of the year.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Malayalam calendar\nis a sidereal solar calendar. Western astrology takes the tropical approach,\nwhereas Hindu astrology takes the ACCURATE sidereal one. This results in the\noriginally unified zodiacal coordinate system drifting apart gradually, with a\nclockwise(westward) precession of 1.4 degrees per century.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For the tropical zodiac\nused in Western astronomy and astrology, this means that the tropical sign of\nAries currently lies somewhere within the constellation Pisces (\"Age of\nPisces\").&nbsp; Most perceptive modern\nWestern astrologers, have advocated abandoning the tropical system in favour of\na sidereal one.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is what happens when you steal without understanding the\nconcepts--you get caught with your pants down sooner than later.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is essential that\nShraaddh be performed by the son\u2014usually the eldest\u2014or male blood relative of\nthe paternal branch of the family, limited to the preceding three generations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE: According to\nHindu mythology, the tradition of offering Shraddha (donations) during Pitru\nPaksha is attributed to Karna. Karna was a charitable person and had donated\ngold and other precious things throughout his life to help the needy and\ndowntrodden. When he died, his soul went to <b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">heaven</b>, where he was given gold and\njewels to eat. Bemused, he went to Indra to know the reason for the same. Indra\ntold him that despite donating many things, particularly gold during his life,\nhe had never donated any food to his ancestors. Karna reasoned that since he\nwasn`t aware of his ancestors, he never donated anything. So Indra, allowed\nKarna to go back to earth to do Shraddha and seek redemption.UNQUOTE \u2013&nbsp; NONSENSE !!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Red coloured flowers\nare NOT used in the shraaddh ritual as destroyer frequencies are emitted from\nthem.&nbsp;&nbsp; White fragrant flowers are best.\nFruits like the Indian gooseberry (amla),&nbsp;\npomegranate,&nbsp; musk melon\n(kharbuja) are specially used in the shraddha ritual.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While doing shraadh\nritual the intention must be sincere. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">cheraman\nperumal ( king of calicut ) at the time of life of mohammad at mecca is the\nmost famous-- as he built the murugan / subramanian palani temple which was\npart of chera kingdom-- though currently deep inside tamil nadu today. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">kodaikanal\nwas part of chera kingdom \u2013a summer retreat for chera kings .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">chera\n( kerala ) kingdom was NEVER conquered , though the most valuable part of this\nplanet--because of our kalari tradition, where every MAN knew sword and URUMI\nfighting. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/12/kalaripayattu-oldest-and-deadliest.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/12/kalaripayattu-oldest-and-deadliest.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ROTHSCHILD\nHISTORIANS MADE KERALA A TAPE WORM IN THE STOMACH OF TAMIL NADU.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEY\nSAID MALAYALAM NEVER EXISTED TILL A COUPLE OF CENTURIES AGO--USING A WHITE\nSKINNED DESH DROHI BY THE NAME OF BISHOP ROBERT CADWELL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE\nTELUGUS HAD ANOTHER EQUIVALENT WHITE SKINNED DESH DROHI- - CP BROWN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE\nWHITE SKINNED DESH DROHI OF KERALA IS HERMANN GUNDERT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/12/hermann-gundert-hermann-hesse-and.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/12/hermann-gundert-hermann-hesse-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PANDYAN\nKINGDOM WAS A SMALL KINGDOM. CHOLAS WERE MIGHTY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PANDYANS\nAND CHOLAS WOULD ATTACK CHERAS GHADI GHADI-- AND THEY WOULD GET BEATEN EVERY\nSINGLE TIME. IT WAS A STANDING JOKE OF ATTACKERS KNOWING 100% SURE THAT THEY\nWOULD BE WHIPPED BACK .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">KERALA\nTHOUGH THE MOST FERTILE PART OF THIS PLANET WAS NEVER INVADED AND CONQUERED\nTILL FRENCH ROTHSCHILD GAVE LONG RANGE ROCKETS TO TIPU SULTAN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kanyakumari\nwas part of the ancient Chera kingdom. The Chera Kings ruled from Calicut ( my\nhometown ). Their sea port and cultural centre was Kodungallur ( Muziris ) . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nkingdom extended eastwards from the Arabian sea and included Palghat,\nCoimbatore, Salem and Semmedu- Kolli mountain range\u2014after which the Pandya\nKingdom started from Uraiyur to bay of Bengal to the LTTE controlled areas of\nSri Lanka.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nChola kingdom extended from Chennai to Adirampattinam. It is white invader FAKE\nmutt nonsense that Cholas ruled the Chera Kingdom.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Further\nNorth lay the Chalukyas .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like I\nsaid, the Cheras ( Malayalis ) hemmed in by Arabian sea with tough Kalari\nwarriors were in continuous battle with Pandyas hemmed in my Bay of Bengal --\nand their ally Cholas north of Pandya kingdom.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every\nsingle battle in history ( dozens of them ) with Cholas and Pandyas as Tamil\nspeaking allies was won by the Malayalam speaking Cheras.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cheras\nhad bow and arrow on their flag. Pandya has twin fish . Chola has a leaping\ntiger.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nPadmanabhapuram palace complex was constructed around 1601 A.D by Iravi Varma\nKulasekhara Perumal who ruled Travancore between 1592 A.D. and 1609 A.D.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\n1795 the capital of Travancore was shifted from here to Thiruvananthapuram, (\nthreats from Tipu Sultan ) and the place lost its former glory. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\npalace is in traditional Kerala architecture, and some portions of the\nsprawling complex are also the hallmark of traditional Kerala style\narchitecture.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A8An5J8ftdo<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">this\ntype of wood ( rosewood ) in NOT available anymore -- and hence the palace is\npriceless.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kanchi\nMutt claimed Kerala Namboodiri Adi Shankaracharya as their first Shankaracharya\nand Chandrasekhara Saraswati as their 69TH acharya.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; If so why don\u2019t the Tamils celebrate Onam ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If\nMalayalam was just a couple of centuries old and was a tape worm in the stomach\nof Tamil \u2013then why did Hermann Gundert take away all our Malayalam books? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why\ndoes Germany want to study only Sanskrit and Malayalam today ? Why do Germans\nwant to study a parasite tape worm ? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Strange\ninconsistency !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT WAS\nKANCHI MUTT WHO INTRODUCED TAMIL MANTRAS AND AGAMA ( INTSEAD OF VEDA ) . AGAMA\nWAS FULL OF LENGTHY AND ELABORATE RELIGIOUS RITUALS AND THE TAMIL BRAHMINS MADE\nMERRY BY CHARGING EXHORBITANT FEES, EVEN FOR DEAD FATHERs SHRADH .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mantras\nwork only in Sanskrit. Sanatana Dharma is based on longitudinal sound waves.\nThe meaning of the mantra is immaterial.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\nSanatana Dharma our Upanishads say that God is happy with even an offering of a\ndried Tulsi/ Bilva leaf , or a fresh flower or even clean water. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/kanchi-mutt-creation-of-white-invader.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/kanchi-mutt-creation-of-white-invader.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE\nMIGHTY CHOLAS , RULED A KINGDOM WHERE THE NORTHERN PART SPOKE TELUGU AND\nSOUTHERN PART SPOKE TAMIL. Similarly, Dussehra (also called Vijaya Dashami) is also celebrated because of Lord Rama's victory over Ravana. Many of our festivals have multiple reasons for being celebrated.<br />\n<br />\nDelete<br />\n###########################<br />\nCapt. He says that his rhythmic breathing practice, Sudarshan Kriya, came to him in 1982, \"like a poem, an inspiration,\" after a ten-day period of silence on the banks of the Bhadra River in Shimoga, in the state of Karnataka, adding, \"I learned it and started teaching it\".[18]UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nI SENT MY WIFE TO AOL TO DO SUDARSHAN KRIYA WITH 100% AWARENESS.<br />\n<br />\nSHE CAME BACK AND REPORTED TO ME WHAT SHE FELT AND EXPERIENCED.<br />\n<br />\nSUDARSHAN KRIYA IS HYPERVENTILATION WHICH DESTROYS BRAIN CELLS BY MARTINI EFFECT. &nbsp; I AM A WORLD EXPERT ON NITROGEN.<br />\n<br />\nHyperventilation leads to spontaneous and asynchronous firing of neurons.<br />\n<br />\nSanatana Dharma does NOT allow you to create HARMFUL YOGA , patent it , make moolah and live like kings--and run down the ramp through a gaping crowd ,like a MESSIAH<br />\n<br />\ni want my readers to peruse this post below-<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_11.html<br />\n<br />\nYOGA ALLOWS ONLY DEEP DIAPHRAGMATIC BREATHING<br />\n<br />\nnitrogen narcosis DESTROYS YOUR BRAIN irreversibly<br />\n<br />\nwe know why APCO modi gave this man PADMA VIBHUSHAN ( india's second highest award ) this year-- for saying vedas condone homosexuality , and the 9th avatar fo visnu was an offspring of homosexual sex between lotd shiva and lord vishnu<br />\n<br />\nVISHNU AND SHIVA ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES ON MICRO/ MACRO SCALE .
