margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"598\" data-original-width=\"540\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-xknIebPboUg/Wt3SbQyRnoI/AAAAAAABaz8/Wj2OZuN8gL0zujdAxeldqceskrdLCy8OwCLcBGAs/s640/untitled_1d408774934_1408774948_540x540.png\" width=\"577\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">4000 years ago Adi Shankaracharya wrote \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Shivah Shakthyaa Yuktho Yadi Bhavathi\nShakthaha Prabhavithum<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Na Chedevam Devo Na Khalu Kushalaha\nSphandithumapi<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Translation Verse No 1 : Shiva becomes\ncapable of creating the Universe, only when united with Shakthi , but otherwise\n, He is incapable of even a stir.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe\nis perceived as being created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental\nforces, which are permanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces\nor universal aspects are called Shiva ( purusha ) &nbsp;and Shakti ( prakriti ). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Each of the trinity gods are powerless\nwithout their consorts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Trinity gods Brahma Vishnu and Shiva are\namazing cosmic allegories\u2014which sustain this universe at macro and micro scale<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/05/dvaita-vedanta-of-sanatana-dharma-or.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/05/dvaita-vedanta-of-sanatana-dharma-or.html</a><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Tantric art has captured the images of the\nPurusha and his consort, Prakriti, in ecstatic union.&nbsp; This is NOT perverted sex.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Purusha and Prakriti is expressed as Shiva\nand Shakti in the same body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender\n.&nbsp; It is a mindboggling,&nbsp; intelligent concept.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Purusha is the embodiment of pure\nconsciousness, and Pragati as the embodiment of pure energy. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Both Shiva and Shakti are Consciousness----\nShiva is the changeless static aspect of&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Consciousness, and Shakti is the\nkinetic, active aspect of the same Consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Through uniting with Purusha , Prakriti gave\nform to his spirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF\nTHE COSMOS here- not street side sex&nbsp; as\nfigured out by small minds)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">When the insentient Prakriti comes in contact\nwith the sentient Purusha , the universe evolves. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Purusha symbolizes consciousness, the\nmasculine principle. Prakriti symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating\nenergy.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">The cosmos in all its manifestations, as an\nact of love.&nbsp; The relationship between\nsay- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and energy experienced\nwithin each of us, regardless of gender.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Shiva resides in the highest Sahasr\u0101ra Chakra\nand Shakti in the lowest M\u016bl\u0101dh\u0101ra Chakra. When Prakriti and Purusha unite in\nthe Sahasr\u0101ra Chakra ( raising of Kundalini ) , knowledge, knower and the\nobject of knowledge become one.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Sankhya thus is a theory of evolution and\nunderstanding the universe. Prakriti cannot be perceived, not because of its\nnon-existence, but because of its subtlety.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;It is perceived in its effects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">The eternal and indestructible union between\nShiva and Shakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static\naspect as well as in its dynamic one. Not only is Shakti responsible for\ncreation, it is also the agent of all change<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Shakti is manifested by Shiva only during\ncreation and is withdrawn into himself at the end of creation. This is for the\nperceptive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Modern science repeats from our Vedas that\nmatter and energy are interchangeable.&nbsp;\nSo does consciousness and energy .&nbsp;\nIn the highest planes they are interchangeable, which is why we see a\ngreat incongruence between our spiritual experiences and the external reality. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the higher metaphysical realms and subtle\nplanes of our consciousness the physical laws of our universe lose their validity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">There is no Shiva without Shakti, nor Shakti\nwithout Shiva.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">Samkhya as you can see was a masterpiece of\nmodeling the ways of the inner universe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">The union of Shakti with Shiva by Kundalini\nrise&nbsp; is the liberation of seeker from\nthe cycle of endless birth and death.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 300%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 300%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">DO YOU REALLY YOU EXPECT <span style=\"color: red;\">CUNTS </span>LIKE AUDREY\nBABY, WENDY BABY AND SHELDON BABY&nbsp; TO\nUNDERSTAND ALL THIS ?</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 18pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span></span></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HEY</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">PM MODI IS SUCKING UP TO OUR BENAMI MEDIA !</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">YES-- INDEED WE HAD&nbsp;!</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MAHARISHIS WITH 12 STRAND DNA AND KING SIZED PINEAL GLAND USED THEIR OWN BODIES AS INTERNET</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ILLITERATE MODI IS TEACHING HIS MORE LITERATE AND WELL INFORMED COLLEAGUES --JUST BECAUSE HE SITS ON THE PM CHAIR</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">##############################</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BOOLEAN LOGIC IS STOLEN FROM PART 2 OF VEDAS , THE BRAHMANAS PENNED DOWN 7000 YEARS AGO\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Jew Rothschild stole the technical texts BRAHMANAS ( part 2 ) and the ARANYAKAS ( part 3) of our Vedas\u2014leaving us with SAMHITAS ( ridiculed as cowherds\u2019s verses- magic lies in the sound not the words which are meant only to instill a sense of gratitude ) and UPANISHADS ( philosophy )..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THERE IS A BIG DIFFERENCE BETWEEN INVENTIONS AND INNOVATION\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Boolean logic is fundamental to the design of computer hardware and programming\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">George Boole was a thief..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Mary Everest Boole wrote that her husbands logic was lifted from Indian logic\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Seven basic logic gates ease the complexity of Boolean algebra and allow for simple application in electronics and circuit analysis\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Vedic LOGIC was of seven types ( philosophy ).. sy\u0101d-asti,.. sy\u0101n-n\u0101sti,.. sy\u0101d-asti-n\u0101sti,.. sy\u0101d-asti-avaktavya\u1e25,.. sy\u0101n-n\u0101sti-avaktavya\u1e25,.. sy\u0101d-asti-n\u0101sti-avaktavya\u1e25,.. sy\u0101d-avaktavya\u1e25\u2026 in some ways, it is indescribable\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">There are seven basic logic gates: AND, OR, XOR, NOT, NAND, NOR, and XNOR. ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Arrays of logic gates are found in digital integrated circuits (ICs)\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Today the story of seven blind men and the elephant has been stolen by the white man--though he has no elephants in his own country . . TEE HEEEEE \u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Panini\u2019s grammar includes early use of Boolean logic, of the null operator, and of context free grammars, and includes a precursor of the \u201cBackus\u2013Naur\u201d form (used in the description programming languages) \u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Panini lived 7500 years ago. The white invader kicked him forward in time as the Big Bang of the bible was only in 4004 B C\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Boolean Algebra served the basis of early transistors and capacitors used in early primitive form of the computer\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The tetralemma is lifted from ancient Indian math\u2026&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The catu\u1e63ko\u1e6di is a \"four-cornered\" system of argumentation that involves the systematic examination and rejection of each of the 4 possibilities of a proposition..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">All things (dharmas) exist- affirmation of being, negation of nonbeing.. All things (dharmas) do not exist- affirmation of nonbeing, negation of being.. All things (dharmas) both exist and do not exist- both affirmation and negation.. All things (dharmas) neither exist nor do not exist- neither affirmation nor negation..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Sanskrit is rich in many mathematical features like its logic, context free grammar, in particular Boolean logic, null operator, etc\u2026&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">VEDIC SRUTIS HAVE GOLDEN MEAN (1.618 ) , FIBONACCI SERIES , PASCALS TRIANGLE, LUCAS NUMBERS , SRI YANTRA ( GEOMETRY OF OM ), ULAM SPIRAL, PRIME NUMBER MAGIC EMBEDDED IN IT --</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">The basis most commonly cited for American exceptionalism is the idea that the United States and its people hold a special place in the world, by offering opportunity and hope for humanity, derived from a unique balance of public and private interests governed by constitutional ideals that are focused on personal and economic freedom. \u2026..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 23, 2018 at 7:38 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_7MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/learning-with-the-times-why-the-us-is-keeping-an-eye-on-indias-exchange-rate-policies/articleshow/63874081.cms</span><br />\nINDIA WILL NOT SURRENDER OUR SOVEREIGNTY TO USA<br />\n<br />\nCurrency manipulation\u2013the effort to keep exports cheap by intervening in the foreign exchange market..<br />\n<br />\nUsually, when a country raises its interest rates, the value of its currency rises, making its exports more expensive and less competitive.<br />\n<br />\nWE DON\u2019T NEED TO LEARN ECOONOMICS FROM USA ..<br />\n<br />\nHere's the criteria a country has to meet to be named a currency manipulator by USA: --<br />\n<br />\n---Have a significant trade surplus with the US<br />\n---Have a \"material\" current account surplus with the US<br />\n---Be engaged in \"persistent, one-sided\" intervention in the foreign exchange market<br />\n<br />\nThe US lists three criterion for judging whether it needs to take action against its partners\u2014a bilateral trade surplus of at least $20 billion ( meaning the value of goods it exports to the U.S. exceeds the value of its American imports by that much), an overall current account surplus of at least 3% of GDP ( a measurement of goods, services and investments that go in and out of a country), and net purchases of foreign currency amounting to at least 2% of GDP over a 12-month period.<br />\n<br />\nINDIAs GDP IS FAR HIGHER THAN WHAT IS PROJECTED BY IMF\u2014 AS WE DO NOT FACTOR IN COTTAGE AND FAMILY BASES INDUSTRIES INTO OUR GDP<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/gpi-dog-shall-wag-gdp-tail-not-vice.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIn reality the rupee is overvalued and needs to be at around 69 rupees to the dollar to be at its true value. The over-valuation, it goes without saying, hurts India\u2019s exports<br />\n<br />\nWhile China\u2019s overall current account surplus is 1.4% of GDP, Japan\u2019s is 3.8 %, Germany\u2019s a whopping 7.9 % and India on the other hand has a deficit of 1.4%<br />\nGerman current account SURPUS \u2014 which measures the flow of goods, services and investments is the world\u2019s largest at $290 billion, followed by Japan with $206 billion.<br />\n<br />\nOn the other hand India's Current Account recorded a DEFICIT of 13.7 Billion USD<br />\n<br />\nA country is said to have a trade surplus if its exports exceed its imports, and a trade deficit if its imports exceed its exports.<br />\n<br />\nThe current account deficit is a measurement of a country\u2019s trade where the value of the goods and services it imports exceeds the value of the goods and services it exports<br />\n<br />\nDONALD THE TRUMP\u2014 FUCK OFF !<br />\n<br />\nTHAMBI TRUMP-- YOU WANT TO INCLUDE THE COST OF THE MEXICAN WALL IN YOUR GDP AND GROWTH ? AIYYOOOOOO !!<br />\n<br />\nThere is NO FUCKIN\u2019 WAY that India will meet all three criteria and be called a manipulator, as it has persistently been running current account deficits since 2004<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nPUT ABOVE COMMENT IN WEBSITES OF--<br />\nPMO<br />\nPM MODI<br />\nARUN JAITLEY<br />\nRBI GOVERNOR<br />\nCOMMERCE MINISTER<br />\nMEA<br />\nSUSHMA SWARAJ<br />\nSWAMY<br />\nGURUMURTHY</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1413990076376439985\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_269M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/04425790986019297380\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Pushpendra singh</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2009/07/vedic-practises-in-mecca-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1524449147788#c1413990076376439985\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 23, 2018 at 7:35 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_269MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nHii captain<br />\nYou always mention br ambedkar as a jew agent but when I discuss it with my shudra friends they used to abuse me for that. font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/02562180040911285851\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Debdoot Sarkar</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/the-pretenders-audrey-truschke-wendy.html?showComment=1524490117786#c5243589307613528320\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 23, 2018 at 6:58 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_101MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nRegistration Number<br />\nMEAPD/E/2018/01109<br />\n<br />\nName Of Complainant<br />\nDebdoot Sarkar<br />\nDate of Receipt<br />\n21 Apr 2018<br />\n<br />\nReceived By Ministry/Department<br />\nMinistry of External Affairs<br />\n<br />\nGrievance Description<br />\n<br />\nNamaskar Kindly acknowledge the below comment taken from Captain Ajit Vadakayils blog IMPORTANT.... IMPORTANT.... WARNING.... KHABARDAARRR..... AT SEA WHEN I HAD TO GLEAN A CRITICAL LAW -- I ASKED MY WIFE TO EXPLAIN IT IN PLAIN ENGLISH .. GO OR NO GO ... BECAUSE SHE HAS NO PRECONCEIVED NOTIONS -- WHILE I HAVE DUE TO MY PAST EXPERIENCE ... THE WRITTEN LAW IS AN IDIOT.. THIS COMMENT IS PACKED WITH WISDOM I HAVE DONE IT EVERYTIME AND WON-- SHOT DOWN PAST PRACTICES CONVERTED TO GOSPEL OVER TIME...&nbsp; <span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>THE WRITTEN LAW IS AN ASS.</b></span>.&nbsp; THIS IS WHY WHEN INDIA GOES TO WTO NAIROBI--I HAD TOLD NIRMALA SITARAMAN --&nbsp; GLEAN WELL BEFORE YOU SIGN..&nbsp; A SIMPLE CHANGE OF WORD FROM SHALL TO SHOULD IN THE TEXT ( CHICANERY ) CAN KILL BHARATMATA...&nbsp; &nbsp;THIS IS WHY NO AGREEMENT MUST BE SIGNED WITHOUT A PARAMOUNT CLAUSE-- IF THIS SIGNED AGREEMENT IMPINGES ON INDIAs SOVEREIGNTY -IT SHALL BE NULL AND VOID EXAMPLE --MOST CRITICAL-- (Developed country Parties SHALL continue taking the lead by undertaking economy-wide absolute emission reduction targets. Developing country Parties SHOULD continue enhancing their mitigation efforts.) In earlier versions of the agreement, the word SHALL in the first sentence had been SHOULD. The change from should to shall introduced new but HUMONGOUS legal and financial requirements. Paris climate deal. Article 4.4 stated: Developing country Parties SHOULD continue enhancing their mitigation efforts.) In other words, the goal of developing countries is to continue improving their efforts to reduce greenhouse gas emissions. The word should does not express a legal requirement. But shall, in the case of the climate agreement, does. Article 4.4 of the Paris climate deal stated that developed countries (shall continue taking the lead by undertaking economy-wide absolute emission reduction targets.) JOHN KERRY HELD UP THE AGREEMENT TILL THE CHANGE WAS DONE SHALL TO SHOULD French leaders told John Kerry that someone must have made a typing mistake. Hours later, delegates from 195 countries were ARM TWISTED into signing the climate deal.&nbsp; &nbsp;THIS IS ONE OF THE MOST POTENT SENTENCES I HAVE WRITTEN IN MY BLOG TILL TODAY&nbsp; &nbsp;capt ajit vadakayil .. Jai Bharata Thanks and Regards Debdoot Sarkar<br />\n<br />\nCurrent Status<br />\nClosed (NO ACTION REQUIRED)<br />\nReason<br />\nOthers<br />\nOfficer Concerns To<br />\nForwarded to<br />\nExternal Affairs<br />\nOfficer Name<br />\nArun K. Chatterjee<br />\nOfficer Designation<br />\nJoint Secretary PSP and CPO<br />\nContact Address<br />\nCPV Division,<br />\n<br />\nPatiala House Annexe,<br />\n<br />\nTilak Marg, New Delhi<br />\nContact Number<br />\n23387013<br />\nEmail Address<br />\njscpo@mea.gov.in<br />\nDate of Action<br />\n23 Apr 2018<br />\n<br />\nDetails<br />\n<br />\nNo appropriate grievance to take up.</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sK6y0z8Vxg4/Wt3uksQUf1I/AAAAAAABa0s/LaIE_271wdIQWjGyjNZHmnTuTPID6JX4gCLcBGAs/s1600/Ddownload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" data-original-height=\"177\" data-original-width=\"236\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sK6y0z8Vxg4/Wt3uksQUf1I/AAAAAAABa0s/LaIE_271wdIQWjGyjNZHmnTuTPID6JX4gCLcBGAs/s400/Ddownload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5324303692705306115\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_127M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/the-pretenders-audrey-truschke-wendy.html?showComment=1524493049886#c5324303692705306115\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 23, 2018 at 7:47 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_127MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nMASS SIGNATURE CAMPAIGN TO IMPEACH CJI, INSTIGATED BY THE ITALIAN WAITRESS<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/05/peer-pressure-jumping-into-bandwagon.html</span><br />\n<br />\nLet me narrate a true incident.<br />\n<br />\nWe were doing our revalidation courses for the Master Mariner\u2019s Certificate of Competency. This meant staying at NIPM Chennai for 5 weeks. There were 78 of us\u2014all ship captains.<br />\n<br />\n( By the way , NIPM campus is a beautiful place on the sea shore, with swimming pool etc and you feel proud of being a part of it. During the tsunami the swimming pool got filled with sea water.)<br />\n<br />\nWe reached the institution the previous day, and went to the mess for a meal. I noticed that there were too many flies , as a sewer drain outside was opened up.<br />\n<br />\nSo I asked for the Canteen manager. While I did that there were 78 Captains watching me, as well as about 50 officer trainee employees from Mumbai port trust.<br />\n<br />\nThe female manager came \u2014she was young , attractive and a divorcee.<br />\n<br />\nI told her \u201c I will give you 48 hours to get rid of these flies. I have not come here to get jaundice or typhoid. All you need to do is to buy two UV fly electro-snappers . If you don\u2019t do that I will stop eating from this mess. And I also have a few suggestions regarding the food\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nShe sat with me for a while and said she will take care of it, and went away.<br />\n<br />\nImmediately the Mumbai port trust party came to me, and said \u201c Sir, we have been staying here for 2 months , and the food is so bad that we cant eat it. We have all lost 5 kilos. Complaining has made NIL difference . But as we can see she is afraid of you\u201d<br />\n<br />\nSo I said \u201c Call her and tell her nicely and she will take care of it . But you must know that she cannot run a loss making business . You eat depending on the budget per head, you Mumbai port trust has negotiated \u201d<br />\n<br />\nThe next day I found that the fly smashers were running and there were NO flies on the table. Rather I could hear the CRACK CRACK sound of the flies getting electrocuted and exploding from the kitchen.<br />\n<br />\nAnd the suddenly comes the Mumbai port trust party. They shoved a long scroll of paper in my face and requested me to sign it.<br />\n<br />\nI found that it was a written complaint, about the poor quality of food already signed by more than 100 souls, which included the sea captains . Basically it was a daily onslaught of South Indian Sambhar, rasam, rice, idly, dosa , uppma , all vegetarian stuff , which can get on the nerves of a North Indian .<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_127BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_126T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_127b+seedfKzD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_126TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_126TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_126TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_127b+seedfKzD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_126TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_126TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_127b+seedfKzD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_126TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_126TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_126TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_127b+seedfKzD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_126B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6590250733483268311\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_126M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/the-pretenders-audrey-truschke-wendy.html?showComment=1524493099640#c6590250733483268311\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 23, 2018 at 7:48 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_126MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nI said \u201c I have never encouraged mass signature campaigns on my ship, and hence I will NOT sign it \u201c<br />\n<br />\nMy room mate ( my senior and good friend ) had already signed it.<br />\n<br />\nIt so transpired that I was the only captain who refused to sign it , along with two Indian Navy ( battle ship ) captains. The Indian Navy Captains were still in Naval service and signing means they would be court martialled.<br />\n<br />\nSo my room mate and friend piled on to me \u201c Ajit, you are the guy who started it all. Now all have signed the complaint except you . Everybody else is talking about you being the black sheep, and some are even saying that the attractive female manager has cast a spell on you \u201d<br />\n<br />\nAnd then he refused to talk to me for 24 hours as a mark of protest- to show how much he was hurt by my behavior.<br />\n<br />\nAfter ten days when the 78 Captains were sitting in the class room, the course head , a senior captain himself came in fuming and he said \u201c Captain Ajit , and the two Naval Captains , please carry on . The rest must continue sitting \u201c.<br />\n<br />\nAnd then behind closed doors he blasted them .<br />\n<br />\nHe said \u201cIf you have a problem with food , why have to not told me first ? Why have you signed a mass signature document, with young Mumbai port trust trainees , on the first day itself, a copy of which has gone to the Mumbai Port trust Chairman ( IAS post ) and the ministry of Shipping? Is this the level of your maturity and professionalism ? If you want more chicken, fish etc all you got to do is to pay more and this can be discussed and arranged as part of the course fee \u201d<br />\n<br />\nNeedless to say all the 75 Captains apologized and felt like pieces of sh#t.<br />\n<br />\nLater, when they came to the residential quarters I was sitting all alone in the lawn, with the Navy Captains.<br />\n<br />\nThey all grinned and said \u201cAjit, you are the only smart guy. We just got our balls royally chewed up\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nI replied \u201c Jumping into the bandwagon, is NOT programmed into my DNA\u201d<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_127b+seedfKzD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_127b+seedfKzD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; Ajit VadakayilMarch 10, 2018 at 11:04 AM<br />\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_187MC\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/sailors-do-cry-capt-ajit-vadakayil_20.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIt is the true story of my handsome colleague, who slit his wrists 3 times , unable to handle the diabolical games of his wife.<br />\n<br />\nAfter 2 years of marriage , she left him for a film producer who promised to make her a Bollywood actress, and she was indeed beautiful.<br />\n<br />\nShe forced him to sign the divorce papers , as soon as he landed up in his house after a hard contract on a ship. The previous 2 contracts she sailed with him on the ship. He was removing his shoes , after touching his mother's feet , when she thrust the divorce papers before him- -and commanded him \" Sign here!\" .<br />\n<br />\nWhen he tried to reason with her , as they dated for 6 years before marriage, she threatened to throw his mother in jail for dowry harrassment and attempted bride burning. She had it all worked out, with the rich film producer's connivance.<br />\n<br />\nLater , after 14 months , she came back grovelling, and asked him to remarry her -- the producer just USED her from all 3 orifices for a year -- if you know what I mean..<br />\n<br />\nMy friend had just recovered from depression . He showed her the three scars on his wrist and asked her \" What would you do , if you were in my place\".<br />\n<br />\nMen don't go on TV and tell such sob stories.<br />\n<br />\nDOES THE SUPREME COURT KNOW THE AMOUNT OF ABUSE AND MENTAL TRAUMA OLD RETIRED MEN WHO HAVE STOPPED EARNING, ARE SUBJECTED TO BY THE DAUGHTER IN LAW AND HER FAMILY ?<br />\n<br />\nWHY ARE GENDER LAWS TILTED IN FAVOR OF THE FEMALE, AGAINST PROVISIONS OF OUR CONSTITUTION ?<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/01/dubious-role-of-bilderberg-club-created.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; She was faoured as she has taught some dance to Bianca - nay- Priyanka Gandhi<br />\n<br />\nLeela allegedly faked her qualifications to become Director of Kalakshetra in 2005.<br />\n<br />\nThe first thing she did after her appointment was elimination of the spiritual roots of Bharata Natyam. She ordered removal of all Ganesha and Nataraja statues from the campus (despite heavy student &amp; faculty protest) calling it 'Hindu superstition'.<br />\n<br />\nShe changed the logo(which was there since 1936) because it had Lord Natraja Ganesha with Lord Shiva\u2018s Emblem. Again, citing superstition.<br />\n<br />\nShe demolished the temple structure of the Kalakshetra Auditorium with the excuse of modernising it.<br />\n<br />\nDespite being over age, she was given a grand extension and made the Censor Board Chief. Her own cinema knowledge was near zero but she used to call most members of the board uneducated and an embarrassment.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">JEWESS LEELA SAMSON INTRODUCED SEXUAL DEBAUCHERY AND HOMOSEXUALITY ON INDIAN SCREEN</span></div>\n<br />\nAs a censor board chairperson , she'd routinely pass cinemas ridiculing Hindu beliefs in name of freedom of expression<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">She is the daughter of Vice-Admiral Benjamin Abraham Samson a Rothschild stooge.</span><br />\n<br />\nRABIDLY ANTI-HINDU LEELA SAMSON PASSED THE AAMIR KHAN MOVIE PK WITHOUT ANY CUTS<br />\n<br />\nShe was later accused of double standards and selective anti-Hindu bias, because only a few weeks later, she refused to clear another movie MSG: The Messenger of God made by Dera Sacha Sauda founder Gurmeet Ram Rahim Singh and attempted to ban it instead..<br />\n<br />\nIT IS BHARATMATAs MISFORTUNE THAT JEWESS LEELA SAMSON WAS BORN IN INDIA.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; A messianic CEOs can never come to see the company they run as being public-- they see the company as being theirs.<br />\n<br />\nApple lived by their icon. They could have very well impaled themselves on this icon, for all we care. In my scheme of affairs glitzy I Pad and I Phone means nothing.<br />\n<br />\nWithout any formal training in electronics and computer science and without commensurate achievements a narcissist expects royal treatment.<br />\n<br />\nUnlike Bill Gates , Steve Jobs loved to see his name on top of every list. He overexamined and downgraded other people, projects, statements, or dreams in an unrealistic manner.<br />\n<br />\nSteve Jobs had this grandiose sense of self-importance. Narcissism, also called malignant self love-- the trait of excessive self-love, is rooted in ego.<br />\n<br />\nNarcissistic personality disorder is closely linked to self-centeredness. . He is interpersonally exploitative, i.e., takes advantage of others<br />\n<br />\nHere was a man who overpriced everything he sold and sued everyone that made the product better.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Steve fuckin' Jobs has listed himself as CO-INVENTOR of 103 separate Apple patents. Just like Edison who never invented a single thing, but has maximum patents in his name -- everything was done by the scientists he employed, but hogged all credit for himself.</span></div>\n<br />\nSteve Jobs could NOT settle upon a suitable successor, despite bad health . His messianic sense of self would not allow that process to be set in motion.<br />\n<br />\nCalling him a visionary is an insult to people like Nikola Tesla who really are. Never confuse invention with innovation. Furthermore never confuse innovation with glorified craftmanship.<br />\n<br />\nHe denied his own once-illegitimate daughter and she had to live on welfare for 2 years because he just being himself. He even denied paternity by claiming he was sterile.<br />\n<br />\nWhy do people all over the world use Windows? Because Steve Jobs was being himself when his king sized ego forced him to lock Apple out of the market.<br />\n<br />\nAny idiot can surround himself with outstanding geniuses in the field and harrass them in a mean manner, till they deliver a damn good product--and then claim all the credit for himself.<br />\n<br />\nThis is only possible in an organisation which Steve Jobs lead , where there was NIL transparency and everything is on a strict \"need to know\" basis.<br />\n<br />\nPeople with a Messiah complex tend to be controllers and manipulators. They will use emotional triggers e.g. \u201cWe must do it for our children\u201d and \u201cThink of the penquins \u201d etc.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/steve-jobs-answer-is-blowing-in-wind.html</span><br />\n<br />\nIT TAKES A CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL TO EVALUATE THIS ASSHOLE..<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c151887788941396978\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_132M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. THIS OASIS WAS A FREE TRADE SPICE OUTPOST..<br />\n<br />\nFROM HERE SPICES WENT TO THE MEDITERRANEAN BY CAMELS--TO PALESTINE ..<br />\n<br />\nFROM THE SEA PORTS OF PALESTINE WHITE JEWS TOOK OVER THE SPICES TO BE TAKEN IN SHIPS TO EUROPE.. THESE SHIPS WERE OWNED FIRST BY THE FAMILY OF PORTUGUESE JEWESS GRACIA MENDES NASI AND GERMAN JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br />\n<br />\nSHIPS OF GRACIA MENDES NASI FAMILY LOADED SPICES FROM CONSTANTINOPLE ( TURKEY ) FOR SALE IN EUROPE<br />\n<br />\nSHIPS OF ROTHSCHILD LOADED SPICES FROM PALESTINE AND BATUMI ( GEORGIA -- KHAZARIA) FOR ONWARD TRANSMISSION TO EUROPE.<br />\n<br />\nISTANBUL TURKEY HAD THE FIRST JEWISH DEEP STATE ON THIS PLANET ..<br />\n<br />\nAFTER CALICUT KINGs SHIPS UNLOADED SPICES IN GWADAR, THE OVERLAND MULES AND CAMELS TOOK OVER FOR TRANSPORT TO BATUMI ( GEORGIA ) AND CONSTANTINOPLE ( TURKEY )..<br />\n<br />\nTHESE PORTS IN ISRAEL/ TURKEY / GEORGIA PROSPERED AS SPICES WERE MORE VALUABLE THAN GOLD THOSE DAYS --WHEN THERE WAS NO REFRIGERATION AND MEAT BECAME PUTRID..<br />\n<br />\nI WONDER OF THE GRUESOME THREESOME OF AUDREY BABY, POLLOCK BABY AND WENDY BABY KNOWS ALL THIS..<br />\n<br />\nWE WILL BURN ALL FALSE HISTORY WRITTEN BY JEWS ..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/the-pretenders-audrey-truschke-wendy.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_199BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; INCLUDING PATRON FOUNDER SIR SYED AHMAN KHAN WHO WAS AN AGENT OF JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD USED HIS JEW AGENTS HIS HIGHNESS&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">SIR MOHAMMAD ALI MOHAMMAD KHAN AND AGHA KHAN III</span></b>&nbsp;AS FRONTS FOR FUND COLLECTION AND TO DO PROPAGANDA FOR AMU.<br />\n<br />\nROTHSCHILD MADE CRYPTO JEW SIR MOHAMMAD ALI MOHAMMAD KHAN THE PRESIDENT OF ALL INDIA MUSLIM LEAGUE CONFERENCES FOR MORE THAN A DECADE.. HE WAS THE FIRST VC OF AMU..<br />\n<br />\nJEW SIR AGA KHAN WAS MADE THE PRO-CHANCELLOR OR AMU.<br />\n<br />\nJEWESS<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;KAIKHUSRAU JAHAN</span></b>&nbsp;, BEGUM OF BHOPAL WAS THE CHANCELLOR OF AMU. .. IMAGINE A WOMAN CHANCELLOR OF A MUSLIM UNIVERSITY--ONLY ROTHSCHILD COULD HAVE PULLED THAT OFF.<br />\n<br />\nEVEN BEFORE WORLD WAR 1 STARTED ROTHSCHILD MADE HER THE PRESIDENT OF ALL INDIA MUSLIM LEAGUE LADIES ASSOCIATION.. SHE WAS MADE DAME GRAND CROSS OF THE BRITISH EMPIRE.. BAAP REH !<br />\n<br />\nHER SON JEW&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">HAMIDULLAH KHAN&nbsp;</span></b>WAS AN AGENT OF ROTHSCHILD..HE WAS MADE CHANCELLOR OF THE CHAMBER OF PRINCES.&nbsp; &nbsp;SIR HAMIDULLAH KHAN HE WAS MADE CHANCELLOR OF AMU FOR 5 YEARS ..&nbsp; HAMIDULLAH KHANs GRAND DAUGHER WAS MARRIED TO NAWAB OF PATAUDI (&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">KAREENA KAPOORs FATHER-IN-LAW</span></b>&nbsp;)...<br />\n<br />\nJEW<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;SIR MUHAMMED IQBAL&nbsp;</span></b>( POET ) IS PAKISTANs NO 1 CITIZEN..<br />\n<br />\nAt Heidelberg Germany, one street ( at Marriott Hotel over looking river Neckar ) is named after Iqbal called IQBAL UFER-- thanks to German Jew Rothschild..Rothschild rewarded him for his role in pouring cold water over Muslim world anger over Palestine and ending the powerful Ottoman empire at Turkey.<br />\n<br />\nIqbal was first noticed by Rothschild , as a piece of clay to be molded, when he wrote something which surprised everybody.<br />\n<br />\nUpon the death of Queen Victoria in 1901, Dr. Iqbal penned an epicedium of ten pages, entitled \u201cTears of Blood \u201c.<br />\n<br />\nThe Queen died on the day of Eid-ul-Fitr, and Iqbal the slave wrote : ---<br />\n\"Happiness came, but grief came along with it,<br />\nYesterday was Eid, but today muharram<br />\n(Month of the year associated with the deepest mourning<br />\nfor Muslims) came.<br />\n<br />\n\"Easier than the grief and mourning of this day,<br />\nWould be the coming of the morn of the day of judgment.<br />\n<br />\n\"Ah! the Queen of the realm of the heart has passed away,<br />\nMy scarred heart has become a house of mourning.<br />\n<br />\n\"O India, thy lover has passed away,<br />\nShe who sighed at thy troubles has passed away.<br />\n<br />\n\"O India, the protective shadow of God has<br />\nbeen lifted from above you,<br />\nShe who sympathised with your inhabitants has gone.<br />\n<br />\n\"Victoria is not dead as her good name remains,<br />\nthis is the life to whomever God gives it.<br />\n<br />\n\"May the deceased receive abundant heavenly<br />\nreward, and may we show goodly patience.\"<br />\n<br />\n(Baqiyyat-i Iqbal, Poem runs over pages 71\u2013 90.)<br />\n<br />\nSOB--SOB--CRY--CRY!!<br />\n<br />\nIn December 1911, on the occasion of the coronation of King George V, Iqbal wrote and read out a poem entitled `Our King':<br />\n<br />\n\"It is the height of our good fortune,<br />\nThat our King is crowned today.<br />\n<br />\n\"By his life our peoples have honour,<br />\nBy his name our respect is established.<br />\n<br />\n\"With him have the Indians made a bond of loyalty,<br />\nOn the dust of his footsteps are our hearts sacrifced.\"<br />\n(Baqiyyat-i Iqbal, p. 206.)<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_172BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/hum-honge-kaamyaab-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1525355836237#c3607206873792887446\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 3, 2018 at 7:27 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_169MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2018/may/03/donald-trump-trade-economists-warning-great-depression</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">ALL THESE 14 NOBEL PRIZE WINNING ECONOMISTS ARE JEW ROTHSCHILDs AGENTS., WHO DO NOT UNDERSTAND REAL ECONOMICS</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/gpi-dog-shall-wag-gdp-tail-not-vice.html</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">IT IS A CRYING SHAME \u2013&nbsp; TILL TODAY NOBODY KNEWS HOW GOLDEN CAR CITY OF FORD BECAME A GRAVEYARD..&nbsp; &nbsp;IT TAKES AN INDIAN BLOGGER TO REVEAL THIS.</span></span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Detroit produced more than 5.4 million vehicles in 1929.. The Detroit car workers were the highest paid not only in USA but the whole world.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Ford paid 5.30 USD a day per day \u2014 more than twice what Chrysler and Chevrolet were paying. Ford could afford to. 57% of the cars in the whole world were Fords. 255 Ford cars were produced every hour; more than 6,100 per day.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The country was paving roads and building bridges. More cars were creating more jobs making steel, glass and rubber. Detroit was booming. People were coming from across the continent, and even as far away as Europe.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: medium;\">Ford was the most important man in the most important industry in the most important economy in the world. Till he got on the wrong side of Jew Rothschild..</span></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">On Tuesday, Oct. 29, 1929 the stock market crashed. It was engineered by Jew Rothschild\u2019s agents .. By 1930, the greatest economy in the history of the world had collapsed.</span></span></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Unemployed workers don\u2019t buy a new car; unemployed auto workers don\u2019t buy a new refrigerator; unemployed refrigerator workers don\u2019t buy new anything. Pretty soon you have a full-scale depression.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In Detroit, Prohibition had been in effect for 10 years, but KOSHER nightclubs thrived and KOSHER funded gangs controlled the liquor trade. Auto production in Detroit plummeted.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A wave of bank closures wiped out the life savings of many unemployed workers and retirees, as every neighborhood bank ( Rothschild controlled ) in Detroit went out of business. There was no Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation insurance on bank deposits then.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On March 7, 1932 , 5900 unemployed Ford car workers marched in the Ford Hunger March from Detroit to Ford's River Rouge plant in Dearborn ( the main Ford factory that housed the company's employment office)-- organized by Rothschild\u2019s agent commie JEW John Schmies, communist candidate for mayor of Detroit, and led by German Jew Albert Goetz.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On March 6, William Z. Foster, secretary of the Communist labor federation known as the Trade Union Unity League, gave a speech in Detroit in preparation for the march. There were 14 demands that the marchers intended to present to Henry Ford who had insulted JEWS.. The workers' fourteen-point list of demands included jobs for laid-off employees, the right to organize unions, and highly increased wages.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">By 1932, foreclosures, evictions, repossessions and bankruptcies were commonplace, and the unemployed felt despair. Rotshchild\u2019s commie agent JEW William Z. Foster was the General Secretary of the party in 1929 with the support of the Comintern ( Communist International) of JEW Lenin..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">William Z. Foster ran for President of the United States on the Communist Party ticket.. This commie party was led by NEOCONS ( Jewish commies ).</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">On March 12, 1932, more than 67000 people participated in a funeral procession for the four dead marchers, who were buried side by side in Woodmere Cemetery in Detroit. The slogan of the funeral march was \"Smash the Ford Terror\".&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Detroit Mayor Frank Murphy in the payroll of Jew Rothschild called Henry Ford a \"terrible man\".</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Nine years later, on April 11, 1941, after a ten-day sit down strike by 42,000 Ford workers, Henry Ford was armtwisted into signing a collective bargaining agreement with the United Auto Workers union ( UAW ) which gave full control of Ford industry to Jew Rothschild.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span><br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_169MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\"><br /><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_169BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_170M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/hum-honge-kaamyaab-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1525355925754#c557889729476440682\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 3, 2018 at 7:28 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_170MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nAfter the stock market crash of 1929, around 85 percent of the industry was no longer producing and by 1932 large numbers of Detroit's citizens were dying of starvation. The Ford Motor Company, one of the richest employers, had laid off 74% of its employees as they company ran into huge losses .<br />\n<br />\nOn Nov. 17, 1933, the United States recognized the Soviet government of JEW Stalin\u2014an agent of Jew Rothschild.<br />\n<br />\nIn 1935 JEW Franklin Roosevelt\u2019s signing of the Wagner Act helped the cause for unionization, guaranteeing workers the right to collective bargaining.<br />\n<br />\nOn 1 April 1941, Ford workers conducted a walkout in order to protest the firing of eight union members. Because of the strike, the River Rouge plant was forced to close down. On 11 April, 1941 Henry Ford agreed to sign a contract with the United Auto Workers union ( UAW ) , enabling all Ford workers to be protected under the union.</div>\n<div>\n<b style=\"color: magenta; font-size: x-large;\">THIS IS WHAT HAPPENS WHEN YOU FUCK AROUND WITH JEW JOHN GALT.</b></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/05/hum-honge-kaamyaab-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO&nbsp;<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">58.08 %</span></b></div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 3, 2018 at 8:53 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_173MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDear Cap'n,<br />\n<br />\nWhy did Henry Ford rub them the wrong way? Was it due to him publishing 'The protocols of the elders of Zion' through the newspaper in 1920?<br />\nWho wrote it in Russia originally?</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_173MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_173BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_173B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_174B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8552130792182231445\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_174M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/hum-honge-kaamyaab-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1525364282041#c8552130792182231445\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 3, 2018 at 9:48 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_174MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nIn 1918, Henry Ford purchased his hometown newspaper, The Dearborn Independent\u2014breaking Rothschild\u2019s monopoly over US media.<br />\n<br />\nA year and a half later, he began publishing a series of articles that claimed a vast Jewish conspiracy ( led by a German Jew named Rothschild ) was infecting America. The series ran in the following 91 issues.<br />\n<br />\nFord bound the articles into four volumes titled \"The International Jew,\" and distributed half a million copies to his vast network of dealerships and subscribers</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">Ford was rich and powerful, but he did NOT know the extent of Rothschild\u2019s power, and his control over judges, police , mafia and White House. .</span></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\nThroughout The Dearborn Independent, Ford published articles that would refer to Jews in every possible context as at the root of America and the world's ills. Strikes: It was the Jews. Any kind of financial scandal? The Jews. Agricultural depression? The Jews. So \"the Jew,\" in a way, became the symbol of a world that was being manipulated and controlled.<br />\n<br />\nFORD TOLD THE NAKED TRUTH..<br />\n<br />\nWhat Henry Ford says, people stop and listen. There are people who talked about him as a potential presidential candidate in the 1920s. Henry Ford's ability to gain a national audience with his words made him a very dangerous person for Rothschild and his Jewish cabal.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild whipped up passions and wrote things that Ford never said-- that the Jew as a particular social type who had defective mental and moral abilities\u2014that the Jews killed Christ ( who never existed ) \u2013 that the Jews made money off the war, the Jews are profiteers, that the the Jews cheat you in business\u2014that the Jews have a certain phenotype: the Jew has a hook nose, the Jew is loud, the Jew talks with his hands BLAH BLAH.<br />\n<br />\nThe Protocols of the Elders of Zion originally came from Russia, and was translated into English. The Protocols, was the record of secret meetings of Jewish leaders, describes a sinister Jewish conspiracy to dominate the world.<br />\n<br />\nThe term \u201cProtocols of The Wise Elders of Zion\u201d, was coined by German Jewish Jesuit Adam Weishaupt and his master, Mayer Amschel Rothschild (1776). Adam Wesihaupt would later murder George Washington and take the chair of the US President , without anybody knowing .. The details of the French revolution was chalked out by Adam Weishaupt.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/the-french-revolution-conceived-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nEvery iconic building in Washington DC had a cornerstone laid down under a Masonic ritual (i.e. Capitol building -laid by George Washington ( actually German Jew Adam Weishaupt ) , the Washington Monument, the Smithsonian, the White House, the Independence Hall in Philadelphia -laid by Benjamin Franklin etc<br />\n<br />\nModel T Ford, launched in Detroit in 1908.. Ford's Model T was successful not only because it provided inexpensive transportation on a massive scale, but also because the car signified innovation for the rising middle class and became a powerful symbol of America's age of modernization.. The Model T was Ford's first automobile mass-produced on moving assembly lines with completely interchangeable parts, marketed to the middle class. Model T became so famous, people considered it a norm. More than 15 million Model Ts were manufactured in all, reaching a rate of more than 10,000 cars a day in 1925, or 2 million annually..<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">The Model T and Volkswagen are similar cars because the Germans Jew workers stole the Ford design and sent it to Germany. .</span></div>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">Volkswagen was automaker founded on 28 May 1937 by the German Labour Front under JEW Adolf Hitler and headquartered in Wolfsburg. Rothschild was a sleeping partner with major stake in the car factory.</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">\n</span>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">To sell his Volkswagen cars Rothschild needed to STOP the export of Ford cars to Europe. Pretty soon Volkswagen knocked of Ford\u2019s Model T as the No 1 selling car.</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">\n</span>\nMY REVELATIOS NOW JUMP TO&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\"><b>58.09 %</b></span><br />\n<br />\nI AM REVEALING ONLY 2%<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</li>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-0Gvy5mBcipE/WlAJZNfU3zI/AAAAAAABXsU/wZaBJr4cOoclmnshY0dz6Y3NbokDpLaaACK4BGAYYCw/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2514935488816632213\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_190M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/hum-honge-kaamyaab-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html?showComment=1525367274643#c2514935488816632213\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 3, 2018 at 10:37 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_190MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/hum-honge-kaamyaab-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe International Jew is a four-volume set of books which exposed Rothschild and his Jews.. It was distributed in the early 1920s by Henry Ford.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_International_Jew</span><br />\n<br />\nThe Dearborn Independent, also known as The Ford International Weekly, was a weekly newspaper established in 1901, and published by Henry Ford from 1919 through 1927. The paper reached a circulation of 900,000 by 1925, second only to the New York Daily News run from the shadows by Jew Rothschild.<br />\n<br />\nHenry Ford knew that Jew Rothschild would start world wars to carve out the state of Israel and to make money out of war. Ford wrote that parasite Jews, in their role as financiers, contributed nothing of value to society.<br />\n<br />\nFord once bit into a candy bar and, finding it not as good as it once had been, said \"The Jews have taken hold of it. They've cheapened it to make more money\".<br />\n<br />\nIn 1915 Ford blamed Jews for instigating World War I, saying \"I know who caused the war: German-Jewish bankers.\"<br />\n<br />\nIn 1925, Ford said \"What I oppose most is the international Jewish money power that is met in every war. That is what I oppose \u2013 a power that has no country and that can order the young men of all countries out to death.\"<br />\n<br />\nOne of the articles, \"Jewish Power and America's Money Famine\", asserted that the power exercised by Jews over the nation's supply of money was insidious, depriving farmers and others outside the banking coterie of money when they needed it most. The article asked the question: \"Where is the American gold supply? ... It may be in the United States but it does not belong to the United States.\" It concluded that Jews controlled the gold supply and, hence, American money<br />\nAnother article, \"Jewish Idea Molded Federal Reserve System\", was a reflection of Ford's distrust of the Federal Reserve System and its proponent, Paul Warburg. Ford believed the Federal Reserve system was secretive and insidious<br />\n<br />\nMany issues of the Independent comment extensively upon The Protocols of the Elders of Zion. The first mention of the Protocols appears in the issue of July 10, 1920, the seventh installment of its \"International Jew\" series.<br />\n<br />\nAlso, in 1920\u201321 the Independent carried a series of articles expanding on the themes of financial control by Jews, entitled:-----<br />\n<br />\nJewish Idea in American Monetary Affairs: The remarkable story of Paul Warburg, who began work on the United States monetary system after three weeks residence in this country<br />\nJewish Idea Molded Federal Reserve System: What Baruch was in War Material, Paul Warburg was in War Finances; Some Curious revelations of money and politics.<br />\nJewish Idea of a Central Bank for America: The evolution of Paul M. Warburg's idea of Federal Reserve System without government management.<br />\nHow Jewish International Finance Functions: The Warburg family and firm divided the world between them and did amazing things which non-Jews could not do<br />\nJewish Power and America's Money Famine: The Warburg Federal Reserve sucks money to New York, leaving productive sections of the country in disastrous need.<br />\nThe Economic Plan of International Jews: An outline of the Protocolists' monetary policy, with notes on the parallel found in Jewish financial practice.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/murky-truths-of-inflation-and.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/worth-more-than-sum-total-of-entire.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe ADL mobilized prominent Jews to publicly oppose Ford's message. They formed a coalition of Jewish groups for the same purpose and raised constant objections in the Detroit press. Before leaving his presidency early in 1921, Rothschild\u2019s agent Woodrow Wilson joined other leading Americans in a statement that rebuked Ford and others for their antisemitic campaign<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2930004106286602291\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc;
