Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nJanuary 4, 2018 at 11:38 AM<br />\n<br />\nhttps://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/nostradamus-predicted-in-21st-century-worlds-best-actor-will-be-from-india-jignesh-mevani-mocks-pm-narendra-modi/articleshow/62361212.cms<br />\n<br />\nTIME TO BREAK THE BIGGEST BOMBSHELL OF 2018..<br />\n<br />\nTHE LEGEND OF CHRISTIAN NOSTRADAMUS WAS CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD ( FRENCH BRANCH )..<br />\n<br />\nNOSTRADAMUS WAS A JEW\u2026<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE READ HIS BOOK OF PREDICTIONS AT THE AGE OF 11.. THE BOOKS IS STILL IN MY HOME LIBRARY..<br />\n<br />\nHIS QUATRAINS ARE VAGUE\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nPEOPLE LIKE HITLERs NAME WAS CONVERTED TO HISTER TO ACCOMODATE THE PREDICTIONS..<br />\n<br />\nJEW HITLER WAS USED BY ROTHSCHILD TO CARVE OUT ISRAEL -- HIS ORIGINAL NAME WAS NOT HILTER ( BUT HEIDLER AS PER SCHOOL RECORDS )-- IT WAS GRANTED TO HIM..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS A PERFECT CASE OF CREATING TRUTHS VIA THE BACK DOOR..<br />\n<br />\nDURING WW1 AND WW2 --ROTHSCHILD DROPPED LEAFLETS ALL OVER EUROPE QUOTING NOSTRADAMUS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe book of predictions is Les Propheties, a collection of 942 poetic quatrains allegedly predicting future events. The book was first published in 1555 and has rarely been out of print since his death. ..WHY ?..<br />\n<br />\nWHO IS SO KEEN ON PROPAGATING THE FAME AND POWERS ( SIC) OF NOSTRADAMUS ..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">JEW NOSTRADAMUS WAS MADE POPULAR BY HIS ALMANAC WHICH WAS LIFTED FROM KERALA ..</span></span></div>\n<br />\nCapt Ajit Vadakayil declares today at 1105 AM, on 4th Jan 2018-- SATYA VACHAN that Nostradamus's predictions have been DELIBERATELY kept vague-- they could be applied to virtually anything, and are 100% useless for determining whether Nostradamus had any real prophetic powers. ..<br />\n<br />\nMost of the quatrains deal with disasters, such as plagues, earthquakes, wars, floods, invasions, murders, droughts, and battles\u2014all undated-..<br />\n<br />\nANY CHARLATAN CAN WRITE SUCH QUATRAINS \u2026<br />\n<br />\nOUR OWN VEDAS HAS SUCH COOKED UP VERSES INJECTED --BY JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">THE FRENCH REVOLUTION WAS WORKED VIA BACKDOOR BY FRENCH ROTHSCHILDs FREEMASONS --THIS WAS THE FIRST REAL VICTORY OF FAKE NOSTRADAMUS..</span></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/the-french-revolution-conceived-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nBELOW IS THE FRENCH REVOLUTION PREDICTION..( BULLSHIT )..<br />\n<br />\nTHE TRUTH IS ROTHSCHILDs MEDIA LIE THAT THEY HEARD THE QUEEN SAYING \"IF PEOPLE DONT HAVE BREAD LET THEM EAT CAKE \"..<br />\n<br />\nCentury VI.--Quatrain 74.<br />\n<br />\nLa. dechass\u00e9e 1 an regne tournera,<br />\nSes ennemies trouv\u00e9s des conjur\u00e9s:<br />\nPlus que jamais son temps triomphera,<br />\nTrois et septante \u00e0 mort trop asseur\u00e9s.<br />\n<br />\nTranslation.<br />\n<br />\nShe who was proscribed will return to the kingdom,<br />\nHer enemies will be treated as conspirators;<br />\nMore than ever her time (or empire) will triumph;<br />\nSeventy-three years its deathly domination is assured.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://www.sacred-texts.com/nos/oon/oon15.htm</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHis astrologies were disastrously wrong, containing flagrant astronomical errors\u2014we in Kerala know astronomy..<br />\n<br />\nHe did not use a bowl of water as a \"magic mirror\" when writing his prophecies, he used a regular mirror. ..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD MATCHED HIS DEATH DATE ON LATER EDITIONS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIf he predicted his own death in Presage 141, he missed it by a year \u2014 so some editions show a version of that Presage posthumously edited by his secretary to match the correct date\u2026<br />\n<br />\nNostradamus was reputed to be a plague doctor\u2014he knew SHIT about plague..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD GAVE BULL THAT NOSTRADAMUS WAS BURIED UPRIGHT LIKE HINDU JIVAN MUKTS .. IN REALITY HE WAS BURIED IN LYING POSITION<br />\n<br />\nThe RIDICULOUS tale about Nostradamus is that he was buried standing up so that nobody would step on his grave; and when his body was later disinterred during the French Revolution to be relocated, he was wearing a FORGED medallion on which the exact date of the disinterment was engraved\u2026<br />\n<br />\nI have two editions of his book Les Propheties\u2014both are different to accommodate LIES converted to truths ..<br />\n<br />\nVarious versions were published during his lifetime, and there is no one authoritative collection<br />\n<br />\nOver 200 different translations and interpreted versions have been published since his death, so the folly of hoping to find Nostradamus' original text is IMPOSSIBLE..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_15MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_15BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; Nobody has ever used Nostradamus' writings to predict a future event in specific terms which later came true.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Nostradamus' writings are exploited in a number of fallacious ways. Ambiguous and wrong translations, \"creative\" interpretations, hoax writings, fictional accounts, and the breaking of non-existent codes within his quatrains all contribute to a vast body of BULLSHIT work, all of it wrong, and many times the size of everything Nostradamus ever actually wrote\u2026</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">IT WAS ONLY USED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD FOR FAKE PROPAGANDA \u2013WITH THE SINGLE MINDED AIM OF CARVING OUT ISRAEL..</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THIS IS LIKE OUR JESUS WHEN THE LETTER J NEVER EXISTED TILL THE 17TH CENTURY !..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Rothschild\u2019s histrorians gave bull that fear of prosecution by POPE for heresy compelled Nostradamus to write only vaguely, but there is no historical evidence for this\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Some books and websites even go so far as to allege the presence of meaningful anagrams found in modern English translations, or even more strangely, English anagrams found within French translations\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Erika Cheetham\u2014an agent of Jew Rothschild was involed in MODERN bull..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Cheetham's books were full of historical events into which she shoehorned Nostradamus' quatrains, with word, name and number substitutions whenever convenient, and she called them \"amazingly accurate predictions\".</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Occasionally she went out on a limb and made future predictions, and when those years came and went with none of her predictions coming true, she'd issue updated editions of her books with new names and dates and make the same tired old predictions again. First she interpreted references to Moammar Qaddafi, and later changed them to the Ayatollah Khomeini, and later changed them again to Saddam Hussein..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NEW YORK NEVER EXISTED DURING TIMES OF NOSTRADAMUS .. IT IS NOT THERE IN THE BOOK I READ IN MY CHILDHOOD\u2014WHICH IS IN MY LIBRARY ( BROUGH FROM AN OLD CALICUT BOOK STORE \u2013PROPERTY OF AN ENGLISHMAN IN CALICUT WHO DIED 150 YEARS AGO ) ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 8, 2018 at 2:57 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_167MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nHi Captain,<br />\n<br />\nThis comment is copied from t comment section of Rajiv Malhotra's wall on fb ....an \"Agma Pride\" guy is demeaning Sanskirt .....and many other \"Agma pride\" guys hv liked his comment ...I was very tempted to answer his comment with facts but refrained myself as it would b like hitting head against wall<br />\n<br />\nhere is t comment made by \"agma pride\"<br />\n<br />\n\"Why can't we take it as artha sastra was copied from Thirukural. Sanskrit has no script till date. It depends upon the script of other languages. Tamil has the script very long back . It has been proved by the excavations conducted in various places including Egypt and Thailand. Jaffna site is one among those in which Tamil script was found used during BC 1500 Years. The word Thirazh muri which means an agenda approved in a meeting. Such a valid proof is available for Tamil Language.No other language has such a valid proof as Tamil has. Except Asokas script in India all other scripts are found during Guptas period only. In Asoka's script was not used to write Sanskrit. So all the Sanskrit literatures were written around A.D. 4 th century. But Thirukural was written during BC 2 nd century . As such how this gentleman Nagasamy does claim that Thirukural is the copy of Artha Sastra. Same philosophy may reflect in different literatures. Only timeline will decide which one is copied from which one. Is is not humour a language which has not script at all can be taken as the pioneer for all other literatures of other language Tamil Which has the script discovered before 3500 years. More over Sanskrit means \"corrected one\". By its name itself certainly Sanskrit may be derived language. So all the Sanskrit literatures might have been copied from other indian languages like Tamil. Mr. Nagasamy's voice may be from his haterdness on Tamils. This Rajive Malhotra has tried to destabilise the Tamil forum reasonably formed in Basten University.\" BY \u0ba4.\u0b95. \u0ba8\u0bbf\u0ba4\u0bbf<br />\n<br />\nI JUST DON'T UNDERSTAND Y T HELL THEY HAVE SO MUCH HATRED FOR SANSKRIT?? I HV NOT COME ACROSS A SINGLE TAMIL WHO HAD NOT TRIED TO DEMEAN SANSKRIT JUST TO PROVE TAMIL AS T OLDEST LANGUAGE ...SANSKRIT IS T SOUL OF HINDUISM ...HOW CAN ANY HINDU HATE IT?? IT IS LIKE JEWS HATING HEBREW ...I HV NOT COME ACROSS A SINGLE MUSLIM WHO HATES ARABIC ...FORGET ABT ARABIC, THEY EVEN LOVE URDU EVEN SOUTH INDIAN MUSLIMS ...IF SOUTH INDIAN MUSLIMS LOVE URDU OVER THEIR MOTHER TONGUE THEN WHAT CONCLUSION ONE SHOULD MAKE OUT?? ...I HV NOT SEEN A SINGLE SOUTH INDIAN MUSLIM BOYCOTTING URDU AS IT IS NOT THEIR MOTHER TONGUE ...EVEN POLITICAL PARTIES WHO ARE ON RAMPAGE AGAINST HINDI IN SOUTH INDIAN STATES( WHICH IS RIGHT THING AS HINDI HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH SOUTH INDIA) DO NOT UTTER A SINGLE WORD AGAINST URDU WHICH IS AGAIN NORTH INDIAN LANGUAGE (IN FACT HINDI IS MORE INDIAN THAN URDU) ....SUCH IS T LEVEL OF HYPOCRISY...SOME SOUTH INDIAN STATES HAVE EVEN DECLARED URDU AS SECOND STATE LANGUAGE ...PEOPLE HAVE PROBLEM WITH HINDI BUT NOT URDU , OK FINE BUT WHY DEMEAN SANSKRIT, T SOLE OF HINDUISM??</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_167BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Some of the padres were professional printers and linguists in religious garb. To convert they need the Bible in local language.<br />\n<br />\nThe Italian priest Robert de Nobili (1577-1656). d called himself a \u2018Roman Brahmin\u2019.Let me list out a few 3 in 1 missionaries\u2014padre/ printer/ proselytisers. Italian missionary, Constantine Joseph Beschi (1680-1746), who called himself Veeramaamunivar (Veer-Maha-Munivar), German missionary Barthalomaus Ziegenbalg (1683-1719) who called himself Ziegenbalg Iyer, Englishman G.U. Pope (1820-1907) who called himself \u201cPope Iyer.\u201d, Scotsman Robert Caldwell (1814-1891) who along with his wife Elissa Mault did massive conversions by offering sops, Portuguese missionary John De Britto etc etc.<br />\n<br />\nThe Madras Catholic Diocese, has been on a amazing campaign that, \u201cThiruvalluvar was a disciple of St. Thomas and that Thirukkural have been lifted from the teachings of St. Thomas\u2014nonsense.<br />\n<br />\nTHOMAS THE DISCIPLE OF JESUS -- BOTH NEVER EXISTED.<br />\n<br />\nBishop Robert Caldwell (1814\u20131891) was an Christian Evangelist missionary and linguist, who came to India to poison Hindusim, by translating and printing books in Tamil. He got into a deal with Tamilian Iyers for plum administrative posts in the British Raj.<br />\n<br />\nFor poisoning the Hindu texts , in return he established Tamil as the oldest language\u2014which gave an ego massage to Tamils.<br />\n<br />\nBishop Robert Caldwell academically established the Dravidian family of languages in a false immoral manner . He served as Assistant Bishop of Tirunelveli from 1877. Poisoning Hinduism made atheists and British stooges like EVR Periyar happy.<br />\n<br />\nThe Government of Tamil Nadu honoured his 'historic contribution to Tamil' with a memorial and issued a stamp in his name. On the Madras Marina, a statue of Caldwell was erected .<br />\n<br />\nEvery patriotic Indian must know what this white Christain man did to divide Hindus. For 50 long years Caldwell worked tirelessly to give stimulus to the radicalisation of the Non-Brahmin movement .<br />\n<br />\nIN SCHOOL SOCIAL STUDIES EXAM WE HAD A COMPULSORY QUESTION ON TIRUKKURAL --ALWAYS ..<br />\n<br />\nIT IS BETTER THAT I DONT EXPOSE THE NAKED TRUTH ABOUT TIRUKKURAL..</div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">I CAN WRITE A BOOK ON HOW ROTHSCHILDs AGENT LEO TOLSTOY SANG THE PRAISES OF THIRUVALLUVAR ..</span></div>\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">WE IN INDIA NEVER HEARD OF 22 CENTURY OLD TIRUKKURAL ( AND ASHTAVAKRA GITA ) TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA ..</span></span></div>\n<br />\nLET TAMIL PRIDE PARTY HAVE SOMETHING TO HANG ON TO..<br />\n<br />\nON THE OTHER HAND PART 3 ( CHAPTERS 109 TO 133 ) OF TIRUKKURAL DEALT WITH KAMA ..<br />\n<br />\nKAMA HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH SEX.. KAMASUTRA IS A FAKE BOOK.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/07/kamasutra-by-vatsayana-immoral-sexual.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">ROTHSCHILD MEDIA DID ENORMOUS PROPAGANDA THAT DUE TO THE INFLUENCE OF LEO TOLSTOY GANDHI READ TIRUKKURAL IN JAIL..TO DERIVE THE SPARK OF AHIMSA..</span></div>\n<br />\nOn 16th Jan 2015, Prime Minister Narendra Modi released a Gujarati translation of Thirukkural.<br />\n<br />\nVOTE MAANGTH HAI NAH ?<br />\n<br />\nMODI ALSO TOLD THAT TAMIL IS THE OLDEST LANGUAGE ON PLANET EARTH.. TEE HEEEE !<br />\n<br />\nIt is comprised of 1330 pairs each with exactly 7 words.<br />\n<br />\nThere are 133 chapters and 3 parts. The 3 main parts are:<br />\nAram (Dharma / Justice)<br />\nPorul (Artha / Wealth &amp; Power)<br />\nInbam (Kamam / Love &amp; Sex).<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThe book on A\u1e5fam (virtue) contains 380 verses, that of Poru\u1e37 (wealth) has 700 and that of Inbam ( kama sex) has 250.<br />\nThere are two parts of Thirukkural's Kama<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_164MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_164BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_164B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_165B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8235661969138140139\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_165M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/henry-ford-victim-of-jewish-retribution_6.html?showComment=1525741329647#c8235661969138140139\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 8, 2018 at 6:32 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_165MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nKalaviyal - This goes into a secret love (or pre-marital love or affair). There are plenty of tips on how to recognize the signs of love and how to impress the lover. It also goes into what it likes to miss a lover and how to embrace the right way.<br />\nInteresting quotes:<br />\nIt is difficult to understand<br />\nThe essence of the knight is the shoulder<br />\nThis girl has the elixir in her shoulders. Whenever I hug her, I get reborn.<br />\n<br />\nMedication for dysfunction<br />\nThe medicine itself is for self<br />\nThere is medicine for every illness. But for the one who is missing his lover, there can not be better than meeting his love.<br />\n<br />\nI do not know how to look<br />\nYambatta Thambata River<br />\nIf you are laughing at someone else's love and pulling his legs, it is because you never never in love.<br />\n<br />\n2. Karpiyal - This goes into the marital love. These 18 chapters come at the end of the book and deals with separation, anger, memories, complaining and feigned anger.<br />\n<br />\nYerunangan lover of love<br />\nNo one is anyone<br />\nWhen I say to her that she is dear to me than everybody, she still asks me whom I compare her with.<br />\n<br />\nOthers do not care<br />\nEye to eye<br />\nThe person who stole my heart does not seem to be interested in hugging me. I can not even find him. This is breaking my heart.<br />\n<br />\nChapter entitled \"Prostitutes\": For gold, not love their tongue cajoles men are ruined by bangled belles (911)<br />\nThe false embrance of whores is like that of a damned corpse in the dark {913)<br />\n(allusion to necrophilia,a rare sexual deviation)<br />\nThiruvalluvar considers sexuality broadly under two headings \"Courting in secrecy\" and \"Chaste married life\"<br />\nOn this banglod beauty dwell the joys of sight sound touch taste smell (1101)<br />\nJoy is the fast embrace that doth not admit even air between both (1108)<br />\nIn the fore - play the beauty of the woman is extolled in many places:--<br />\n\"Beauty extolled\"<br />\nThe bamboo shouldered has pearl like smiles Fragrant breath and lance like eyes (1J13)<br />\nThe soft flower and the swan's down are like nettles to the feet of the fair.. (1120)<br />\nA sensuous kiss between the lovers is alluded to here:--<br />\nLike milk and honey the dew is sweet from her white teeth whose word is soft (1121)<br />\nLove between me and this lady is like bond between soul and body (1122)<br />\nLife with my jewel is existence Death is is severance (1124)<br />\nAs knowledge reveals past ignorance So is the belle on love gets close ..(1110)<br />\nHe comes; no sleep; he goes; no sleep; This is the fate of eyes that weep .(II79)<br />\nNights' mercy lulls all souls to sleep keeping but me for companionship (1168)<br />\nCrueller than that cruel he are midnight hours gliding slowly (1169)<br />\nOne day seems as sever to those who yearn return of distant spouse (J269)<br />\nIn wakeful hours who sees me not I meet in dreams and linger yet... {1213)<br />\nIn dreams I enjoy his love \u2013 bliss Who in wakeful hours I miss (12 J 4)<br />\nDear life ebbs away by thought of him who said we are one heart {1209)<br />\nThink of, O heart, some remedy To cure this chronic malady {1241)<br />\nFrets to gain and fears loss in gain O my heart suffers ceaseless pain.. {1295)<br />\nThese arms that swelled on nuptial day Now shrunk proclaim \"He is away\"{1233)<br />\nBereft of bracelets and old beauty Arms tell the cruel's cruelty {1235)<br />\n<br />\nMy eyes causing lust more than sea Suffer that tortune slecplessly (1175)<br />\nHe seized my beauty and modesty Leaving pangs and pallor to me ... {1183)<br />\nLover away, comes even tide like slayer to field of homicide {1224)<br />\nSulking is the salt of love : but too much of it spoils the taste {1302)<br />\nSulking is lover's delight Its delight grows when they write {1330)<br />\n<br />\n\"Shall I draw back, or yield myself, or shall both mingled be,<br />\nWhen he returns, my spouse, dear as these eyes to me.\" (Kural 1267)[26]<br />\n\"Withdraw, it burns; approach, it soothes the pain;<br />\nWhence did the maid this wondrous fire obtain?\" (Kural 1104)[27]<br />\n\"A double witchery have glances of her liquid eyes;<br />\nOne glance is glance that brings me pain; the other heals again.\" (Kural 1091)<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_165MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_165BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; , serif; font-size: large;\">TAMIL VEDAS ?</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A DHARMIC LIFE MANUAL CALLED KAMASUTRA WAS CONVERTED TO A PERVERTED SEX MANUAL BY JEW ROTHSCHILD..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The four purusharthas or goals of human life are 1. Dharma (righteousness, duty and moral order) 2. Artha (wealth and prosperity) 3.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Kama (desirable action )</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">&nbsp;4. Moksha (liberation) . This is exactly what is condenses into Tirukkural.</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KAMA PURUSHARTHA IS NOT LUST BUT DESIRABLE ACTION.<br /><br />KAMA HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH LUST OR SEX AS IS WRITTEN BY THE WHITE INVADER</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Purushartha means those actions which are proper and correct</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Kama is a broad subject which encompasses arts, emotions, poetry . relationships and other sciences</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The aim of life of an individual is determined by the doctrine of Purushartha. It also decides the course of life of man and lays down norms and values for the behaviour patterns.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Purushartha means \u201cPurusharthate Purushartha\u201d, which are the efforts made by the individual to achieve the aims, goals and ultimate values of life.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The ultimate end of Hindu culture is to attain \u2018Moksha\u2019 or salvation and hence, man should behave in such a manner that this aim may be achieved- and this does NOT mean wanton , debauched sex..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">By Purushartha we mean the pursuance of those actions which lead to the fulfillment of socially approved values and goal.</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Kama refers to all the desires in man for the enjoyment and satisfaction and sensual gratification of the five human senses.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">KAMA could be music or being creative or team spirit in sport or travelling to places of natural beauty or sitting with family at the beach or riding a fast horse or participating in a arrow shooting contest - anything which brings delight to human life and spirit .</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Kama has absolutely nothing to do with LUST and sexual orgasm.</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Kama would refer to the totality of the innate desires and drives of man- motivations of man.</span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Kama refers to the instinctive and emotional life of man, and provides for the satisfaction of his aesthetic urges.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Sanatana Dharma wants man and woman to be happy as this is the chief purpose of life and of course the final goal of Moksha.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1525771090590#c7174753694009767256\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888;\">May 8, 2018 at 2:48 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_4MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCommunism collapsed 3 decades ago\u2014but our JNU commie and pathetic commie leaders keep the ideology alive..<br />\n<br />\nJew Rothschild\u2019s cousin JEW Karl Marx did not invent communism. Radicals, including Pierre-Joseph Proudhon (1809-65) and the Chartist movement in England, had long used language that modern-day readers would identify as \u201cMarxist\u201d\u2014\u201cto enjoy political equality, abolish property\u201d; \u201creserve army of labour\u201d and so forth.<br />\n<br />\nWhat, then, was his contribution?<br />\n<br />\nMuch of his time was spent disagreeing with other radicals, attacking Proudhon in particular, whom he likened to one of the \u201cbourgeois economists\u201d. Far more significantly, he attempted to provide an overall theoretical description of how capitalism worked, especially in Das Kapital, which was published in 1867.<br />\n<br />\nMarx's Das Kapital, fails to mention that money is printed out of thin air and keeps the name of his cousins, the Rothschilds, out of it, despite the fact that they were the richest and most powerful capitalist family in the whole world\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild hired Marx to draft a social doctrine to invert moral order for centralizing their nation state\u2019s wealth Into Rothschild controlled coffers... Marx saw free trade as positive because it undermines established nations and cultures.<br />\n<br />\nMillions of people are still under the misapprehension that Marxism / Communism is against profiteering dishonest banks and multi national companies.. The Rothschild banking family - the richest and most powerful banksters, for the past 200 years - financed Karl Marx's pretense of an attack on the profiteering dishonest.banksters, in order to fool the masses, and it worked. ..<br />\n<br />\nMarx's hidden message was: \u201cForget your individual rights and privileges and trust in the State and the Trade Unions, and they'll do your thinking for you.\u201d ..Millions of people believed that nonsense, and subsequently allowed 'others' to do their thinking for them.<br />\n<br />\nThe trade unions and the governments are ALL working for the Rothschild's - who own the banks, including Bank of England, US Federal Reserve,and all the big multi national companies, dangle politicians like rag dolls and hold all of the people as tax-debt slaves, through their corrupt central banks and their funny money.<br />\n<br />\nMarx's writing style was a calamity: full of sometimes puerile vehemence, Marx heaped scorn on his opponents, inaugurating the long Marxist tradition of mercilessly deriding anyone with incorrect opinions. In Marx\u2019s pamphlets, mudslinging abounds: Marx's heavy-handed insults tend to make us doubt Marx himself, since he relies so much on vituperation instead of reasoned argument.<br />\n<br />\nMarx's conclusion that aggregate price and profit are determined by\u2014and equal to\u2014aggregate value and surplus value is bullshit. There goes his his theory that the exploitation of workers is the sole source of profit.<br />\n<br />\nMarx's essential idea, was that capitalism would become less and less profitable and that its downward spiral toward the abyss of deflation\u2014lower prices, lower profits\u2014would be followed by worldwide revolution.<br />\n<br />\nThe laws of dialectics at the very base of Marxism are fundamentally flawed-- some are \"truisms with no specific Marxist content\", others \"philosophical dogmas that cannot be proved by scientific means\", yet others just bullshit. Some Marxist \"laws\" are vague and can be interpreted differently, but these interpretations generally fall into one of the aforementioned categories of flaws as well.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_4BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; He finished the first. But when it came to writing the second, on realizing that he would face insurmountable intellectual hurdles ( including being charged of mindless plagiarism ) , he pleaded illness.. when in reality he was fit as a fiddle and going around doing everything else.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWhat Marx accomplished was to produce such a comprehensive, dramatic, and fascinating vision that it could withstand innumerable empirical contradictions, logical refutations, and moral revulsions at its effects.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe Marxian vision took the overwhelming complexity of the real world and made the parts fall into place, in a way that was intellectually exhilarating and conferred such a sense of moral superiority that opponents could be simply labelled and dismissed as moral lepers or blind reactionaries.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMarxism was \u2013 and remains \u2013 a mighty instrument for the acquisition and maintenance of political power.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nKarl Marx's value theory and law of the tendency of the rate of profit to fall are a crock of shit.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMarx does not even understand socialism. Socialism cannot be accomplished only through class conflict and a proletarian revolution.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL DECLARES DAS KAPITAL IS THE BIGGEST TUB OF BULLSHIT.. EVER WRITTEN</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn the Nature and Causes of the Wealth of Nations, Jew Rothschild\u2019s agent Adam Smith proposed that the free market, where producers are free to produce as much as they want and charge consumers the prices they want, would result in the most efficient and desirable economic outcome for consumers and producers alike due to the \u201cInvisible Hand.\u201d</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe rationale for his proposal was that each individual would try to maximize his own benefit. In doing so, consumers would only pay as much as or less than they would value the benefit derived from a good, and producers would only sell for as much as or higher than they would have spent on producing a good.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn his idealistic economy, there would be no surplus or deficit supply or demand; markets would always be in equilibrium, and the benefits to consumers and producers alike would be maximized. There would be a limited role for the government in such an economic system.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn contrast, Karl Marx in his Das Kapital reasoned that workers would be exploited by any capitalist, or factory owners, for the capitalist system provides an inherent advantage to the already rich and a disadvantage to the already poor segments of society. The rich would get richer and the poor would get poorer. Furthermore, the \u201ccapitalist\u201d is always in a better position to negotiate a low wage for his workers, he argued.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nOne of his notable and more contentious theories \u2013 the labor theory of value \u2013 claims that the value of a good or service is directly connected to the amount of labor required for its production. Interestingly, Karl Marx also had his own drastic, political ideas that were far away from those of Adam Smith\u2019s.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">Adam Smith? FROM JERUSALEM AND BATUMI SPICES WERE LOADED AGAIN ON SHIPS DESTINED FOR EUROPE..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BOTH SALALAH AND GWADAR WERE PRIVATE PORTS OF THE KINGDOM OF DHOFAR ( OWNED BY CALICUT KING )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">DHOFAR IS THE ANCIENT KINGDOM-- SOUTH PART OF OMAN AND NORTH PART OF YEMEN.</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">Race is a genetic distinction, and refers to people with shared ancestry and shared genetic traits. You can\u2019t change your race; it\u2019s in your DNA.</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HERE IS A BOMBSHELL</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<b style=\"color: red; font-size: xx-large;\">IF SOUTH POLE IS \"SEMITE\" -- NORTH POLE IS \"ARYAN\"..</b></div>\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\"</span><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">ARYANS</span></span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">\" ARE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS --THE ELDER BROTHER , WHO KNOWS VEDAS BY ORAL ROUTE, WHO ARE EXPERTS IN MATH AND ASTRONOMY..</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"></span><br />\n<div style=\"color: blue;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">\"</span><span style=\"color: red;\">SEMITES</span><span style=\"color: blue;\">\" ARE YOUNGER BROTHERS OF NAMBOODIRIS -- LEFT HANDED ONES-- THE ONES WHO ARE HOMOSEXUALS AND EX-COMMUNICATED..THE ONES WHO CANNOT OWN LAND OR EVEN MARRY..</span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IT TAKES A CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL TO EXPLODE THIS NAKED TRUTH ON THE HEADS OF ISRAELI JEWS AND THEIR HISTORIANS..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">NAMBOODIRIS ARE SANSKRIT KNOWING THIYYAS OF KERALA--THE ORIGINAL RULING CLASS..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AFTER ROTHSCHILD INVADED INDIA, THIYYAS WERE CONVERTED TO MONKEYS CLIMBING COCONUT TREES TO TAP TODDY..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A NEW CLASS OF CRYPTO JEW VARMAS BECAME THE NEW RULERS OF KERALA --LIKE CHITPAVAN PESHWA JEWS IN MAHARASTRA ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">THE OLD RULERS MAHARS ( MAHARASHTRA IS NAMED AFTER MAHARS ) WERE CONVERTED TO SHITHOUSE CLEANING SCAVENGERS ..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">BR AMBEDKAR , HIS FATHER AND HIS GRANDFATHER PLAYED BALL--WITH ROTHSCHILD..</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government_25.html?showComment=1527320304009#c4422559943530061338\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 26, 2018 at 1:08 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_29MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nHITLER DID PROPAGANDA THAT HE IS ARYAN AND NAZIS ARE ARYANS WITH HINDU SYMBOL OF SWASTIKA , THE KALA CHAKRA .. THIS WAS ROTHSCHILDs PROPAGANDA AS JEW HITLER WAS ROTHSCHILDs AGENT..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nJEWS OF EUROPE ( BASED FROM GEORGIA ) WERE MOSTLY LEFT HANDED HOMOSEXUALS , AND THEY ADOPTED THE SYMBOL OF SHIVA / SHAKTI MERGE , THE SIX POINTED STAR..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nARYANS ARE NOT BLUE EYED BLONDE EUROPEANS... ARYANS WERE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS WHO KNEW SANSKRIT AND VEDAS ON ORAL ROUTE... THEY EXCELLED IN MATH AND ASTRONOMY AND WERE VISITING PROFESSORS FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY ( OWNED BY CALICUT KING ) TO TAXILA/NALANDA/ SARASWATI DHAR AND FOREIGN UNIVERSITIES LIKE ALEXANDRIA..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE MATH KNOWINGCREAM OF KERALA NAMBOODIRIS ( NAMBOODIRIPADS ) WERE BHATTATHIRIPADS .. ARYABHATTAs REAL NAME IS ARYAN BHATTATHIRIPAD ... ARYAN WAS A TITLE ( MAN OF KNOWLEDGE )..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nNAMBOODIRIS WERE SANSKRIT KNOWING CREAM OF THIYYAS OF KERALA...WHO WERE RULING CLASS. THIYYAS ARE DANAVAS... DANU IS THE MOTHER OF DANAVAS ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nMaya Danava was a descendant of Danu, one of Kashyapa's 13 wives and a daughter of Dakhsa Prajapati. Danu, the Hindu primordial goddess, is mentioned in the Rigveda ( penned down 7000 years ago ) , as mother of the Danavas. Kashmir is named after Kashyapa..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nMAYA DANAVA is the creator of the MAYAN calendar.. He made the Indraprastha palace ..in which Duryodhana fell down in a pool of water in the hall of illusions ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nKala [Time] created yonder heaven, and Kala made these realms of earth,</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nBy Kala, stirred to motion, both what is and what shall be, expand, (...).Kala created living things and first of all Prajapati,From Kala self-made KASHYAPA, from Kala Holy Fire was born.--\u2014\u2009<b>Atharvaveda, Book XIX, Hymns L51-53 ( 5000 BC )</b></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nADITI is mentioned 81 times in Rig Veda..The Vedas went on oral rute for 330 centuries before being penned down 70 centuries ago..Aditi is the mother of DEVAS ( example Indra ) and was also a wife of Kashyapa..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nSons of Danu ( DANAVAS ) and sons of Aditi ( DEVAS ) were opposite forces .. In Samudra Manthan the DANAVAS held the head of Vasuki the snake and DEVAS held the tail to churn the comic ocean..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/secrets-of-shankh-or-conch-product-of.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nJERUSALEM AND BATUMI ( GEORGIA/ KHAZARIA ) WERE SEA PORTS FROM WHERE THE JEWS ( MIDDLE MEN OF SPICES ) TOOK CALICUT KINGs SPICES AFTER OVERLAND ROUTE JOURNEY --LOADED IT ON SHIPS AND TOOK IT TO EUROPE FOR SALE.</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nFROM SALALAH ( DHOFAR SEA PORT ) THE SPICES WENT VIA MECCA OASIS TO PALESTINE..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nFROM GWADAR ( DHOFAR SEA PORT ) THE SPICES WENT TO BATUMI GEORGIA AND CONSTANTINOPLE..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE JEWS OF CONSTANTINOPLE WERE CRYPTO. THEY STILL ARE .. THE FIRST REAL DEEP STATE WAS IN TURKEY WITH CRYPTO JEWS CONTROLLING AND MUSLIMS RULING..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nYOUNGER BROTHERS OF KERALA NAMBOODIRIS COULD NOT MARRY OR OWN LAND..WHILE THE ELDEST BROTHER COULD HAVE 4 WIVES AND OWN ALL FERTILE LAND..</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">\nMOHAMMADs FATHER WAS THE YOUNGER BROTHER OF A KERALA NAMBOODIRI WHO WAS PUJARI OF SHIVA TEMPLE ( KAABA )..WHEN MOHAMMAD MADE HIS NEW RELIGION THE FIRST THING HE DID WAS ALLOWING ALL YOUNGER BROTHERS OF NAMBOODIRIS TO HAVE 4 WIVES...</div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_48M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government.html?showComment=1528260690839#c5097979333383648642\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 6, 2018 at 10:21 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_48MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nFAKE GURU SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV DOES NOT KNOW THE BASICS OF YOGA...<br />\n<br />\n98% OF WHAT THIS RASCAL TELLS IN HIS YOUTUBE VIDEOS IS BULLSHIT... AND HEY, MODI GAVE THIS FELLOW PADMA VIBHUSHAN..<br />\n<br />\nCarbon dioxide is essential for internal respiration in a human body. ..<br />\n<br />\nInternal respiration is a process, by which oxygen is transported to body tissues and carbon dioxide is carried away from them. ...<br />\n<br />\nThe buffer system in which carbon dioxide plays an important role is called the bicarbonate buffer..<br />\n<br />\nCarbon dioxide, a by-product of cellular respiration, is dissolved in the blood, where it is taken up by red blood cells and converted to carbonic acid by carbonic anhydrase. Most of the carbonic acid then dissociates to bicarbonate and hydrogen ions\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe bicarbonate buffer system is an acid-base homeostatic mechanism involving the balance of carbonic acid, bicarbonate ion ,and carbon dioxide (CO2) in order to maintain pH in the blood and duodenum, among other tissues, to support proper metabolic function..<br />\n<br />\nYOGA DOES NOT ALLOW HYPERVENTILATION BECAUSE IT REMOVES TOO MUCH CARBON DIOXIDE FROM THE BODY..<br />\n<br />\nThe blood also becomes abnormally alkaline as a result of the excessive elimination of carbon dioxide; this subsequent rise in blood pH is termed alkalosis. Alkalosis interferes with normal oxygen utilization by the brain. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe symptoms of alkalosis are neuromuscular irritability, muscular spasms, tingling and numbness of the extremities and around the mouth, and a dizziness, or giddiness, often interpreted as a sense of euphoria. ..<br />\n<br />\nThis euphoria and tingling of limb extremities was used by homosexuality pushing FAKE guru Sri Sri Ravishankar to push his bullshit SUDARSHAN KRIYA HYPERVENTILATION..<br />\n<br />\nIn the body alkalosis generally induces vasodilatation (widening of the blood vessels) but in the brain alone it causes vasoconstriction (narrowing of the blood vessels). ..<br />\n<br />\nVasoconstriction is only reversed by the build-up of carbon dioxide in the blood through suspension of breathing\u2026<br />\n<br />\nA low partial pressure of carbon dioxide in the blood causes alkalosis (because CO2 is acidic in solution), leading to lowered plasma calcium ions and increased nerve and muscle excitability. ..<br />\n<br />\nThis explains the other common symptoms of hyperventilation \u2014pins and needles, muscle cramps and tetany in the extremities, especially hands and feet\u2026<br />\n<br />\nHypocapnia caused by hyperventilation ( not allowed by Yoga ) is a state of reduced carbon dioxide in the blood. ..<br />\n<br />\nAGAIN, VEDIC YOGA ALLOWS ONLY DEEP DIAPHRAGMATIC BREATHING..<br />\n<br />\nHyperventilation, or over-breathing, does not add oxygen to arterial blood. IDIOT Baba Ramdev does not understand this--when he shows off his kapalbhatti etc\u2026<br />\n<br />\nHyperventilation does not only reduce the total cerebral blood flow, but also changes the distribution of blood flow within the brain. ..<br />\n<br />\nBlood flow to the frontal, occipital, and parieto-occipital cortex, as well as the hippocampus is reduced relative to other areas of the brain within seconds to minutes of commencing hyperventilation.<br />\n<br />\nSri Sri Ravishankar does NOT have a technical brain . He has PATENTED this Sudharshan Kriya ( SO HUM hyperventilation ) by trying to rehash Yogic pranayama exercises like Bhastrika and Kapalabhati\u2026<br />\n<br />\nYOGA HAS SHUNNED HYPERVENTILATION , AND HAS USED BHASTRIKA PRANAYAMA ONLY TO SHIFT THE DOMINANT NOSTRIL ( IDA / PINGALA ) FOR A FEW SECONDS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWhen we do deep diaphragmatic breathing, our stress levels will decrease because it allows more oxygen to flow through the body. ..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_49B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c9170898860105841459\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_49M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government.html?showComment=1528260753785#c9170898860105841459\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 6, 2018 at 10:22 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_49MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nYogic breathing puts us in a parasympathetic (calm and relaxed) from a sympathetic (fight or flight) nervous system. It optimizes the carbon dioxide (CO2) and oxygen (O2) exchange in the lungs to give greater space in the thoracic cavity during inhalation. A better CO2/O2 exchange also allows for higher oxygen saturation in our blood. ..<br />\n<br />\nWhen we breathe more air, by hyperventilation, we get less oxygen in body cells. This is a paradox..<br />\n<br />\nIn fact, the slower your automatic breathing pattern at rest (down to only 3 breaths/min), the larger the amount of oxygen delivered to cells\u2026<br />\n<br />\nHyperventilation can be voluntary or involuntary. ..<br />\n<br />\nHyperventilation occurs when the rate and quantity of alveolar ventilation of carbon dioxide exceeds the body's production of carbon dioxide. ..<br />\n<br />\nWhen alveolar ventilation is excessive, more carbon dioxide will be removed from the blood stream than the body can produce. This causes the concentration of carbon dioxide in the blood stream to fall and produces a state known as hypocapnia. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe body normally attempts to compensate for this metabolically. If excess ventilation cannot be compensated metabolically, it will lead to a rise in blood pH. This rise in blood pH is known as respiratory alkalosis. ..<br />\n<br />\nWhen hyperventilation leads to respiratory alkalosis, it causes tingling in the lips, hands or feet, and carpopedal spasms (flapping and contraction of the hands and feet) . ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">MY WIFE HAS EXPERIENCED THIS SPASM IN SRI SRI RAVISHANKARs YOGA CLASS OF SO HUMM ( SUDARSHAN KRIYA ).. SHE WALKED OUT INSTANTLY AS A FEW HOURS BEFORE I HAS EXPLAINED ALL THIS IN GREAT DETAIL TO HER ...</span></div>\n<br />\nAgain--Cerebral blood flow is directly related to the carbon dioxide pressure in the blood, and inversely related to the pH of the blood flowing through the arteries going to the brain . In other words, the lower the carbon dioxide pressure in the blood, the lower the cerebral blood flow \u2026<br />\n<br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">THE DAMAGE TO THE BRAIN IS IRREVERSIBLE ..</span></div>\n<div>\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">Hallucinating effects have been used by FAKE gurus to make an ass out of devotees..</span><br />\n<br />\nSince carbon dioxide is carried as bicarbonate in the blood, the loss of carbon dioxide will drive bicarbonate to combine with hydrogen ions (protons) to form more carbon dioxide. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe loss of hydrogen ions results in the blood becoming alkaline, i.e. the blood pH value rises. This is known as a respiratory alkalosis. This alkalization of the blood causes vessels to constrict (vasoconstriction). ..<br />\n<br />\nThe high pH value resulting from hyperventilation also reduces the level of available calcium (hypocalcemia), which affects the nerves and muscles, causing constriction of blood vessels and tingling. ..<br />\n<br />\nThis occurs because alkalization of the plasma proteins (mainly albumin) increases their calcium binding affinity, thereby reducing free ionized calcium levels in the blood. ..<br />\n<br />\nTherefore, low levels of carbon dioxide can cause tetany by altering the albumin binding of calcium such that the ionised (physiologically influencing) fraction of calcium is reduced. ..<br />\n<br />\nTherefore, there are two main mechanisms that contribute to the cerebral vasoconstriction that is responsible for the lightheadedness, paresthesia, and fainting often seen with hyperventilation. ..<br />\n<br />\nStupid people think that this most damaging thing is a good thingy. One mechanism is that low carbon dioxide (hypocapnia) causes increased blood pH level (respiratory alkalosis), causing blood vessels to constrict. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe other mechanism is that the alkalosis causes decreased freely ionized blood calcium, thereby causing cell membrane instability and subsequent vasoconstriction and paresthesia\u2026<br />\n<br />\nOxygen is very poorly soluble in blood, and blood contains negligible amounts of dissolved oxygen. Practically all oxygen in blood is chemically bound to hemoglobin inside red blood cells. But the chemical binding of oxygen with hemoglobin is directly affected by the acidity and alkalinity of blood (i.e. the pH of blood)\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--<br />\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_49MN\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_49BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_49B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_50B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8640868769813799111\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_50M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/the-deep-state-and-shadow-government.html?showComment=1528261247076#c8640868769813799111\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 6, 2018 at 10:30 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_50MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN--<br />\n<br />\nI CAN GO ON AND ON..<br />\n<br />\nYOU EXPECT STUPID PEOPLE LIKE DEEP STATE SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR, DEEP STATE SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV AND BABA RAMDEV TO UNDERSTAND THIS HIGH TECH STUFF. .. , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Mind you, as no one even knows how many US Federal laws there are, and the US code has become so big, neither the US Congressional Research Service or the American Bar Association have enough staff to adequately categorize every law this nation has on the books.( DELIBERATE )</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Human societies throughout the world, with all them having one single connection throughout all time\u2014people agreeing to live with each other based upon a set of mutually accepted norms, that are called \u201claws\u201d.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Law is a system of rules that are created and enforced through social or governmental institutions to regulate behavior, and from our most ancient times when small groups of nomadic peoples roamed the vastness of our Earth, to today\u2019s gargantuan nation states having populations in the hundreds-of-millions and billions, all were made possible by people agreeing with each other in how they would live with each other.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">From the most open and free societies one can imagine, to the cruelest and most despotic regimes the human mind could conceive, all have been governed by laws\u2014some being secular in nature (denoting attitudes, activities, or other things that have no religious or spiritual basis), with others being based upon religious beliefs.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">And in all of recorded history, the laws people choose to live by, or were forced to adhere to, were known by everyone who lived under them\u2014except for today!</span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; Dhammapada was gleaned out of Khuddaka Nikaya . This nikaya consists of fifteen (Thailand), seventeen (Sri Lanka), or eighteen books (Burma) in different editions on various topics attributed to the Buddha\u2014all injected with perfume.<br />\n<br />\nMax Muller used JEW Thomas Rhys Davids , a Rothschild employee in Sri Lanka, to found the Pali text society. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Greek Apollonius of\nTyana (APALUNYAN ) was a dark skinned Indian seer from Kerala.&nbsp; His came to Kodungallur Univesity by ship with\na man named &nbsp;Jesus Christ ( DAMISA - Demas ).&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Both &nbsp;studied together in Kodungallur ( Muziris )\nUniveristy-both were students of meditation and reiki healing .&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;Both\nwere vegetarians. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Both came together .Damisa went back with an Indian bride. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Jesus died\nat a young age. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Apalunyan , an Indian seer Hindu lived\nfor more than hundred years\u2014and he was more famous and a more powerful healer that\nJesus.. &nbsp;&nbsp;White skinned &nbsp;Jesus followed dark skinned Apollonuius , like\nMary and the litle lamb, &nbsp;got strangely\ngot all the fame . . .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Somewhere along the\nline Jesus got all the fame and dark skinned Apollonius was deleted from\nhistory by Romans (like Nikola tesla.)<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Athenian author Flavius\n&nbsp;Philostratus wrote a book &nbsp;Life of Apollonius of Tyana( Cappadoccia,\nGreece) &nbsp;&nbsp;-this book contains the India\nepisode.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Greeks&nbsp; Plato , Pythagoras were students &nbsp;earlier in Kodungallur University .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">TODAY LET ME BURST A\nBOMBSHELL AND MY REVELATIONS JUMP TO 9.0%.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">JESUS CHRIST TOOK OVER\nAPOLLONIUS OF TYANA\u2019S FAME. &nbsp;PROBABLY\nDYING AT A YOUNG AGE MADE HIM FAMOUS AS A MARTYR .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Today , nobody knows\nthat there were 18 &nbsp;temples were erected\nin honor of APOLLONIUS OF TYANA, but none for Jesus Christ. &nbsp; The first temple\nafter Antioch came in Kodungallur when St Thomas came to Kerala.. This temple was made for Applolonius and NOT Jesus Christ.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Thousands of followers\nof Apollonius of Tyna were put to death \u2013and lot of the survivors came running\nto Calicut \u2013 they were NOT Jews\u2014they were Hindus , a sect named MANICHAEANS..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Even\ntoday Christian In Kerala call each other CHAENS .&nbsp; ( chayyan )<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Jesus Christ was\nunknown till the convention at Nicea in 325AD. Emperor Constantine exhumed the\nmemory of Jesus Christ ( Damisa ) and deleted Apollonius of Tyana.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Constantine the Great\nWAS THE 57<sup>TH</sup> Emperor of the Roman Empire. The medieval church upheld\nhim as a paragon of virtue and boosted Jesus Christ as the messiah.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Church\nof the Holy Sepulchre, was built on Constantine\u2019s &nbsp;orders at the site of Jesus' tomb in Jerusalem\n(sic ) and this became the holiest place in Christendom. He is the man who\ncreated the Pope system.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It was the Pope who DELETED Apollonius of Tyana from\nall records .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Christianity which sprouted\nfrom Antioch was NOT of Jesus , but of Apollonius of Tyana. His name is\nattached to the city's temple, Apollo Daphne.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
