Fake gurus will cause you immense harm as most actions are\nirreversible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tantra was evolved by\nseers for the benefit of mankind, to evolve, to achieve perfection and\nliberation - freedom from the vicious circle of senses and maya.&nbsp; No tantric practice involves any ritual of\nharming another being by means of bali or sacrifice. Rather it is about self\nconquest, conquering your desires and mastering yourself, strengthening your\nweakness. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many tantrics talk\nabout panch-makaras or 5 elementary practices viz. madya, mansa, matsya, mudra\nand maithuna.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only an idiot will hold\nthe chair above his head when told to \u201ctake a chair\u201d. But then all this poison\nhas been deliberately injected by the white invader.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As in Tantra the\npractices and techniques are generally described allegorically or symbolically,\npanch-makaras are not to be taken literally. The Guru deciphers the symbols and\ntechniques and gives an insight to the disciple of such practices.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">- Madya which literally\nmeans wine or intoxication actually stands for the nectar which drips from\nbindu visarg when deeper practices and pranayamas are performed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">- Matsya represents\nmovement of prana through Ida and Pingala nadis as a result of the practice of\npranayamas. Ida and Pingala criss cross like the movement of fish ( fish\ntailing ) , which stands for matsya. They establish balance in the body for\nKundalini, the serpent power to move in Sushumna nadi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">- Mudra is\ngesture/posture, and here it stands for Khechari mudra, where tongue is rolled\nup to touch the soft palette, which releases pranic energy to reach the bindu\nfrom where the nectar drips. Some tantrics also believe it to be dhanya,\ncereal.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">- Mansa or meat is\ngenerally understood as offering meat - animal or human sacrifice but tantra is\nfar away from such practices which inflict even slightest amount of pain to any\nbeing. Bali or sacrifice actually means offering what you have or what you are.\nYou cannot control a single moment of your life, a single breath, so how can\nyou offer life of another being who does not belong to you. Bali is offering\nwhat is yours and even your own body is not yours, you possess only one thing\nand that is your ichcha/desire. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So mansa symbolises\nsacrificing yourself by winning over your desires. Before the white invader\ncame to India NONE of our temples has any form of blood sacrifice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">- Maithuna which is\nmisunderstood to be sexual intercourse is actually the union of purush and\nprakriti. It is not physical union of a male and a female but the purush and\nprakriti aspects of a being, Shiva and Kundalini, the ultimate state of dhyan\ncalled samadhi and it requires complete control over your physical senses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By attainment of mudra\nand pranayama (matsya), the nectar is obtained, winning over the desire\n(mansa/bali) induces the state of union or maithuna, the ultimate objective of\ntantra/yoga, where no distinction remains between physical elements of nature.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A mantra has six parts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AAA-It has a founder\nseer (drashta ) to whom it was revealed for the first time and who gave this\nMantra to this planet.&nbsp; Maharishi\nViswamitra is the seeri for Gayatri Mantra which is whispered into the ear at\nupanayanam.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BBB-It has a digital\nmetre (Chandas), which governs the inflection of the voice.&nbsp; When chanting a Mantra, it is extremely\nimportant not to change the raga and its key, because the rate of vibration on\nwhich the sound is based on integral part of the Mantra.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are several\nChandas. The seven main ones are:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gayatri: 3 padas of 8\nsyllables containing 24 syllables in each stanza.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ushnuk : 4 padas of 7\nsyllables containing 28 syllables in each stanza.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anustubh: 4 padas of 8\nsyllables containing 32 syllables in each stanza. This is the typical shloka of\nclassical Sanskrit poetry<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brihati : 4 padas (8 +\n8 + 12 + 8) containing 36 syllables in each stanza.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pankti : 4 padas\n(sometimes 5 padas) containing 40 syllables in each stanza.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tristubh: 4 padas of 11\nsyllables containing 44 syllabes in each stanza<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jagati: 4 padas of 12\nsyllables containing 48 syllables in each stanza<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CCC- The mantra has a\nparticular Devata or supernatural being, higher or lower, as its informing\npower. This devata is the presiding deity of the Mantra.&nbsp; It is the wisdom that comes from a higher\nsource and is like a single beam of sunlight. One beam that is singled out and\ngiven a name so that the disciple can develop a personal relationship with and\nworship on aspect of God of personal choice , that he&nbsp; can understand and experience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DDD- The mantra has got\na Beeja or seed. The seed is a significant word, or series of words, which\ngives a special power to the Mantra. The Beeja is the essence of the Mantra.\nThis represents the sound string defined by the Seers as being the repository\nof auditory energy sources. The Beeja gives the mantra in which it is used, its\nspecial power of self-generation and effects. Just as within a seed is hidden\nwithin tree, so too, the energy of the mantra is resident in the seed on which\nit is based. This helps the mantra to manifest itself into spiritual\nconsciousness. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EEE- Every mantra has\ngot a Shakti. The power, the consciousness, within the mantra is 'Shakti' - the\nDivine Mother, the goddess of the spoken word. The male aspect of the God is\nenergy in a state of equilibrium; the female aspect is the dynamic energy,\nwhich manifests as Creation. This energy is the source of creation of all\nliving beings. In the mantra this energy is present in a pure form. The potency\nof the mantra is realized through repetitions, until the individual chanting\nthe same, feels the presence of God. This is a spiritual experience, which the\nMantras help to bring about.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FFF- The mantra has a\nKilaka - pillar or pin. This plugs the Mantra-Chaitanya ( consciousness ) that\nis hidden in the Mantra.&nbsp; As soon as the\nplug is removed by constant and prolonged repetition of the Name, the Chaitanya\nthat is hidden is revealed. The devotee gets Darshana of the Ishta Devata.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The power of the mantra\ntakes on a self generating 'flywheel motion' ( rather domino effect ) , the\nKilaka becomes a very fine thread joining the discipline to the mantra, to the\npower of the mantra, to the Guru and to the deity, until all are manifest as\none.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kilaka (Devanagari: )\nmeans (1) a pin that holds separate papers together; (2) It can be like a bolt\nthat is used to lock something which is guarded like a secret chamber or part;\n(3) It is the wedge between two members of the same thing. In mantra \u015b\u0101stra\nsome mantra have a \u2018k\u012blakam\u2019 which can take either of the forms described\nabove.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is yet another\nmeaning of the word k\u012blaka which is a pillar to which the cows are tied with a\nrope. The cow can move around within the circle created by the rope tied to the\npillar. In mantra shastra, the pra\u1e47ava OM is the natural k\u012blakam around which\nthe mantra runs in circles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The word utkilana is\napplied to some of the mantra where the kilakam is implied to be a bolt or lock\nwhich needs to be unlocked by the addition of a secret syllable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dasakari (ten-syllable\nGop\u0101la mantra) taught by Parasara to his astrology students- -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0917\u094b\u092a\u093f\u091c\u0928</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0935\u0932\u094d\u0932\u092d\u093e\u092f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0938\u094d\u0935\u093e\u0939\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">gopijana-vallabh\u0101ya\nsv\u0101h\u0101<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However this mantra has\na \u201cdouble kilakakam\u201d. It is used to tether the cows \u2013 implying the mind of the\nstudent (sadhaka).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">K\u012blakam (1) The pillar\nis the secret beeja mantra called k\u0101ma-b\u012bja: </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0915\u094d\u0932\u0940\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n(kl\u012b\u1e41). Unless this is received from the mouth of the guru with the specific\nintention of working as a pillar for the dasaksari Gopala mantra, it does not\nact as a pillar and is just another sound. The mantra then is recited as \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0915\u094d\u0932\u0940\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0917\u094b\u092a\u093f\u091c\u0928</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">-</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0935\u0932\u094d\u0932\u092d\u093e\u092f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0938\u094d\u0935\u093e\u0939\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">kl\u012b\u1e41\ngopijana-vallabh\u0101ya sv\u0101h\u0101<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">K\u012blakam (2) However, if\nwe were to recite the mantra as written above then it changes from dasaksari\n(ten syllable) to eleven syllable mantra due to the addition of the k\u0101ma b\u012bja\n\u2018kl\u012b\u1e41\u2019 and will fail to give siddhi. The utk\u012blana or unlocking lies in the\nsecret upade\u015ba of the </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0932\u0941\u092a\u094d\u0924</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092c\u0940\u091c</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n(lupta b\u012bja).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A shloka is a couplet\nor a verse that consists of two lines. A Purana contains many slokas, The\nshortest purana is the Markandeya Purana with 900,000 shlokas. The longest is\nthe Skanda Purana, which is 8,100,000 shlokas. An average Purana has between\n1.5 to 2 million shlokas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The repetition of the\nPanchakshara Mantra - Om Namo Sivaya - produces the form of Lord Siva. The\nrepetition of Om Namo Narayanaya, the Ashtakshara Mantra of Vishnu, produces\nthe form of Vishnu.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mental repetition\nof a mantra is termed Manasika Japa.&nbsp;\nLoud repetition is called Vaikhari Japa. The loud Japa shuts out all\nworldly sounds.&nbsp; Repetition in a whisper\nis termed Upamshu Japa.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even mechanical\nrepetition of Japa without any Bhava has a great purifying effect on the heart\nor the mind. The feeling will come later on when the process of mental\npurification goes on.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Take a bath&nbsp; before sitting for Japa. Face east or north\nduring mantra chanting . This enhances the efficacy of the Japa.&nbsp; Sit on a deer skin or rug. Spread a piece of\ncloth over it. This conserves body-static electricity.&nbsp; Sit in a separate meditation room or in a\ntemple, on a river bank or under a banyan / peepul tree.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maintain a steady\npose.&nbsp; Attain mastery of the posture. You\nmust be able to sit in Padmasana, Siddhasana or Sukhasana for three hours at a\nstretch.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do not allow the\nrudraksha mala to hang below the navel. Keep the hand near the heart or the\nnose. The mala must not be visible to you or to others. Cover it with a towel\nor handkerchief, which must be clean and washed daily. Use the middle finger\nand the thumb of the right to roll the beads. The use of the index finger is\nprohibited. Do not cross the meru while rolling the beads. Turn back when you\ncome to it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do not do the Japa in a\nhurried manner. Do it slowly with feeling, one-pointedness of mind and\nsingle-minded devotion. Pronounce the Mantra distinctly and without any\nmistakes. Repeat it neither too slowly nor too fast. Increase the speed only\nwhen the mind wanders. Stand up when sleep tries to overpower you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Try to associate the\nJapa with the rhythm of the breath . Keep a picture or idol of the Deity in\nfront of you. Never mind the stupid people ( pricks really ) called\nrationalists , who think that all this is superstition.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Think of the meaning of\nthe Mantra while repeating it. Regularity in Japa Sadhana is most essential if\nsuccess is to be achieved. Sit in the same place and at the same time every\nday.&nbsp; Avoid distractions-and this means put\nthe mobile phone to silent mode.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Below: Listen with\nheadphones--&nbsp; 16 lettered Tantric\nShodashakshari mantra--&nbsp; Ka Ye E La Hrim\nHa Sa Ka La Hrim Sa Ka La Hrim Shrim.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/-82fcoPzOn0/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/-82fcoPzOn0?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the last Shrim is\ndropped then it is called Panchadashakshari Mantra (15 lettered mantra.. )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tantric mantras are\nalways followed or preceded by rituals, worship and prayers.&nbsp; Tantra has two methods. One is called vama\nmarga or \u2018left hand method\u2019 and the other is called dakshina marga or the\n\u2018right hand method\u2019.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Kerala we\nadditionally had the double edged Kaula Marga sampradaya running strong in\nBhadrakali temples..&nbsp; Hreem - Shreem -\nKreem - Kloum - Soum -as its primodial form of tantric SHAKTI deities, which\nexisted thousands of years before Lord Parashurama came to Kerala from\nSaraswati river with his band of Namboodiris 6000 years ago.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The normal number of\ntimes a mantra is recited is 3, 11, 21, 27, 54 and 108 or more.&nbsp; \"Wrathful\" deities should not be\ninvoked with \"Svaha,\" only with \"Namah,\" , unless the Guru\ninstructs otherwise.&nbsp; Certain\nmantras&nbsp; induce an altered state of\nconsciousness .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Texts Followed in Kaula\nSystem of Kerala:-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kularnava Tantra<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maha Nirvahana Tantra<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sakthi Tantra<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tantra manchiri<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tantra uses mediums of\nsounds (dhwani) in the form of mantras and diagrammatic representations of\nthese sounds called yantras in specific procedures.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Where there is\nvibration, there is sound and vice versa.&nbsp;\nModern science has slowly begun to realize the benefits of sound mantras\nused in Ayurveda fore body cell rejuvenation. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While literally\neverything is vibrating, different things vibrate at different rates or\nfrequencies. Some frequencies are perceived as light, some as sound, some as\ncolor, and some as solid matter. The rate at which something vibrates\ndetermines how dense it is and what we perceive it to be.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Kerala temples\ndrumming is a tradition\u2014NOT for pleasure but is used to alter consciousness, to\nentrain the&nbsp; brain waves to the alpha\nstate (8-13 hertz). The sound waves produced by the drum impart their energy to\nthe resonating systems of the body, mind, and spirit, making them vibrate in\nsympathy. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we drum, our\nliving flesh, brainwaves, and spiritual energy centers begin to vibrate in\nresponse. The various frequencies of the drum interact with our own resonant\nfrequencies, forming new harmonic alignments. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Entrainment is an\naspect of resonance.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We use entrainment in\nPranayama . Slowing down your breathing will slow down your heartbeat and brain\nwaves, and slowing down your brain waves will correspondingly slow down heart\nrate and respiration.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Entrainment is an\nactive process, whereas resonance is more passive. Entrainment changes the\nvibrations (the frequency or rhythm) of one object to another rate. There is a\nnatural tendency in nature toward harmony and it requires AMAZINGLY MINISCULE&nbsp; less energy to entrain and vibrate\nharmoniously, than it does to remain out of step.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Put another way, it is\neasier to cooperate than to oppose. When an organ or energy channel or some\nother aspect of the body/mind is vibrating out of tune with the whole, creating\ndissonance, we call this \"disease,\" and we want to restore harmony as\nper Ayurveda.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In my vision is see\nhealing effects of drumming on Alzheimer's patients, autistic children,\nemotionally disturbed epileptic&nbsp; teens\netc. There are NIL side effects.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern medicine must\nrealize that on a molecular level, our bodies are systems of vibrating atomic\nparticles. We are living receivers and transmitters of sound vibration. We can\nuse sound frequencies to vibrate matter and promote healing and regeneration of\nthe different body systems. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These frequencies also\nshift etheric patterning to heal the emotional and mental causes of disease.\nEach individual has their own vibrational frequency, in sickness and in health,\nand energetic or vibrational medicine can restore and support harmony in the\nbody and mind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per 6000 year old\nAyurveda the human body is a symphony of sounds. Every chakra, every organ,\nevery bone, every tissue, every cell has its own resonant frequency, its own\nsound.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dissonant sounds create\ndisharmony -- rifts between the individual and her environment, as well as\nwithin the body's own frequencies. If 10 tuning forks tuned to the same\nfrequency are lined up together and one is struck, they will all begin to\nreverberate together. This is resonance. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, if you strike\na tuning fork of a different frequency and place it near the others, they will\nall stop. This is dissonance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every Beej mantra\ncreates a huMMMMMMMM.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It doesn't need to be\nloud, but just enough to feel its vibrations in your own body. The uterus resounds with the sounds of the heart beating (approximately\n50-60 beats per minute) and the blood swooshing through the arteries, the\nwavelike cadence of the breath (approximately 1,215 cycles per minute), and the\nexternal sounds and voices muted by the amniotic fluid. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before we are even\nborn, we are attuned to the rhythms and sounds around us.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per our 7000 year\nold Vedas sound creates, organizes and forms all the basic fundamental shapes\nfound throughout the known universe. Sri\nYantra is a sacred geomentry which holds the TOE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sound operates through\nthe law of Resonance. Resonance is, in itself, a state of awareness and experiential knowing\nfar beyond concept and mental, cognitive thinking. On the vibration\nfield-form-body-time level, resonance is the experiential state of Oneness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sound has the ability\nto affect whatever forms it comes into contact with by exposing that form to a\ndifferent rate of frequency vibration.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sound has the ability\nto bring this place back into Oneness by changing its rate of vibration through\nsympathetic vibration - Resonance. Depending on the frequencies being used,\nsound vibratory resonance can facilitate accessing a state of understanding and\nknowing without the need for limits, fears and defenses. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sound waves can travel\nbelow the order of mental cognitive defense structures and deliver a deeper\nexperiential state of harmony. We call this Sound Frequency Healing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cells function and\nformulate according to a fluid resonance-movement. The complete\nblueprint for our existence is contained and infinitely accessible in every one\nof our cells.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Therefore, for any\nhealing to be complete, it needs to take place at all levels \u2013 the body, the\nmind and the spirit. If the hydrogen bonding angles of one molecule are\naltered, those in the other molecules might be expected to follow suit (as in a\ndomino effect).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/10/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_10.html?showComment=1446375270095#c1472855984180261427\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">November 1, 2015 at 4:24 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_86MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi mc,<br />\n<br />\nNADI IS A STREAM OF PRANA.<br />\n<br />\nIDA MEANS INTROVERT (MOON-FEMALE )<br />\n<br />\nPINGALA MEANS EXTROVERT ( SUN-MALE )<br />\n<br />\nSORRY CHUTNEY MARY FEMINISTS !<br />\n<br />\nWhen the left nostril ( right brain lobe for right hander ) is PREDOMINANT it is the lunar energy or Ida Nadi which is flowing. When the right nostril ( left brain lobe ) DOMINATES, the solar energy or Pingala Nadi is flowing.<br />\n<br />\nWhen the Kundalini Shakti awakens it passes through Sushumna Nadi.<br />\n<br />\nShakti travels up Sushumna Nadi to become One with her husband Shiva in Sahasrara chakra.<br />\n<br />\nThis is NOT perverted sex..<br />\n<br />\nGanesha ( son ) opens the door ( Mooladhara bandhana at sacrum bone ) for his mother .<br />\n<br />\nWhat do petty minds like Zakir Naik know?<br />\n<br />\nWhen only Ida and Pingala are active without Sushumna, it is like having the positive and negative lines in your electrical cable, without grounding.<br />\n<br />\nEnergy flows through Ida and Pingala all the time, yet its effulgence is very low.<br />\n<br />\n\"Ida\" lies to the left of the spine, whereas \"Pingala\" is to the right side of the spine, mirroring the \"Ida\".<br />\n<br />\nSushumna runs along the spinal cord in the center, through the seven chakras, \"Mooladhara\" at the base, and \"Sahasrara\" at the top (or crown) of the head. It is at the base of this \"Sushumna\" where the \"Kundalini\" lies coiled in three and a half coils, in a dormant or sleeping state.<br />\n<br />\nSushumna Nadi connects the base chakra to the crown chakra.<br />\n<br />\nPingala has a sun like nature and male energy. Its temperature is heating and courses from the left testicle to the right nostril. Id\u0101 has a moonlike nature and female energy with a cooling effect. It courses from the right testicle to the left nostril.<br />\n<br />\nIda Nadi controls all the mental processes while Pingala Nadi controls all the vital processes. At Swadhisthana chakra, or the sacral plexus, the three nadis come together again and Ida and Pingala cross over one another.<br />\n<br />\nIda passes up to the right, Pingala to the left, and Sushumna continues to flow directly upwards in the central canal.<br />\n<br />\nThe three Nadis come together again at Manipura chakra, the solar plexus, and so on. Finally, Ida, Pingala and Sushumna meet in the Ajna chakra.<br />\n<br />\nSushumna Nadi is regarded as a hollow tube, in which there are three INNER concentric tubes, each being progressively more subtle than the previous one.<br />\n<br />\nThe INNER CONCENTRIC tubes / nadis are as follows:<br />\n1. Sushumna- signifying Tamas,<br />\n2. Vajrini \u2013signifying Rajas,<br />\n3. Chitrini signifying Sattva, and<br />\n4. Brahma- signifying consciousness.<br />\n<br />\nThe higher consciousness created by Kundalini passes through Brahma Nadi\u2014OPENED by Ganesha.<br />\n<br />\nOnly when Kundalini Shakti awakens and travels up the Sushumna passage to Sahasrara, does the entire store of higher energy in man begun to be unleashed.<br />\n<br />\nWhen a man with 12 strand DNA ( NIL junk ) and a king sized pineal gland does this, like an ancient Maharishi\u2014he becomes a supercomputer .<br />\n<br />\nHe does NOT need a cockpit in a Vimana.<br />\n<br />\nHe is the cockpit.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_87b+seedOHDID\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_87b+seedOHDID\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: normal; text-align: center;\">\n<b><span style=\"background-color: blue; color: yellow; font-size: large;\">INDIGO CHILDREN CAN DO THIS. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">most breast lumps are\ncaused by hormonal changes that during the menstrual cycle when a woman gets\nher monthly period--- changing estrogen and progesterone hormone levels<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">pain is usually most\nobvious in the week before your period.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nit quickly goes when your period starts.&nbsp;&nbsp; it is more common in women aged 30-50.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">in most cases, a benign\n(non-cancerous) breast lump needs no treatment unless it is particularly large\nor painful. . .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">in some types of lump,\nsuch as a cyst or abscess, there can be fluid that may need draining&nbsp; . antibiotics alone cannot adequately treat\nan abscess. . .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">a lump caused by\ninfection is fairly common in women who are breast-feeding.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; the ducts that carry the breast milk can\nbecome blocked.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; bacteria can enter\nthrough cracks in the nipple.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; this can\nlead to the development of an abscess in the breast.&nbsp;&nbsp; inflammation of the lactating breast tissue\nis known as mastitis. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">a lipoma is a fatty\ngrowth that develops within the fatty tissue of your breast.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; it is non-cancerous and usually does not\nneed any treatment.&nbsp;&nbsp; however, they can be\nremoved if they are large . ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">a mammogram is\nessentially an X-ray of your breasts.. each breast is compressed between two\nX-ray plates.&nbsp;&nbsp; .. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">this may feel a little\nuncomfortable but the discomfort should only last for a few minutes. . a\nmammogram is estimated to be able to detect about 90% of breast cancers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">a doctor inspects any\nsuspicious skin changes that may be a sign of breast cancer.&nbsp; .. . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ultrasound is useful in\nthe evaluation of breast lumps.&nbsp; . .It\ncan distinguish between a cyst (such as a benign cyst, which is filled with\nfluid) and a solid lump (which may or may not be cancerous) . .. the first step\nin the evaluation of a breast lump is to determine whether it is a cyst or\nsolid mass.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MRI is performed if\nresults of mammography and ultrasound evaluations are not conclusive. MRI\ncannot detect the presence of calcium deposits, which can be identified by\nmammography and may be a sign of cancer. .. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A lipoma is a benign\ntumor of the breast composed of normal fat cells. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Typically, a lipoma\ngrows slowly and does not require surgical removal. Once the diagnosis of\nlipoma is confirmed careful observation is usually all that is required. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">there only one way to\nbe certain that a lump is not cancerous is to have a tissue sampling (biopsy) .\n.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; Stop\ndrinking acidic Coke from plastic bottles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Breast cancer is an\nestrogen-related cancer, hormone replacement therapy is the main reason for &nbsp;breast cancer. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of the Western\nwomen who have breast cancers are the ones who had first menses abnormally early\nin life-due to decadent Western &nbsp;life styles.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Estrogen dominance (which\ncauses breast cancer ) is a hormonal state that occurs when the amount of\nestrogen in the body increases while the level of progesterone stays the same\nor decreases.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Progesterone, another hormone, is the body\u2019s natural\ncounterbalance to estrogen.&nbsp; The\nimbalance between the two chemicals can be caused by abnormal body function,\nexposure to chemicals containing estrogen, or the use of medications that\nstimulate or suppress hormone production.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Estrogen dominance &nbsp;can also cause water retention, weight gain\n(as it affects the body\u2019s ability to process fat), uterine fibroids,\nendometriosis, and cervical dysplasia. Some indications of too much estrogen in\nthe body include insomnia, tremors, sensitive skin, short term memory problems,\nheavy menstrual period symptoms, and severe PMS.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Levels of estrogen in a\nwoman\u2019s body change throughout her 28 day cycle, peaking at the end of the\nsecond week and triggering the release of an egg from one of the ovaries.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Raised estrogen levels during the second week of the menstrual cycle also\ndecrease the viscosity of cervical mucus to allow sperm easier access to the\nuterus and therefore a better chance of fertilizing the egg.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once the egg is fertilized, estrogen plays an\nimportant role in cell division that helps the single cell entity become a\nfetus.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In addition to running\nthe menstrual cycle, estrogen is key for preparing the body for pregnancy and\ninitiating the lactation process.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Estrogen also serves important functions\noutside of the reproductive cycle, including reducing calcium loss, maintaining\na clear complexion, providing energy, and clearing cholesterol blockages from\nthe coronary arteries.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sexual desire, memory (long term and short term), and\nnormal sleep patterns are also partially regulated by estrogen.&nbsp; Estrogen is the hormone responsible for\nstaving off menopause. &nbsp;As estrogen\nnaturally decreases with age, the onset of menopause occurs, resulting in the\ncompletion of menstruation and the end of the reproductive cycle.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Women who have reduced\nestrogen levels experience menopause an average of 2 years earlier than other\nwomen. Conversely, women who are obese experience menopause later due to an\nexcess of estrogen.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Estrogen dominance is\nfibrocystic breasts disease.&nbsp; Fibrocystic\nbreasts is a condition that occurs due to changes in a woman\u2019s hormone levels\nat the peak of her menstrual cycle.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The most common symptom is the formation of\na non-cancerous lump typically located on the upper breast or outer side of the\nbreast up to the armpit.&nbsp; These lumps,\nindividually referred to as \u201cfibroids,\u201d become noticeable a week before a woman\u2019s\nperiod is due to start, and typically subside as soon as bleeding begins.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In addition to the development or swelling of\nfibroids, a woman may notice that the texture and consistency of all of her\nbreast tissue changes; during the final week of the menstrual cycle breast\ntissue becomes denser and feels bumpy. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some\nwomen have have cysts so painful they can\u2019t lie on their stomachs. Reduced\nthyroid function, clinically known as hypothyroidism, can be a symptom of\nestrogen dominance as too much estrogen inhibits thyroid hormone production.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The two main hormones\nthe thyroid is responsible for producing are called triiodothyronine (T3) and\nthyroxine (T4).&nbsp; These hormones travel\nthrough the blood and enter into every cell in the body to stimulate protein\nsynthesis, provide energy, and encourage healthy functioning.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Normally, estrogen and\nT3 and T4 oppose and balance each other; estrogen stores calories as fat, while\nthe thyroid hormones utilize calories as usable energy.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, a surplus of estrogen in the body\ntriggers the liver to produce thyroid-binding globulin, a compound that binds\nto and neutralizes T3 and T4 in the blood.&nbsp;\nWhile the thyroid is producing sufficient amounts of hormone an\ninsufficient amount of hormone is making it to the cells, resulting in\nhypothyroidism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The symptoms of\nhypothyroidism are eclectic and include weight gain, fatigue, intolerance to\ncold, constipation, inability to concentrate, depression, short term memory\nloss, and dry skin.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AGAIN, TOO MUCH\nESTROGEN IN THE BODY CAUSES BREAST CANCER.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of estrogen\u2019s\nresponsibilities during the monthly hormonal cycle is to assist in the creation\nand division of new cells in the milk receptors of the breast in anticipation\nof fertilization.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the egg becomes fertilized, these new cells will be needed\nto help start milk production; however, if insemination does not occur these\nextra cells will eventually wither and die.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A woman typically\nexperiences 40 or more years of this monthly cycle of cell creation and death.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This\nis the way god willed it.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;A similar cycle also occurs every month in the\nuterus as it prepares for the fertilized egg to attach to the lining. The more\nestrogen in the body, the more cells will be stimulated to divide, therefore\nsignificantly increasing the odds of spontaneous mutant cell creation.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Estrogen\ndominance is boosted by processed foods , A1 humpless cow milk, and GM foods.\nThese factors create estrogen dominance through not only adding synthetic and\nunnaturally produced estrogen into the body but also reducing progesterone\nlevels.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHAAA , HUMPLESS COW\nMILK\u2014YES !<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These Western cows are\nNOT like Vedic HUMPED cows.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They are\ngiven certain foods with estrogen- result of growth hormones . Commercial\nlivestock are fed estrogen as part of growth supplements designed to increase\nthe size and tenderness of marketable meat retrievable from each animal.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The estrogen remains in the cells of the meat\nas it is processed and is passed onto those who consume it.&nbsp; Cooking the meat does not reduce the amount\nof estrogen.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE IN INDIA DO NOT CARE\nFOR HUMPLESS COW WHICH GIVES TOXIC A1 MILK, TOXIC MEAT, TOXIC GOMUTRA AND TOXIC\nDUNG .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Main problem with\nestrogen in food occurs as the result of growth hormones fed to livestock. . Antibiotics\nin food to chicken &nbsp;contribute to hormone\ndisruptor exposure.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I SUGGEST THAT OUR GOVT\nBANS PROCESSED FOODS TOTALLY. INDIA IS A FERTILE NATION , NOT A DESERT OR A\nFROZEN NATION.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Estrogen dominance is\nso easy to develop because the body has a hard time distinguishing between its\nown, naturally produced estrogen, and estrogen that is ingested through food or\nother chemical compounds that have almost identical properties to\nestrogen.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The result is that bodily\nprocesses that are regulated by estrogen (breast cell division, menstruation,\netc) will be unnaturally triggered or stimulated by foreign estrogen, synthetic\nestrogen, or estrogen-like compounds.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The more fat cells a\nperson has, the greater chance he or she has of experiencing estrogen dominance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meat is not the only\ndietary element that is laced with dangerous amounts of estrogen and hormone\ndisrupting compounds.&nbsp; Fruits and\nvegetables sprayed with herbicides, pesticides, and fungicides are major\ncontributors to the problem of estrogen dominance.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not only are these chemicals\nknown hormone disruptors but they are also filled with compounds known as\n\u201cxenoestrogens.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Fish that were exposed\nto wastewater tainted with xenoestrogens experienced significant reproductive\nproblems, including growths on the ovaries. It is incredibly disturbing to\nthink that humans are exposed on a daily basis to such chemicals through fruits\nand vegetables, foods that are supposed to be healthy and staples of our diets.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In addition to being\nfound in pesticides and other chemicals, xenoestrogens are also found in the\nplastic used for water bottles and storage containers.&nbsp; They not only act as a surplus of estrogen in\nthe body, but also suppress the natural levels of progesterone, leading to a\nsignificant estrogen dominant state.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In addition to\npesticides, herbicides, and fungicides, xenoestrogens are commonly found in\nbirth control pills, spermicides, cosmetics, DDT, PCBs, and foaming agents\n(like sulfates) used in cleaning and personal care products.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Women who consumed &nbsp;four &nbsp;cups of coffee, had nearly 71% more estrogen -during the second week of their cycle.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Certain foods,\nincluding many fruits and vegetables, also contain compounds called\nphytoestrogens.&nbsp; Phytoestrogens are a\ntype of plant formed estrogen compound similar to the hormone found in GM soybeans.&nbsp; However, unlike the specific phytoestrogens\nfound in soy, those phytoestrogens do not mimic human estrogens when they are\nin the body.&nbsp; Instead, they bind with\nprogesterone receptors without stimulating them.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stress, either physical\nor emotional, can also prompt the body to produce more estrogen than normal.\nIndian women have harmony at home-unlike their western counterpart.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The BENAMI\nmedia is trying hard to make Indian wives revolt . &nbsp;Stress can lead to a depletion of\nprogesterone, which creates the same condition of estrogen dominance that a\nwoman experiences when she has too much estrogen in her system.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/10/sesame-seed-sweat-of-lord-vishnu-capt.html?showComment=1381139558520#c3384041509299121863\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">October 7, 2013 at 3:22 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_32MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi kv,<br />\n<br />\nA lipoma is a growth of fat cells in a thin, fibrous capsule usually found just below the skin, --say max size about one inch.<br />\n<br />\nIt is movable if prodded with your finger and have a soft, rubbery consistency.<br />\n<br />\nThey do not cause pain and will remain the same size over years or grow very slowly.<br />\n<br />\nThere is no known treatment to prevent lipomas or affect their growth.<br />\n<br />\nA lipoma may be surgically removed if it --<br />\nAffects your self esteem<br />\nBecomes painful or tender-- it is only painful if it grows into nerves underneath the skin.<br />\nBecomes infected or inflamed repeatedly.<br />\nDrains foul-smelling discharge.<br />\nInterferes with movement or function.<br />\nIncreases in size.<br />\nBecomes unsightly or bothersome.<br />\n<br />\nThe removal of a lipoma is regarded as cosmetic surgery as it will NOT kill you,<br />\n<br />\nThey can be removed by liposuction.<br />\n<br />\nLipomas rarely grow back once they are surgically removed.<br />\n<br />\nThe doctor injects a local anesthetic around the lipoma, makes an incision in the skin, removes the growth, and closes the incision with stitches. And you can go home straight away , without giving the nurses a chance to flirt with you.<br />\n<br />\nIce and heat packs are useless for lipomas because they are fat-based.<br />\n<br />\nYou can pretend that it pains like hell -- and blackmail your wife or girlfriend to get falthu sympathy .<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE CATCH IS THERE WAS\nNO DEAD BODY OF A QUEEN .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
