, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because of her bravery,\ncourage, and wisdom, and her progressive views on WOMENs EMPOWERMENT &nbsp;she became an icon .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WOMENS EMPOWERMENT\nMAAGTHA HAI BHAIYYA- EVEN AKKAL KA DUSHMAN KNOWS IT-- BAARAH CYLINDER KE SAATH.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/M2B0vqCXYvo/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/M2B0vqCXYvo?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THODA WOMENs EMPOWERMENT KAL KELIYE BHI RAKHO YAAR !</b><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/5vibYkqtnQ4/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/5vibYkqtnQ4?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">TEE HEEEEEEEEEEEE !</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Rani was\nmemorialized in bronze statues at both Jhansi and Gwalior, both of which\nportray her on horseback.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rani Lakshmi Bai became\na national heroine and was seen as the epitome of female bravery in India. When\nthe Indian National Army created its first female unit, it was named after her.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">GANDHI IS THE FATHER OF\nOUR NATION.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">KALIDASA IS OUR\nNATIONAL POET.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ASHOKA IS OUR NATIONAL\nEMBLEM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In my social studies\nbook, i learnt the white invader's version of how Tantia Tope was hanged April\n1859 --making him a great freedom fighter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To save the RED British\nface , stooge Scindia offered another man to be hanged in another place (\nusually hanging is done in the hometown for identification ) <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The prime minister of Scindia\nDinkar Rao Rajwade, was told by his king to send one of his own family members\nto the gallows and he was executed. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i>\"It would be an\nexcellent idea to call in respectable, accredited anti-Semites as liquidators\nof property. To the people they would vouch for the fact that we do not wish to\nbring about the impoverishment of the countries that we leave. At first they\nmust not be given large fees for this; otherwise we shall spoil our instruments\nand make them despicable as 'stooges of the Jews.' Later their fees will\nincrease, and in the end we shall have only Gentile officials in the countries\nfrom which we have emigrated. The anti-Semites will become our most dependable\nfriends, the anti-Semitic countries our allies.\"</i> (The Complete Diaries of\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Theodor Herzl.</b> Vol. 1, edited by Raphael Patai, translated by Harry Zohn, page\n83-84)\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-WoUiLuySJxA/VikbZrP28mI/AAAAAAABA1U/4GmrtnKwqWo/s1600/EncJud_Herzl-band8-kolonnef421-Herzlberg-Herzlgrab.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"502\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-WoUiLuySJxA/VikbZrP28mI/AAAAAAABA1U/4GmrtnKwqWo/s640/EncJud_Herzl-band8-kolonnef421-Herzlberg-Herzlgrab.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"So anti-Semitism,\nwhich is a deeply imbedded force in the subconscious mind of the masses, will\nnot harm the Jews. I actually find it to be advantageous to building the Jewish\ncharacter, education by the masses that will lead to assimilation. This\neducation can only happen through suffering, and the Jews will adapt.\" &nbsp;<b>p. 68 of Part I of Hertzl\u2019s Diary</b>.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-PZR6XFTPwrs/VikdJU6GU3I/AAAAAAABA1g/0OVzpoTTlbs/s1600/ayrtid32578_combined.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"322\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-PZR6XFTPwrs/VikdJU6GU3I/AAAAAAABA1g/0OVzpoTTlbs/s640/ayrtid32578_combined.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In addition to Hitler,\nRosenberg, Goebbels and Streicher, many other Nazi leaders used statements from\nZionists to validate their charges against the Jews of Germany. Such are the\nefforts of Zionist leaders to this very day to maintain a high degree of\nanti-semitism in order to enable them, in feigned horror, to then point to\nanti-semitism to support their idolatrous and anti-Jewish cause. In 1963, Moshe\nSharett, then Chairman of the Jewish Agency, told the 38th Annual Congress of\nthe Scandinavian Youth Federation that the freedom enjoyed by the majority of\nJews imperiled Zionism, and at the 26th World Zionist Congress, the delegates\nwere told that the Jew is endangered by the easing of anti-Semitism in the\nUnited States \u201cWe are endangered by freedom\u201d he declared.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Zionism thrives on\nanti-Semitism. It is all about a few selfish people grabbing power. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-97Jk-V6j0Lw/VilNZz3tAlI/AAAAAAABA2o/M8gN2zBAmZQ/s1600/downlR4444oad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"428\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-97Jk-V6j0Lw/VilNZz3tAlI/AAAAAAABA2o/M8gN2zBAmZQ/s640/downlR4444oad.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\nHERE IS THE KOSHER VERSION -- A LIE !<br />\n#########################################################<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\">The Warsaw Ghetto was established by the German Governor-General Hans Frank on October 16, 1940. Frank ordered Jews in Warsaw and its suburbs rounded up and herded into the Ghetto.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\">At this time, the population in the Ghetto was estimated to be 400,000 people, about 30% of the population of Warsaw; however, the size of the Ghetto was about 2.4% of the size of Warsaw.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\" /><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\">The construction of the ghetto wall started on April 1, 1940, but the Germans closed the Warsaw Ghetto to the outside world on November 16 that year. The wall was typically 3 m (9.8 ft) high and topped with barbed wire. Escapees could be shot on sight. The borders of the ghetto changed many times through the next years.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\" /><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\">The ghetto was divided by Ch\u0142odna Street, which due to its importance (Warsaw's major street leading to the east) was excluded from it. The area south of Ch\u0142odna was known as \"Small Ghetto\", while the area north of this street -- \"Large Ghetto\".&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\">Those two parts were connected by \u017belazna Street (special gate was built at its intersection with Ch\u0142odna Street). In January 1942 a wooden footbridge, which after the war became one of the symbols of the Holocaust, was built there to ease pedestrian traffic.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\">The first commissioner of the Warsaw ghetto was his chief organizer SA-Standartenf\u00fchrer Waldemar Sch\u00f6n. He was succeeded in May 1941 by Heinz Auerswald.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\" /><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\">On January 18, 1943, after almost four months without any deportations, the Germans suddenly entered the Warsaw ghetto intent upon a further deportation. Within hours, some 600 Jews were shot and 5,000 others rounded up.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\" /><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\">The Germans expected no resistance, but preparations to resist had been going on since the previous autumn. The first instances of Jewish armed resistance began that day.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\">The Jewish fighters had some success: the expulsion stopped after four days and the \u017bOB and \u017bZW resistance organizations took control of the Ghetto, building shelters and fighting posts and operating against Jewish collaborators.</span><br style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\" /><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\"><br /></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\">The final battle started on the eve of Passover of April 19, 1943, when a Nazi force consisting of several thousand troops entered the ghetto.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\">After initial setbacks, the Germans under the field command of J\u00fcrgen Stroop systematically burned and blew up the ghetto buildings, block by block, rounding up or murdering anybody they could capture.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\">Significant resistance ended on April 28, and the Nazi operation officially ended in mid-May, symbolically culminating with the demolition of the Great Synagogue of Warsaw on May 16.&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times&quot; , &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"color: #333333; line-height: 17px;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">According to the official report, at least </span><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">56,065 Jews were killed on the spot </b><span style=\"background-color: white;\">or deported to German Nazi concentration and death camps, most of them to Treblinka.</span></span></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n#################################################################<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The STROOP REPORT &nbsp;was supposedly a leather-bound commemorative\nbook, created by SS general&nbsp; J\u00fcrgen\nStroop, ( Josep Jew ) &nbsp;chronicling the defeat of the Jews in the Warsaw ghetto&nbsp; uprising, and was created as a present to be\ngiven to Crypto Jew Heinrich Himmler.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The&nbsp;&nbsp; book begins as a commentary and background\nof the ghetto; the next section&nbsp; is\ncomprised of supposed copies of daily battle reports; and the final&nbsp;&nbsp; section offers around 65 photos--one of\nwhich is the famous photo of the&nbsp;&nbsp; little\nboy with his hands raised up, which is the most famous photo of the&nbsp; holocaust.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was a Warsaw ghetto, and\nthere was an uprising, lead by brave Jewish commander &nbsp;Mordecai Anielewicz .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Stroop Report&nbsp; is a fraudulent log of that event which any\nidiot can figure out is PATHETIC forgery. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With the Stroop Report\nwe have 437 Jews killed for every 1 German killed in battle. You might wonder:\n\"Maybe the Jews didn't have weapons.\"&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Except during those 5 days the\nGermans &nbsp;captured 10 kilograms of\nexplosives, 100 hand grenades, ammunition, 25 pistols, and 5 rifles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Would even a DIMWIT </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">German general choose to include such an un-chivalric\nphoto of a German soldier threatening a small boy with a gun-</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The forger who created the Stroop Report\ncouldn't have predicted this photo becoming the world's most famous holocaust\nphoto. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The word\n\"bandit\" appears in the Stroop Report 99 times. This forgery appears\nto be a pea brained female\u2019s work.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jewess Rachel Auerbach\nis best known for her memoirs of the Warsaw Ghetto\u2014and the Stroop Report is\njust her Kosher style. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1950 she settled in\nIsrael, where she was founder and, for a long time, director of the Gvies eydes\n(oral testimony of endless kosher &nbsp;lies )\nsection of the Yad Vashem memorial in Jerusalem.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Who created the word\nNAZI? &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">Ever heard of <span style=\"color: blue;\">aske</span><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>NAZI</b></span> &nbsp;jews ?</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The word NAZI means PRINCE\nOF JEWS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">NAZI is the title given\nto the head of a Sanhedrin court who has powers of life and death over you\nunder Talmudic law.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Great Sanhedrin was\nmade up of a NAZI, who functioned as head or representing president. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In 190 BC, when the\nSanhedrin lost confidence in the High Priest, the office of NAZI ( nasi ) &nbsp;was created.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Talmud (tractate\nSanhedrin) identifies two classes of rabbinical courts called Sanhedrin, a\nGreat Sanhedrin and a Lesser Sanhedrin .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Each city could have its own lesser Sanhedrin\nof 23 judges, but there could be only one Great Sanhedrin of 71, which among\nother roles acted as the Supreme Court, taking appeals from cases decided by\nlesser courts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">TIME HAS NOW COME FOR MY REVELATIONS TO JUMP TO <span style=\"color: red;\">8.3 %</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>NAZIS ( nasi ) ARE CHOSEN ELITE JEWS\nWHO HAVE UNLIMITED POWER OF LIFE/ DEATH OVER ORDINARY JEWS&nbsp; .</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Her wealth 100% was dependent on spices exported by the Calicut King (<span style=\"color: red;\">my hometown </span>) using Arabs as brokers .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/skIQ61CfLsw/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/skIQ61CfLsw?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In modern Hebrew NASI (\nnazi ) means &nbsp;president, who has\nunlimited powers over Jews.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The word NAZI ( NASI ) nasi\noccurs 133 times in the Masoretic Text of the Hebrew Bible- alluding to PRINCE-\nthe chosen one.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The first use is for\nthe twelve \"princes\" who will descend from Ishmael, in Genesis 17,\nand the second use, in Genesis 23, is the Hethites recognising Abraham as\n\"a godly prince\" (nasi elohim \u05e0\u05b0\u05e9\u05b4\u05c2\u05d9\u05d0 \u05d0\u05b1\u05dc\u05b9\u05d4\u05b4\u05d9\u05dd).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the book of\nLeviticus, in the rites of sacrifices for leaders who err, there is the special\noffering made by a \"Nasi\". The Talmudic book of Horayot actually\ndefines this to mean the KING .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the book of Numbers,\nthe leaders of each tribe is referred to as a Nasi and each one brings a gift\nto the Tabernacle, 12 consecutive days, with each one being listed individually\nby name even though they all brought the same set of gifts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Later in the history of\nAncient Israel the title of nasi was given to the political ruler of Judea -\ne.g. Lev 4:22; Ezek 44:2-18; Ezra 1:8<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">During the Second\nCommonwealth (c. 530 BCE - 70 CE), the NAZI was the highest-ranking member and\npresident of the Sanhedrin or Assembly, including when it sat as a criminal\ncourt. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The NASI &nbsp;position was created in 190 BC when the\nSanhedrin lost confidence in the ability of the High Priest to serve as its\nhead.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Romans recognised\nthe NASI as Patriarch of the Jews, and required all Jews to pay him a tax for\nthe upkeep of that office, which ranked highly in the Roman official hierarchy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">QUOTE:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Haavara Agreement\n(Hebrew: \u05d4\u05e1\u05db\u05dd \u05d4\u05e2\u05d1\u05e8\u05d4 Translit.: heskem haavara Translated: \"transfer\nagreement\") was an agreement between Nazi Germany and Zionist German Jews\nsigned on 25 August 1933. The agreement was finalized after three months of\ntalks by the Zionist Federation of Germany, the Anglo-Palestine Bank (under the\ndirective of the Jewish Agency) and the economic authorities of Nazi Germany.\nThe agreement was designed to help facilitate the emigration of German Jews to\nPalestine. While it helped Jews emigrate, it forced them to temporarily give up\npossessions to Germany before departing. Those possessions could later be\nre-obtained by transferring them to Palestine as German export goods. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Haavara (Transfer)\nAgreement was agreed to by the German government in 1933 to allow the Zionist\nmovement, in the form of the Haavara company to transfer property from Germany\nto Palestine, for the sole purpose of encouraging Jewish emigration from\nGermany.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Initially, Hitler ( A\nCRYPTO JEW ) criticized the agreement, but shortly reversed his opinion, and\ncontinued to support it, in the face of opposition, through 1939.[6]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\"><b>BOOOOO HOOOOOOOOOOOO !</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Se0kpkJIhH8/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Se0kpkJIhH8?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>Every major newspaper\non this planet SPLASHED this news about the messiah !<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>We Indians had a\nRothschild\u2019s&nbsp; ready made messiah to sit\non the driver\u2019s seat of our freedom struggle.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nJuicy stories were splashed how Gandhi (1914 ), presented General Jan Smuts\nwith a pair of sandals made by himself&nbsp;\nto show great mutual admiration and respect..<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>Before Gandhi sailed\nfor England , Gokhale left for England to arrange for a grand reception ,\ninvolving thousand of cheering British , for newspaper photographs, suitable\nfor a \"great Mahatma \"--&nbsp; and\nmeetings with Churchill and MPs, to coach and familiarise him. <o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>Gandhi would make sure\nthousands of Indian soldiers joined Britain to fight along with them in the\nfirst world war.&nbsp; Gokhale was stuck at\nParis as the 1st World war just broke out.&nbsp;\nGandhi's ship was in the English channel at this time, just 24 hours\nfrom London<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>Hermann Kallenback\naccompanied Gandhi and his wife on their final voyage from South Africa to\nLondon in 1914.&nbsp; He was indeed the\nquintessential&nbsp; \"Big brother's eye\n\" or the \"embedded reporter \".<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>When Gandhi mobilised\nIndians in England to enlist as soldiers with the British a law student Sorabji\nAdajania got hoppin' mad, and asked him how he can take such unilateral\ndecisions and who the fu#k has authorised him?<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>Chitpavan JEW nay Brahmin\nGopal Krishna Gokhale, said that it is immaterial who rules the country as long\nas its people have security and reasonable freedom in their private life,&nbsp; as given to them by the British-- just like\nBR Ambedkar later.<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>Gandhi was now 45, and\nhe was coming back to India after 12 years. He reached Mumbai from London on\n9th Jan 1915. to a tumultuous welcome.&nbsp; Chitpavan\nGokhale was at the quay with a rapturous reception party.<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>Indians were literally\novercome with awe. This was the brown half naked man who even the Queen of\nEngland was afraid of- HILAAAKKE RAKH DIYA APUN KA GANDHI &nbsp;ANGREZON KOH !<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>Who was this great\nMahatma who was respected and feared by the British, that even the PM / King of\nBritain , and even the racist South African govt, gave him an audience.<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>Rothschild media splashed\nGandhi\u2019s photo in all front pages .<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>Separate receptions\nwere held by Jinnah and Sir Pherozah Mehta too.&nbsp;\nThe British in Bombay were told to treat Gandhi like the cat's whiskers.\nThe newspapers were full of the just arrived \"messiah\".<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>Gokhale told Gandhi to\ntour extensively all over India in 3rd class train, to give a\n\"darshan\" to all Indians, so as to be ratified in the hearts and\nminds of Indians -- the messiah who would sit on the driver's seat of our\nfreedom struggle..&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>\" Hi Indians, I am\nthe MAHATMA -- you must join the British army and&nbsp; fight -- killing Germans with guns issued to\nyou is NOT violence.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>But killing our dear\nBritish rulers , and driving them away from India with their own guns , is\nVIOLENCE--&nbsp; and I wont allow that!<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>Such was the curiosity\nraised by endless propaganda of the great Mahatma-- that thousands lines up\nalong railway tracks, doing namaste. <o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>It was a media\nblitzkrieg.<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>At Calcutta another\nopium agent of Rothschild in Calcutta, the wealthy GD Birla, jumped into the\ncrowd and started physically pulling Gandhi's carriage with great gusto.<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>The British made sure\nthat every railway station was jam packed with awe struck Indians..<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>Who is this Maha Meru\nwho gave the British and even the King of England , an inferiority\ncomplex?&nbsp; This propaganda at its\nbest--even CRYPTO JEW Joseph Goebbels would admit..<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/aL7b7uhYLl4/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/aL7b7uhYLl4?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>On 20th Feb 1915,\nChitpavan Jew -nay- brahmin- Gopal Krishna Gokhale died. <o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>&nbsp;</i></b></span></span><b style=\"color: blue; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Chitpavan Brahmins are\nthe descendants of a shipload of Bene Israel Jews who were loaded on to a\nRothschild owned ship ( British East India Company ) from Kerala and dumped off\nthe coast of Konkan , to wade ashore.&nbsp;</i></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>Now Gandhi was in the\ndrivers seat. At Lucknow Nehru was introduced to Gandhi, as per the Rothschild\nblueprint.&nbsp; He would be groomed to take\nover the mantle from Gandhi.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>After landing at\nBombay&nbsp; Gandhi wrote a letter to the\nGovernor of Bombay Presidency expressing his promise that he would always abide\nby his instructions.&nbsp; All these letters\nhave been exposed in this Internet age.<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>The First World War\nbegan in Europe on 28 June 1914, and Gandhi, immediately after reaching India,\nstarted to recruit Indian soldiers for the British army, in his eagerness to\nexpress his loyalty to the British Empire.<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>It was surprising to\nall that, Gandhi, the apostle of nonviolence,&nbsp;\nsupported war and according to his promise to the British master,\nrecruited Indians for both world wars to be sacrificed as lambs.&nbsp;</i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>He personally\ntravelled far and wide and addressed meetings in his bid to recruit soldiers\nfor Britain, under the hawks eye and \"patronage\" of Commissioner\nPratt.<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>Confused Indians used\nto ask Mahatma every day, \u201c Why should we help the cruel British invader who is\nrobbing us blind every single day ?&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>What good will it do to\nus? <o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>What had Britain done\nto deserve our \"coolie\" blood?&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>What about AHIMSA ?<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>Gandhi recruited 13\nlakh ( 1.3 million ) Indian soldiers in the first world war \u2013 out of which\n111000 ( 1.11 lakh ) Indian soldiers were killed .<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>The British Crown,\ncould have never ever had forced drafting of such a huge number of angry\nIndians , and given them guns and bullets .<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>The British used Gandhi\nto disarm and demoralise the patriotic revolutionaries of India, like Bagha\nJatin , Aurobindo Ghosh , Surya Sen, jatin das, MN Roy etc.&nbsp;&nbsp;</i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i><br /></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>He was asked to travel to Bengal to\nextinguish the fire of violent freedom struggle \u2013because of which Rothschild Raj\nhad to run LUNGI UTHAAKE from Calcutta to Delhi.<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><i>Gandhi recruited&nbsp; 25 lakh ( 2.5 million ) Indian soldiers in\nthe second World war.&nbsp;&nbsp; Out of this\n243000 ( 2.43 lakh)&nbsp; soldiers were killed.<o:p></o:p></i></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IT WAS SO EASY ,\nSTALIN, CHURCHILL, ROOSEVELT, EISEHNOWER, POPE \u2013ALL WERE CRYPTO JEWS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">QUOTE \u201c&nbsp; After the war Hess became a judge in\nD\u00fcsseldorf, where he lived with his wife Margarete and daughter Ursula.\nHitler's rise to prominence came as a surprise to Hess and many of his\ncolleagues from the regiment. The future dictator had been something of a\nnon-entity during his time in the army, with no friends within the regiment and\nlittle interaction with others. Hess regarded Hitler as \"an absolute\ncypher\" and spoke of his surprise that Hitler had been one of his\ncomrades: \"What, Hitler? He was in our unit? We never even noticed\nhim.\"[2]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">He was awarded a Grand\nCross of the Order of Merit of the Federal Republic of Germany and was given a\nplaque of honour by the city of Frankfurt in 1970. Mathai (1909\u20131981) was the Private\nSecretary to India's first Prime Minister, Jawaharlal Nehru. Mathai worked with\nthe United States Army in India before becoming the Secretary to Nehru in 1946.\nHe resigned in 1959 following Communist allegations of misuse of power and\nspying. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the times of King\nSolomon Canaan was the ancient ethnic name for Palestine\u2014used in the old Bible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Canaanites were\ndescribed as living \"by the sea, and along by the side of the Jordan\"\n(Numbers 33:51; Joshua 22:9),<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In the Bible, the\nrenaming of Land of Canaan as the Land of Israel marks the Israelite conquest\nof the Promised Land. Canaan and the Canaanites are mentioned 162 times in the\nHebrew Bible, mostly in the Pentateuch and the books of Joshua and Judges. &nbsp;God promises the land of Canaan to Abraham,\nand eventually delivers it to descendants of Abraham, the Israelites.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Hebrew Bible describes\nthe Israelite conquest of Canaan in the \"Former Prophets\" (Nevi'im\nRishonim [\u05e0\u05d1\u05d9\u05d0\u05d9\u05dd \u05e8\u05d0\u05e9\u05d5\u05e0\u05d9\u05dd] ), viz. the books of Joshua, Judges, 1st &amp; 2nd\nSamuel, 1st &amp; 2nd Kings. These five books of the Old Testament canon give\nthe narrative of the Israelites after the death of Moses and Joshua leading\nthem into Canaan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In 586 BC, the\nIsraelites in turn lost the land to the Babylonians.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The archaeological and\ntextual evidence supports the idea that the early Israelites were in fact\nthemselves Canaanites.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Rothschild employed archeologists planted FAKE\nJewish evidence to usurp Palestine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Teir descendant is Jesus who took\non a Namboodiri wife Mary Magdalene. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Solomon used Kerala Cinnamon\noil to perfume his bed as an aphrodisiac . font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ramdas are you a\nGeneral or an Admiral or a plain DESH DR0HI ?. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">His daughter Kavita\nRamdas is the former President and CEO of the Rothschild\u2019s agency Global Fund\nfor Women.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Kavita Ramdas is a\nformer member of the Global Development Program Advisory Panel to the Bill\n&amp; Melinda Gates Foundation, and serves on the Board of Trustees at\nPrinceton University, on the Council of Advisors on Gender Equity to the\nWoodrow Wilson School at Princeton University, and on the Advisory Council to\nthe Asian University for Women and the African Women Millennium Initiative on\nPoverty and Human Rights.&nbsp; All this is NOT possible without Rothschild\u2019s\napproval.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The DESH DROHI Ford\nFoundation has donated more than USD 500 million to India since opening its\nfirst overseas office in Delhi in 1952. The Ford Foundation has a &nbsp;partnership with the New Israel Fund.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I once&nbsp; recd a rosewood plaque from Admiral L Ramdas\non the occasion of National Maritime day at Kochi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">When I reached the ship\nI asked for Dettol and scrubbed my hands on the bridge \u2014my second mate had a\ngood laugh.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Capt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><b>PUT ABOVE PIECE IN MODIs, RAJNATH sINGHs, PARRIKARs AND AMIT SHAHs WEBSITES .</b></span><br />\n#########################################<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>It is a secret that Germany\nhad a problem with Jew homosexuals. The Zionist Jews did NOT want these\nhomosexuals in the promised land. &nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Hundreds\nof thousands of Jew homosexuals were interned in Nazi concentration camps. All\nthese Jew homosexuals were circumcised. They were consigned to the lowest\nposition in the camp hierarchy, and subjected to abuse by both guards and\nfellow prisoners; most of them perished.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;
