font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>These Jew homosexuals were killed by Nazi Jews&nbsp; of crypto &nbsp;Jew Hitler. &nbsp;Only men who could have sexual intercourse\nwith a woman and procreate were need in soon to be born Israel.&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>It was the Jews\nwho exterminated homosexuals ,NOT Christians.&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>There were hardly any Christian\nhomosexuals . &nbsp;The official SS newspaper,\nDas Schwarze Korps, announced in 1937 that there were two million German\nhomosexuals and called for their death.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>It is an irony that now\nIsrael is promoting homosexuality and gay marriages.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>\u201cIf the Germans were\ndestined to become the master race by virtue of their inherent biological\nsuperiority, the breeding stock could only be improved by the removal of\ndegenerates.&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Retarded, deformed and homosexual individuals could be eliminated\nwith the dispassionate conscientiousness of a gardener pulling weed\u201d was\nRothschild media propaganda.&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Today the shoe is on the other foot.&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">It was the Zionist\nJews who did NOT want worthless people who could NOT produce healthy Jew babies\nin Israel-NOT German Christians.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/ICjU2fTJP6w/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/ICjU2fTJP6w?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">A system of ranking\nwomen according to the number of their offspring was devised by Minister of the\nInterior Wilhelm Frick, who demanded that homosexuals \u201cbe hunted down\nmercilessly, for their vice can only lead to the demise of the German people.\u201d(\nsorry it must read Jews in the promised land \u2013we know of the RING WORM AFFAIR \u2013it\ncuts NO ice )</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;one concentration camp survivor, LD Classen\nvon Neudegg, who published some of his recollections in a German homophile\nmagazine in the Fifties. Here are a few more excerpts from his account of the\ntreatment of homosexuals in the concentration camp at Sachsenhausen:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u201cWe had been here for\nalmost two months, but it seemed like endless years to us. When we were\n'transferred' here, we had numbered around three hundred men. Whips were used\nmore frequently each morning, when we were forced down into the clay pits under\nthe wailing of the camp sirens. 'Only fifty are sill alive,' whispered the man\nnext to me. 'Stay in the middle -then you won't get hit so much.'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u201c...(The escapees) had\nbeen brought back. 'Homo' was scrawled scornfully across their clothing for\ntheir last walk through the camp. To increase their thirst, they were forced to\neat oversalted food, and then they were placed on the block and whipped.\nAfterwards, drums were hung around their necks, which they had to beat while\nshouting, 'Hurrah, we're back!' The three men were hanged.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u201c...Summer, 1944. One\nmorning there was an eruption of restlessness among the patients of the\nhospital barracks where I worked. Fear and uncertainty had arisen from rumours\nabout new measures on the part of the SS hospital administration. At the\nadministrator's order, the courier of the political division had requisitioned\ncertain medical records, and now he arrived at the camp for delivery.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Fever\ncharts shot up; the sick were seized with a gnawing fear. After a few days, the\nawful mystery of the records was solved. Experiments had been ordered involving\nliving subjects and phosphorus: methods of treating phosphorus burns were to be\ndeveloped and tested. I must be silent about the effects of this series of\nexperiments, which proceeded with unspeakable pain, fear, blood and tears: for\nit is impossible to put the misery into words.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Dr. Neudegg's\nrecollections are confirmed in many details by the memoirs of Rudolf Hoss,\nadjunct and commander of the concentration camps at Sachsenhausen and, later,\nAuschwitz. Neudegg's account is something of a rarity: the few homosexuals who\nmanaged to survive internment have tended to hide the fact, largely because\nhomosexuality continued to be a crime in postwar West Germany. This is also the\nreason why homosexuals have been denied any compensation by the otherwise\nmunificent West German government.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Moreover, many\nhomosexuals were summarily executed by firing squads; this was particularly the\ncase with gays in the military \u00ad\u00ad which encompassed nearly every able-bodied\nman during the final years of the war. Finally, many concentration camps\nsystematically destroyed all their records when it became apparent that German\ndefeat was imminent.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Until 1935, the only\npunishable offence had been anal intercourse; under the new Paragraph 175a, ten\npossible \u201cacts\u201d were punishable, including a kiss, an embrace, even homosexual\nfantasies! One man, for instance, was successfully prosecuted on the grounds\nthat he had observed a couple making love in a park and watched only the man.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;The chances for survival in a Level Three camp\nwere low indeed. Homosexuals were distinguished from other prisoners by a pink\ntriangle, worn on the left side of the jacket and on the right pant leg. There\nwas no possibility of \u201cpassing\u201d for straight, and the presence of \u201cmarked men\u201d\nin the all-male camp population evoked the same reaction as in contemporary\nprisons: gays were brutally assaulted and sexually abused by homosexual Jewish\nguards <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">. \u201cDuring the first\nweeks of my imprisonment,\u201d wrote one survivor, \u201cI often thought I was the only\navailable target on whom everyone was free to vent his aggressions. Things\nimproved when I was assigned to a labour detail that worked outside the camp at\nMetz, because everything took place in public view. I was made clerk of the\nlabour detail, which meant that I worked all day and then looked after the\nrecords at the guardhouse between midnight and 2 am. Because of this 'overtime'\nI was allowed seconds at lunch \u00ad\u00ad if any food was left over. This is the fact\nto which I probably owe my survival...I saw quite a number of pink triangles. I\ndon't know how they were eventually killed...One day they were simply gone.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">One survivor tells of\nwitnessing \u201cProject Pink\u201d in his camp: \u201cThe homosexuals were grouped into\nliquidation commandos and placed under triple camp discipline. That meant less\nfood, more work, stricter supervision. If a prisoner with a pink triangle\nbecame sick, it spelled his doom. Admission to the clinic was forbidden.\u201d&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This\nwas the practice in the concentration camps at Sachsenhausen, Natzweler, Fuhlsbuttel,\nNeusustrum, Sonnenburg, Dachau, Lichtenberg, Mauthausen, Ravensbruck,\nNeuengamme, Grossrosen, Buchenwald, Vught, Flossenburg, Stutthof, Auschwitz,\nand Struthof; as well, lesbians wore pink triangles in the concentration camps\nat Butzow and Ravensbruck.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A survivor gives this\naccount: <i>\u201cHe was a young and healthy man. The first evening roll call after he\nwas added to our penal company was his last. When he arrived, he was seized and\nridiculed, then beaten and kicked, and finally spat upon. He suffered alone and\nin silence. Then they put him under a cold shower. It was a frosty winter\nevening, and he stood outside the barracks all through that long, bitterly cold\nnight. When morning came, his breathing had become an audible rattle. Bronchial\npneumonia was later given as the cause of his death. But before things had come\nto that, he was again beaten and kicked. Then he was tied to a post and placed\nunder an arc lamp until he began to sweat, again put under a cold shower, and\nso on. He died toward evening.\u201d</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Hitler ordered all the\ngay bars in Berlin closed as soon as he came to power. But when the Olympics\nwere held in that city in 1936, he temporarily rescinded the order and allowed\nseveral bars to reopen: foreign guests were not to receive the impression that\nBerlin was a \u201csad city.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/lV3BIrU_GDg/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/lV3BIrU_GDg?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">By 1933 the SA had grown\nfar larger than the German army, yet the Vikingkorps (Officers' Corps) remained\nalmost exclusively homosexual. These gays were the aggressive male who humped \u2013NOT\nthe effiminate receiving shemale sissys. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;\"Roehm, as the head of 2,500,000 Storm\nTroops,\" writes historian H.R. Knickerbocker, \"had surrounded himself\nwith a staff of perverts. &nbsp;&nbsp;His chiefs,\nmen of rank of Gruppenfuhrer or Obergruppenfuhrer, commanding units of several\nhundred thousand Storm Troopers, were almost without exception homosexuals.\nIndeed, unless a Storm Troop officer were homosexual he had no chance of\nadvancement\" (Knickerbocker:55).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In February of 1933,\ncrypto Jew &nbsp;Hitler banned gay pornography,\nhomosexual bars and bathhouses, and groups which promoted \"gay\nrights\" . &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ostensibly, this decree\nwas a blanket condemnation of all homosexual activity in Germany, but in\npractice it served as just another means to find and destroy Jews who were NOT\nfit enough for inhabiting and procreating with good quality seed in the promised\nland.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Mind you Rothschild created Communism to kill the\nRussian Czar.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">In 1933, with the\nsupport of the Rothschild , Hitler became Chancellor of Germany and the Nazis now\nfully controlled by crypto Jews , gradually established a one-party state,\nunder which Jews, political opponents and other \"undesirables\"\nelements were marginalized.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\">According to the\nhistorian Thomas Weber, Hitler attended the funeral of communist Kurt Eisner (a\nGerman Jew), wearing a black mourning armband on one arm and a red communist\narmband on the other-at that time itself perceptive people knew Hitler was a\ncrypto Jew.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Although he opposed\ncommunist ideology, Hitler on numerous occasions publicly praised the Soviet\nUnion's leader crypto Jew Joseph Stalin and Stalinism. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\"Pure Thought and\nIntuition, are distinguished from each other in this, - that the latter, even\nin its very principle, is abolished and annihilated by the former. Their\nconnection, on the other hand, consists in this, - that the latter is a\ncondition of the practical possibility of the former, - also that the Ego which\nappears in the latter, still remains in the former in its mere Schema, and is\nthere taken into account, although in its Actuality it is abolished along with\nInstinct. &nbsp;Whatsoever exists for a\nrational being exists in it ; but nothing is in it except by virtue of an\nacting upon itself; what it contemplates it contemplates in itself, but there\nis nothing to be contemplated in it but its acting ; and the Ego itself is\nnothing but an acting upon itself. The mere knowledge, however, of the\nfaculties and wants of man, without an acquaintance with the means of\ndeveloping and satisfying them, would be not only a most sorrowful and\ndiscouraging, but also a vain and perfectly useless acquirement. The character\nof Reason consists in this, that the acting and the object of the acting are\none and the same ; and this description completely exhausts the sphere of\nReason. Nothing is easier than to produce with freedom, and under no necessity\nof thinking, every possible determination in our minds, and to cause our mind\narbitrarily to act in every possible manner; but nothing is more difficult than\nto observe that mind as acting in real, that is, in necessary acting\".</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; At her own desire she goes as my wife with me into death. It will compensate us for what we both lost through my work in the service of my people.<br /><br />What I possess belongs - in so far as it has any value - to the Party. Should this no longer exist, to the State; should the State also be destroyed, no further decision of mine is necessary.<br /><br />My pictures, in the collections which I have bought in the course of years, have never been collected for private purposes, but only for the extension of a gallery in my home town of Linz on Donau.<br /><br />It is my most sincere wish that this bequest may be duly executed.<br /><br />I nominate as my Executor my most faithful Party comrade,&nbsp;<i>Martin Bormann.</i>&nbsp;He is given full legal authority to make all decisions. He is permitted to take out everything that has a sentimental value or is necessary for the maintenance of a modest simple life, for my brothers and sisters, also above all for the mother of my wife and my faithful co-workers who are well known to him, principally my old Secretaries Frau Winter etc. who have for many years aided me by their work.<br /><br />I myself and my wife - in order to escape the disgrace of deposition or capitulation - choose death. It is our wish to be burnt immediately on the spot where I have carried out the greatest part of my daily work in the course of a twelve years' service to my people.<br /><br />Given in Berlin, 29th April 1945, 4:00 a.m.<br />Signed:<br /><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://www.evabraun.dk/hitlersignature.jpg\" height=\"60\" kasperskylab_antibanner=\"on\" width=\"113\" /></span></span></div>\n<div align=\"left\" style=\"background-color: white; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; margin-left: 55px; margin-right: 55px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;verdana&quot;;\"><span style=\"color: black; font-size: x-small;\"><i>A. conspirators;<br />\nMore than ever her time (or empire) will triumph;<br />\nSeventy-three years its deathly domination is assured.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: astronomy..<br />\n<br />\nHe did not use a bowl of water as a \"magic mirror\" when writing his prophecies, he used a regular mirror. ..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD MATCHED HIS DEATH DATE ON LATER EDITIONS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIf he predicted his own death in Presage 141, he missed it by a year \u2014 so some editions show a version of that Presage posthumously edited by his secretary to match the correct date\u2026<br />\n<br />\nNostradamus was reputed to be a plague doctor\u2014he knew SHIT about plague..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD GAVE BULL THAT NOSTRADAMUS WAS BURIED UPRIGHT LIKE HINDU JIVAN MUKTS .. IN REALITY HE WAS BURIED IN LYING POSITION<br />\n<br />\nThe RIDICULOUS tale about Nostradamus is that he was buried standing up so that nobody would step on his grave; and when his body was later disinterred during the French Revolution to be relocated, he was wearing a FORGED medallion on which the exact date of the disinterment was engraved\u2026<br />\n<br />\nI have two editions of his book Les Propheties\u2014both are different to accommodate LIES converted to truths ..<br />\n<br />\nVarious versions were published during his lifetime, and there is no one authoritative collection<br />\n<br />\nOver 200 different translations and interpreted versions have been published since his death, so the folly of hoping to find Nostradamus' original text is IMPOSSIBLE..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nNobody has ever used Nostradamus' writings to predict a future event in specific terms which later came true. First she interpreted references to Moammar Qaddafi, and later changed them to the Ayatollah Khomeini, and later changed them again to Saddam Hussein..<br />\n<br />\nNEW YORK NEVER EXISTED DURING TIMES OF NOSTRADAMUS ..
